story:
This is the story of our Dream
A dream we've been patiently working for last 7 Years
and with your support it can soon come true


So, allow us to take You through this Exciting Journey
of scaling the impossible mountain far beyond the World Record, 
with 100,000 adventurers Solar Cooking on the same day
And how it will impact all of us.

Here we Go

Solar Cooking is the best way there is to Cook Food

Nothing summarizes this more beautifully than the below verses 

"Influenced are our Minds by the Food we eat 
& influenced is the Food by the Method we cook it"
                                   "food cooked in the Vicinity of Sun & Air
                                   is the gateway to stay youthful, joyful & healthier"
                                                                           Charak Samhita, Ayurveda


World's only Solar Cooker that sits on Your Palmtop

and assembles in less than 20 seconds!





Small yet Powerful, Simple yet Elegant & Compact yet Durable
Carry it in your Office, Gym, Family Outing, Swimming Pool, wherever You Go
ecoo will cook wonders for You as long as the Sun shines!

Nothing can be simpler than cooking with ecoo

ecoo sets up in less than 20 seconds & once you orient it towards Sun,
You need not monitor again.

No need to stir the food, adjust the orientation or worry about
food getting overcooked.
Because ecoo has been designed to cook for You with minimum attention.

The reflector design allows ecoo to capture Sunrays for around 3 hours
and the proprietary heat accumulator ensures that the temperature never exceeds 120 deg C, thereby ensuring that the food never burns or gets overcooked. 

In fact, the food will stay warm for 3 hours even after it has been cooked
so you can Stroll in the Park, meet Friends, play Tennis and come back home to be greeted with Hot & Fresh food.

Isn't that Exciting?

Prepare Hot & Refreshing Soup on top of Snowy Mountains
or relish healthiest breakfast right after Swimming in the Sea

Carry Your ecoo anywhere & Cook on the Go!

You can also pasteurize water to make it safe for drinking, thereby making ecoo a valuable asset in all your travels.

You can also use it to keep your food warm or dehydrate some fruits & vegetables to increase their shelf life. 

Surprise Yourself by Cooking Vivid recipes with ecoo 
Boil without Water - eggs, green vegetables, sweet corn, potatoes, tomatoes 
Bake without Fire - Cakes, Breads, Cookies, Dhoklas
Roast without stirring - Nuts, Flour, Grains, Rava 
Cook Oil Free Poha, Upma, Sabudana Khichadi, Pulao
Serve Soup, Green Tea, Noodles, Pasta in Sun Rich Flavors
And anything that can be done in slow heat & low temperatures.


Experience the Power of Simplicity when a Child gets his hands on ecoo and begins imagining an entirely different world
ecoo's extreme simplicity fosters creativity, challenges Intellect & builds Scientific Temper by inviting the Child to first Play with it (Explore),
understand the fundamentals by cooking variety of recipes
at different time & day (Experience),
document the results & then share the learning with others (Express)
It also invites the child to find other uses of ecoo and then kindle their imagination in simplifying other technologies & building better products for a Happier, Healthier & All Inclusive World.

Nothing boosts the confidence more than cooking your own food Independently!
There is something Magical in seeing someone cook for the first time.
And if it's being done without gas or electricity, no words can describe it.
The Joy on the faces of children when they first cook with Sun is unparalleled and so contagious is their zeal to share the experience with friends, family & everyone that you'll be mesmerized at the potential & possibilities of this simple Solar Toy. There can't be a better Birthday Gift than a perfect Sun Baked Cake topped with lots of Love, Care & Blessings 

Bake surprisingly soft cakes, fluffy breads & crunchy cookies with seductive aroma & tempting flavors and become the face of any celebration you plan to join.

Solar cooked food is Fundamentally Nutritious, Naturally Flavorful  & Heavenly Aromatic

Nutrient retention is inversely proportional to cooking temperature 
and hence, higher the temperature faster is the cooking process, 
but most of the nutrients are destroyed.

Lower the temperature, slower is the cooking process
but higher are the Nutrients retained.

The maximum temperature in ecoo never exceeds 120 deg C (250 deg F)
and hence almost all of the nutrients are retained.

So, in a world already filled with toxic chemicals & adulteration,
isn't it vital to squeeze every bit of essential nutrients present in our food

How about growing our next gen as the Solar Generation
with the very first bite served to the baby being cooked by the Sun!


3.5 Million people die every year from Indoor Cooking Smoke - World Health Organization (WHO)

Collecting firewood & then using it to cook food is one of the most neglected yet hazardous reason affecting Human health & basic lifestyle growth. 

WHO states that the smoke resulting from burning wood in kitchen is equal to consuming 20 cigarettes per day, thereby severely affecting lungs & eyes.


The Health & Economic impact is far severe than the Environmental impact and Solar Cookers can play a vital role in reducing if not totally eliminate the same

____________________________________________________________

Technical Details
____________________________________________________________

Raw Materials


We've chosen the most modern materials for making ecoo. The weatherproof world class materials ensure that ecoo will last for years with no maintenance other than cleaning off the dust on its reflector!


Cooking time for some common recipes

Cooking time is actually a factor of Solar intensity (which in turn is dependent on time of day and day of the year), type & quantity of food and amount of water (if required)

 

Every curve and every crease in ecoo has been designed
to invite you in playing with it. 
After all Playfulness is Mindfulness & Mindfulness is the essence of Creativity!

So let us now begin our expedition to climb that mountain of impossibility - celebrating World's Largest Solar Festival with 100,000+ individuals from across the world, empower the minds of millions with happy possibilities 
and in effect surpass the Guinness World Record.

But first, lets explore the base camp.



SuryaKumbh - a Sanskrit word literally meaning
'a festive gathering celebrating the power of the Sun'
It obviously is the name of the Solar Festival we've been hosting for past 4 years.



It all started in 2012 with 42 school children, when in a span of two days they absorbed the art & science of harnessing solar energy through different routes and then put it to use by crafting their very own solar cookers. 
Each one of them cooked different recipe
to showcase the potential & possibilities of Solar energy.

Chocolate & Vanilla Cake from the very first SuryaKumbh

While the children began with lots of skepticism (touching the utensil every now & then to see if at least it's getting hot enough...forget cooking), eventually when the time arrived to open the cooking vessels, their eyes lit up with Joy
and faces glittered with blissful happiness.

But more than the Children, it was the proud & excitement of
Parents, Teachers & the Principal that made us realize that
the experience is Powerful & needs to be shared with everyone possible.

And thus began the Journey of creating World's Largest Solar Festival,
whose essence is nicely captured in this 2 minute photo story.



Over the years we learned from the participants, refined the design of the solar cooker being used and fine tuned the Festival to be replicated anywhere at any scale with equal Thrill, Joy & Satisfaction.


And we call it Festival, because it excites the participants


Brings everyone closer, irrespective of the age


Inspires them to Think Different


and propagates a social message



by Expanding their Vision



Hence, we could reach over 100,000 direct participants
from small tribal village of Jawahar to Ultra Modern City of Dubai


and in the process also create World Records.


Which is why we also got featured in many digital & print media

__________________________________________________

Featured in
__________________________________________________

___________________________________________________


But the real reward of making a World Record lies not in the record or publicity
but the way it beautifully transforms the outlook of Participants & Organizers
towards goals, team work, success and LIFE itself. 


Because once they become part of creating something big, rare
and beyond social set standards, it's difficult to ever think small again.

Imagine if millions of children can live through such experience of breaking existing realities, would anything stop them from dreaming the impossible? 

It'd be lot like planting Wings to their Imagination

And that's the exact possibility that excites & inspires us to go beyond.


So, WHAT exactly is this beyond the World Records thing?

Well when we started with SuryaKumbh, the Guinness World Record for Largest Solar Oven Cooking Class was 250 participants.

We attempted to break it with 2250 participants in 2013 and eventually bettered it incrementally with 3639 in 2014 & with 4780 in 2016.

Now, the thing we realized is the bigger the festival & more the people associated with it, higher is the learning, sense of fulfillment and the overall impact.
And we think that is true with every Festival.

So, instead of continuing with focusing on a single venue festivals with incremental impact, we posed ourselves with a crazy idea of doing it with 100,000 participants across the globe, but on the same day.

Never before has a "technical" festival been held at such a scale, forget about registering as World Record and that is really motivating.

In fact the very idea of visualizing 100,000 enthusiasts doing something together is heart stopping and brings lot of excitement with fear of how it can be done.

But of course it can. And we have been planning this for a year now.

So, here is HOW we intend to do it.

  • Reach passionate & fun loving individuals to enroll as participants at special price through Indiegogo. 
  • Simultaneously run an offline campaign with our partner NGOs to reach tribal children and generate funds for them
  • This help us build that initial momentum & funds required for tooling & commencing production.
  • The first lot ships in late August
  • The balance ships in September
  • We celebrate the festival in Mid October

Timeline


About Us


Simplified Technologies for Life is a social enterprise, established with a purpose of designing products that will have Meaningful Impact on the World we live in and also Inspire Young minds to create a Happier Future for all
story_txt:
This is the story of our DreamA dream we've been patiently working for last 7 Yearsand with your support it can soon come true

So, allow us to take You through this Exciting Journey of scaling the impossible mountain far beyond the World Record, with 100,000 adventurers Solar Cooking on the same dayAnd how it will impact all of us.Here we Go
Solar Cooking is the best way there is to Cook FoodNothing summarizes this more beautifully than the below verses "Influenced are our Minds by the Food we eat & influenced is the Food by the Method we cook it"                                   "food cooked in the Vicinity of Sun & Air                                   is the gateway to stay youthful, joyful & healthier"                                                                           Charak Samhita, Ayurveda

World's only Solar Cooker that sits on Your Palmtop

and assembles in less than 20 seconds!




Small yet Powerful, Simple yet Elegant & Compact yet DurableCarry it in your Office, Gym, Family Outing, Swimming Pool, wherever You Goecoo will cook wonders for You as long as the Sun shines!


Nothing can be simpler than cooking with ecoo
ecoo sets up in less than 20 seconds & once you orient it towards Sun, You need not monitor again.
No need to stir the food, adjust the orientation or worry about food getting overcooked. Because ecoo has been designed to cook for You with minimum attention.
The reflector design allows ecoo to capture Sunrays for around 3 hours and the proprietary heat accumulator ensures that the temperature never exceeds 120 deg C, thereby ensuring that the food never burns or gets overcooked. 
In fact, the food will stay warm for 3 hours even after it has been cookedso you can Stroll in the Park, meet Friends, play Tennis and come back home to be greeted with Hot & Fresh food.
Isn't that Exciting?

Prepare Hot & Refreshing Soup on top of Snowy Mountainsor relish healthiest breakfast right after Swimming in the Sea
Carry Your ecoo anywhere & Cook on the Go!
You can also pasteurize water to make it safe for drinking, thereby making ecoo a valuable asset in all your travels.
You can also use it to keep your food warm or dehydrate some fruits & vegetables to increase their shelf life. 



Surprise Yourself by Cooking Vivid recipes with ecoo 

Boil without Water - eggs, green vegetables, sweet corn, potatoes, tomatoes 

Bake without Fire - Cakes, Breads, Cookies, Dhoklas


Roast without stirring - Nuts, Flour, Grains, Rava 

Cook Oil Free Poha, Upma, Sabudana Khichadi, Pulao
Serve Soup, Green Tea, Noodles, Pasta in Sun Rich Flavors

And anything that can be done in slow heat & low temperatures.





Experience the Power of Simplicity when a Child gets his hands on ecoo and begins imagining an entirely different world

ecoo's extreme simplicity fosters creativity, challenges Intellect & builds Scientific Temper by inviting the Child to first Play with it (Explore), understand the fundamentals by cooking variety of recipes at different time & day (Experience), document the results & then share the learning with others (Express)
It also invites the child to find other uses of ecoo and then kindle their imagination in simplifying other technologies & building better products for a Happier, Healthier & All Inclusive World.



Nothing boosts the confidence more than cooking your own food Independently!
There is something Magical in seeing someone cook for the first time. And if it's being done without gas or electricity, no words can describe it.
The Joy on the faces of children when they first cook with Sun is unparalleled and so contagious is their zeal to share the experience with friends, family & everyone that you'll be mesmerized at the potential & possibilities of this simple Solar Toy. There can't be a better Birthday Gift than a perfect Sun Baked Cake topped with lots of Love, Care & Blessings 


Bake surprisingly soft cakes, fluffy breads & crunchy cookies with seductive aroma & tempting flavors and become the face of any celebration you plan to join.


Solar cooked food is Fundamentally Nutritious, Naturally Flavorful  & Heavenly Aromatic
Nutrient retention is inversely proportional to cooking temperature and hence, higher the temperature faster is the cooking process, but most of the nutrients are destroyed.
Lower the temperature, slower is the cooking process but higher are the Nutrients retained.
The maximum temperature in ecoo never exceeds 120 deg C (250 deg F) and hence almost all of the nutrients are retained.
So, in a world already filled with toxic chemicals & adulteration, isn't it vital to squeeze every bit of essential nutrients present in our food
How about growing our next gen as the Solar Generation with the very first bite served to the baby being cooked by the Sun!





3.5 Million people die every year from Indoor Cooking Smoke - World Health Organization (WHO)
Collecting firewood & then using it to cook food is one of the most neglected yet hazardous reason affecting Human health & basic lifestyle growth. 
WHO states that the smoke resulting from burning wood in kitchen is equal to consuming 20 cigarettes per day, thereby severely affecting lungs & eyes.


The Health & Economic impact is far severe than the Environmental impact and Solar Cookers can play a vital role in reducing if not totally eliminate the same
____________________________________________________________
Technical Details____________________________________________________________

We've chosen the most modern materials for making ecoo. The weatherproof world class materials ensure that ecoo will last for years with no maintenance other than cleaning off the dust on its reflector!

Cooking time for some common recipes

Cooking time is actually a factor of Solar intensity (which in turn is dependent on time of day and day of the year), type & quantity of food and amount of water (if required)

story:
(Versión en Español Abajo)  

  What is Geoo?

Forget about losing anything. Forget about wasting your valuable time trying to find that one thing you need. Just tag it with Geoo, and you´re ready to go. We present Geoo, the Bluetooth and GPS tracker for all your belongings.

Our main objective with Geoo is to provide a fast and precise location of what you most care about, so you don´t have to worry a second about losing it. We offer a wide variety of possibilities, because Geoo is designed to fit everyone and everything. Geoo is very easy to use, adapting itself to everybody´s needs perfectly. Put a Geoo on what you want to keep track of, open the app on your smartphone or other device with internet connection and localize it in a simple map or radar. As easy as it sounds, that’s all you have to do.


The options are endless: track your wallet, bag, car or even your pet. Anything you want to keep, just add a Geoo to it.

Geoo can be applied to many professional appliances, many of which would cause a great impact due to its low-cost and high efficiency in tracking by GPS. Many companies spend vasts amounts of money only to track down their business, and it is a very useful tool for many different tasks. There are currently two models; Geoo Home, with a 15.000 square meter range, and Geoo Pro, covering your whole country.

Our latest goal will be: Geoo Ultimate, with the same characteristics of the Pro version, but with a world-wide range.

   The Initiative

The Arkyne Tech group is presenting a new innovative investment challenge to develop Geoo. These personal geo-localizers are not only small and efficient, they are also flexible stickers and reach all kinds of distances. Using GPS and bluetooth technologies, every geoo device is able to send its precise position directly to your smartphone and sketch it on a real time map and radar.Our development team has been working on the idea during the last 6 months until we finally acomplished the final designs. Right now, Geoo is more than an idea. However, in order to reach the next step of our plan and be able to finish its entire development we need your help.  One of our main goals is to achieve the most affordable and cheapest price in the market while keeping the highest possible quality. This needs a high starting budget to adquire the most efficient manufacturing and distribution processes. That's why we decided to open this crowdfunding campaign, we appreciate all the support we are receiving and we thank every single person who trusted our project.


 How it Works

Geoo uses a simple Bluetooth connection for short distances, and GPS for longer ones. We have optimized the technology taking part in Geoo, so we are sure about providing the best connection as possible with the user. We are launching 2 different models of Geoo, based on your basic needs. Firstly, Geoo Home, thought for a smaller radius of use, such as a house or a store. Geoo Home is built with a Bluetooth based communication system, easily connectable with many compatible devices. Open the app and Geoo Home will show on a radar where it´s located precisely.

But if Geoo Home doesn´t provide the enough range of use you were looking for, worry no more, because we also present Geoo Pro, the advanced version of our first product. With Geoo Pro you can forget about distance barriers, forget about the optimal connection range. We provide coverage for your whole country´s territory. Whether you go on a trip and want to protect your car or luggage, or if you want to make sure your pet or your most vulnerable family members are well protected, Geoo Pro offers more than a wide enough radius for you to be able to track them with your devices. The gps localizer is easily tracked down and displayed on a detailed map so you can be sure that you recover whatever you are looking for.

 

   Why Geoo?

We think it would be great to always have localized all our valuable items and possesions. However, we tend to lose many things around our house, car, workplace, etc. So, why not place a Geoo on everything you really need in your daily life and easily find it with a simple search? Why would you waste time looking for anything when you could use Geoo and find it in seconds?

Comparing Geoo with our closest competitor in crowdfunding...

 

   Our Hardware

We will be using a battery that will last over 12 months, providing for a more than enough life cycle for your Geoo. Furthermore, our batteries can be recharged if needed by an induction system. The Bluetooth has a very low power consumption rate,  however it is not a condition for it to reduce its effectivity. As well, optimizing performance is key for all the new technology for it to work at its best, without reducing the user experience. We provide an update rate of your location optimized for the product we are selling. Our refresh rate is set to 1 minute for the Home version, and the amazing 0.5s for the Pro edition, more than an enough accurate time interval for you to localize and track down your Geoo, and with it, your belongings.

The working radius of Geoo Home is also revolutionary. The area fully covered by Geoo Home is of 15000m², sufficient for any Home user to find their device. And you might be wondering, what will happen if I leave this area? Very interesting question with a very easy solution. A notification alert will immediately display on your smartphone, warning you about the distance issue. From there on, you can start the localizing process of your Geoo, or maybe use another interesting feature we have implemented. You can use Geoo Home as a map pin which will save for you to find it later on. For example, leave a Geoo Home in your car when you are going to work, save its location in the map, and you will be able to find it later on when you return.


 Geoo Boundaries

Secure your things with Geoo-Boundaries, set a range for your Geoo device. Once reached this distance, a notification will alert you that the Geoo has exceeded its programed limit. It’s not only easy to use but vital for keeping your things saved when you don’t have time to look after them.



   Geoo Fits Anywhere

Geoo is also very compact. Size has been key for this project. We have taken our designs to the limit, allowing enough space for all the components to fit adequately inside, but without forgetting the need for it to be as slim and tight as it could possibly be. This allows the user to hide a Geoo nearly anywhere without using up much space.

 Geoo is Inexpensive

Prize is also one of our advantages against all the other trackers out on sale. All the other devices ask for a monthly cost for the tracking system to fully function, but we don´t. Our users don´t have to pay for more than the device itself. Other companies charge from $15 to as high as $40 every month, multiplying the tracker's cost every year for it to deliver the same service.


 Geoo is secure, and easy to use.

Many are the ways of tracking down a device, but we thought that the easiest and most user-friendly would have to be an app for your smartphone. Find it in your smartphone´s app store and synchronize your Geoo with your phone by inserting its unique ID code. Nothing else is required. You can add several Geoos to the same phone, easily switching from one to another in a very intuitive menu. By default, your Geoos will have stock names. Simply edit them and name them whatever you like, for example keys, bag or wallet. And you are all done and ready to start finding!


   Look who is involved in Geoo.



Some quotes and opinions about Geoo:
“Easy-to-use technology at a very low price, just what everybody looks for.”
“It´s hard to find an easier to use device which works so well.”
“A friend always forgets where he leaves his car keys. Geoo is just the best gift I could possibly get him”

 Our Team

Pablo M. Vidarte Gordillo

CEO of Arkyne Technologies

Technical developer and designer of Geoo. Experienced inventor; areas of work are engineering, programming and electronics. Has created several technology based companies.


Javier Rodríguez Macías

COO of Arkyne Technologies

Business developer of Geoo. Native investigator with high business experience. Areas of work include nanotechnology, chemistry and biology.


Rafael Rebollo Cacín

CDO of Arkyne Technologies

Detail experience and advanced marketing abilities. Areas of work are engineering, marketing and media.


 FAQs

Why Indiegogo? Why crowdfunding?

We are a still growing technology based company, and crowdfunding offers the possibility to almost everyone to be recognized as well as valuing their work and ideas. This way, Indiegogo seems to be the perfect spot for us to show our ideas to the world.

Is Geoo protected in any way?

Of course! We have designed Geoo for it to be as durable as it can possibly be. This way, Geoo is waterproof and dust resistant, to make sure that it will continue functioning correctly even if it gets wet or dirty. Our International Protection Marking is set to IP-65, resisting any type of solid particle and water jets.


When do we start shipping?

Once our campaigns have ended successfully and reached our set goals, we will start with our mass production phase, and around 2 to 3 months later, we will start delivering all Geoo devices. 

How much is the shipping for the rewards?

Every reward which includes the delivery of Geoo´s have been assigned a certain shipping cost. To fully acknowledge the total cost of each reward, we recommend reading all the information posted about them specifically.


What will be the price for the smartphone app?

It´s totally free! Our goal is to simplify as much as possible the process of tracking your Geoo, so an easy-to-install app from your phone´s operating system´s store


Does Geoo need a maintenance of some kind?

Geoo is fully functional whether you clean it or not. No taking care is needed on Geoo, just place it wherever you think it is needed, and enjoy the precise tracking system.


Will Geoo be available in my country?

Yes, we plan on maintaining a worldwide shipping system to provide everyone with their own Geoo.


What devices can I use to find my Geoos?

Any device which is Bluetooth compatible is able to track down the Geoo Home. We think it was our best shot at finding a communication channel that most of the users are familiar with and can have an easy access to. As well, Internet based connection can be made with basically any device, narrowing down even more the user´s requirements to fully use the Geoo´s tracking experience.


Could anyone track my personal Geoo?

Our design is made for each Geoo to have a unique identification code that will only be given to the tracker’s owner. Therefore, nobody will know your Geoo´s ID code and it will be totally confidential. Furthermore, our faultless system is hack-proof by implementing a 32-bit encryption for the code.


Why do we only offer Geoo Home in our perks?

So far, Geoo Home is our big goal to accomplish. This way, we thought about launching the basic model of Geoo first, and if everything continues going as planned, we intend on launching our advanced version of Geoo, the Pro version. Speaking about the Geoo Pro, we have included some discount codes in our reward system for some specific donations, mainly because they will be a great help for our development and feel the need to compensate in some way our trustful investors. 


Will Geoo be flexible?

Our latest designs have proved that it would be much more expensive and harder to obtain a flexibility state in our Geoos. However, we thought that adding the water and dust resistance was prior to flexibility and so we did.


Is my Geoo ID code unique?

Of course it is! Every Geoo device has its own, unique ID code. This way no synchronization issues can occur and you can fell totally safe when using your Geoo, nobody else can track it down.


Does Geoo apply a monthly cost for its use?

No. Geoo has been designed to be used without having to pay anything else rather than the device itself. We consider it was key for the costs to cause the least impact on the user as possible.


Is Geoo our only project?

Certainly not. We have been simultaneously developing Geoo but also starting to think, plan and design many more appealing projects which we will surely end up displaying and explaining. For further information, you can visit our site: www.arkynetech.com


Where is the company located?

Arkyne Techonologies was founded and is still located in Barcelona, Spain.


Refunds' Policy:

Arkyne Technologies does not assume any responsibility of the perks' delivery in case we don't reach our economical goal; however, we will send the money back to every person who bought a perk and asks for it to be returned (in a maximum time limit of 1 month after the closing of this campaign) A 9% will be subtracted from the total refund due to Indiegogo's taxes and management expenses. Refunds may delay from 30 to 40 days time.



.   .   .


 (Versión en Español) 

  ¿Qué es Geoo?

Olvídate de perder nada nunca más. No pierdas tu valioso tiempo intentando buscar aquello que necesitas. Tan solo tienes que pegar Geoo y listo. Presentamos Geoo, el rastreador Bluetooth y GPS para que no vuelvas a perder nada de vista.

Nuestro objetivo principal con Geoo es dar una localización rápida y precisa de aquello que más te importa, para que así no te tengas que preocupar ni un segundo si lo pierdes. Ofrecemos una amplia variedad de posibilidades, ya que Geoo está diseñado para adaptarse a todos y a todo. Te sorprenderás con la facilidad que se utiliza Geoo. Pon un Geoo en lo que quieras tener localizado, abre la app en tu móvil u otro dispositivo que tenga conexión a internet y localízalo sencillamente en un mapa o radar. Es tan fácil como parece, no tienes que hacer nada más.

Las opciones son interminables: rastrea tu cartera, la mochila, el coche o incluso tu mascota. Cualquier cosa que quieras mantener cerca basta con que tenga un Geoo adherido.

Geoo también tiene incontables aplicaciones profesionales, las cuales causarían un gran impacto debido a su bajo coste y su alta precisión en el rastreo GPS. Son muchas las empresas que gastan una importante suma de dinero en tener localizadas sus operaciones, y Geoo es una herramienta muy útil para poder llevar a cabo infinidad de tareas diferentes, su uso es ideal tanto para pequeñas como grandes empresas.

Nuestro próximo objetivo será: Geoo Ultimate, con las mismas características que Geoo Pro, pero con alcance mundial.


  Nuestra iniciativa

El grupo Arkyne Tech presenta un nuevo reto de inversión para desarrollar Geoo. Estos geolocalizadores no son únicamente compactos y eficientes, sino que también son flexibles y funcionales a distancias superiores. Haciendo uso de las tecnologías Bluetooth y GPS, cada dispositivo Geoo puede enviar su posición con precisión directamente a tu smartphone y mostrarlo a tiempo real en un mapa o radar. Nuestro equipo de desarrollo ha estado trabajando en esta idea durante los últimos 6 meses hasta que finalmente hemos conseguido finalizar nuestros diseños. Actualmente, Geoo es más que una idea. Sin embargo, para poder alcanzar nuestra siguiente fase y poder terminar por completo el desarrollo necesitamos de tu ayuda. Uno de nuestros principales objetivos es mantener nuestro precio lo más bajo posible, sin que ellos afecte a un servicio de máxima calidad. Esto necesita de una inversión inicial más elevada, para poder asegurar mayor eficiencia en los procesos de producción y distribución. Por ello hemos elegido abrir esta campaña de crowdfunding, agradecemos todo el apoyo que estamos recibiendo y a todos los que confiaron en nuestro proyecto.


  ¿Cómo funciona?

Geoo usa una conexión Bluetooth para distancias cortas, y GPS para distancias mayores. Hemos optimizado la tecnología desarrollando Geoo, por ello, estamos seguros de que ofrecemos la mejor conexión posible con el usuario. Contamos con dos modelos de Geoo basados en tus necesidades. En primer lugar, Geoo Home, pensado para un rango de uso doméstico o para tu almacén o tienda. Geoo Home tiene incorporado un sistema de conexión Bluetooth, fácilmente enlazable con multitud de dispositivos disponibles. Abre la app y Geoo Home mostrará en un radar su ubicación exacta.

Pero si Geoo Home no te proporciona un radio de uso suficiente, no te preocupes, porque te presentamos Geoo Pro, la versión avanzada de nuestro primer producto. Con Geoo Pro te puedes olvidar de las distancias límite y el radio de conexión óptimo, ya que ofrece cobertura en todo el territorio nacional de tu país. Si te vas de excursión y quieres tener controlado tu coche o equipaje, o si te quieres asegurar de que tu mascota o algún familiar estén localizados, Geoo Pro tiene un radio de uso más que suficiente para que seas capaz de saber dónde se encuentran. El localizador GPS es fácilmente rastreado y se presenta en un mapa detallado para que encuentres lo que buscas con total seguridad.

¿Por qué Geoo?

Sería genial tener siempre localizados todos nuestros objetos importantes y pertenencias personales. Sin embargo, tendemos a perder muchas cosas por casa, en el coche o en el trabajo. Así pues, ¿por qué no ponemos un Geoo a todo lo que utilizamos en nuestro día a día y poder localizarlo con una simple búsqueda? ¿Para qué molestarse en perder tiempo buscando algo cuando podrías encontrarlo con Geoo en unos segundos?

Comparando Geoo con nuestro competidor más próximo en crowdfunding...


Nuestro hardware

La batería que usaremos tiene una duración estimada de más de 12 meses, proporcionando así una vida útil más que suficiente para tu Geoo. Además, nuestras baterías son recargables mediante inducción. La tecnología Bluetooth usada tiene un consumo muy reducido, pero ello no significa que disminuya su efectividad. La optimización del sistema es clave para que todos los nuevos productos tecnológicos funcionen al máximo rendimiento, sin entorpecer la experiencia hacia el usuario. Nosotros proporcionamos una frecuencia de refresco de la ubicación de 1 minuto para el Geoo Home, y de unos increíbles 0.5 segundos para la versión Pro, más que suficiente para que el cliente pueda localizar su Geoo, y con él, sus bienes.


El radio de funcionamiento de Geoo Home es totalmente revolucionario. Geoo Home puede cubrir un área total de 15000 m². Y te puedes estar preguntando, ¿qué ocurre si me alejo de esta zona? Una muy buena pregunta que tiene una muy fácil respuesta. Una notificación alertará inmediatamente al usuario en su smartphone, avisándole de la situación. Desde ahí el usuario decide cómo proceder, si iniciar la búsqueda del Geoo, o quizás hacer uso de una nueva característica implementada en los Geoo. Puedes usar los Geoo Home como marcador en tu mapa que se guardará para que lo puedas encontrar más tarde. Por ejemplo. Deja tu Geoo Home en el coche cuando vayas a trabajar y marca su localización en el mapa, para que cuando vuelvas más tarde al coche, lo tengas localizado en tu mapa personal.


 Geoo Boundaries

Asegura todas tus pertenencias con Geoo-Boundaries fijando un rango para tu dispositivo Geoo. Una vez alcanzada esta distancia, una notificación te avisará de que tu Geoo ha excedido su límite programado. No sólo es fácil de usar, sino que también vital para mantener controladas tus pertenencias cuando no tienes tiempo para buscarlas.


 Geoo se adapta a ti

Geoo tiene un diseño compacto. Hemos llevado al límite nuestros diseños para que todos los componentes pudieran entrar con suficiente espacio para su correcto funcionamiento, pero sin olvidarnos de que pueda ocupar el menor espacio posible y así ocultarse en tu bolso o cartera.


 Geoo es económico

El precio también es uno de nuestros puntos fuertes con respecto a la competencia del sector. Todas las demás compañías ofrecen su servicio mediante pagos mensuales. Sin embargo, nuestros usuario sólo deben preocuparse del precio del Geoo en sí, ya que no hay pago mensual por la conexión. Como ejemplo, algunas marcas cobran desde $15 hasta incluso llegar a los $40 mensuales, multiplicando por tanto el precio real del dispositivo, y por tanto el total al cabo del año por el mismo servicio.


 Geoo es seguro, y fácil de usar

Muchas son las formas de conectarse con el dispositivo para poder localizarlo. Sin embargo, hemos pensado que la forma más cómoda para todos los usuarios es mediante aplicaciones de smartphone. Simplemente busca nuestra aplicación dedicada a Geoo y sincronízalo introduciendo el código identificativo de tu Geoo. Así de sencillo y rápido. También puedes añadir más de un Geoo al mismo terminal, seleccionando entre uno y otro con un intuitivo menú de selección. Para simplificar la selección, modifica el nombre del Geoo que trae por defecto, y llamalo cualquier cosa, por ejemplo, llaves o mochila. ¡Todo listo para empezar a buscar tus Geoos!


 Involucrados en Geoo


Algunas citas y opiniones sobre Geoo:
“Tecnología fácil de usar a un precio muy bajo, todo lo que uno busca.”
“Es difícil encontrar un dispositivo que sea tan fácil de usar y trabaje tan bien.”
“Un amigo siempre olvida dónde deja las llaves de su coche. Geoo es el mejor regalo que le puedo hacer.”


 Nuestro Equipo





 FAQs

¿Por qué Indiegogo? ¿Por qué crowdfunding?

Somos una empresa joven y en crecimiento basados en el diseño y desarrollo de tecnología, y el crowdfunding nos ofrece rápidamente la posibilidad de ser conocidos y que todos puedan valorar nuestro trabajo e ideas. De esta forma, Indiegogo parece el portal de crowdfunding idóneo para mostrar nuestro trabajo al resto del mundo.

¿Con qué protecciones cuenta Geoo?

Hemos diseñado Geoo de forma que sea lo más duradero posible. Para ello, Geoo es resistente al agua y polvo, para asegurarnos de que continue funcionando correctamente aun si se moja o ensucia. Nuestro Grado de Proteccion IP es de IP-65, resistiendo chorros de agua y partículas sólidas de cualquier tipo.

¿Cuándo comenzarán los envíos de Geoo?

Una vez hayan finalizado nuestras campañas con éxito y se hayan cumplido nuestros objetivos, comenzaremos la producción en masa, para poder empezar a enviar los Geoo entre 2 y 3 meses después. 

¿Cuál es el coste de envío en las recompensas?

Cada recompensa que tiene asignada la entrega de un Geoo tiene cierto coste de envío. Para poder conocer al detalle dichos costes, recomendamos consultar la información específica de cada recompensa.

¿Qué precio tendrá la aplicación de Geoo para móvil?

¡Ninguno, es gratis! Nuestro objetivo es simplificar al máximo el hecho de encontrar nuestro Geoo, y por tanto hemos decidido crear una sencilla aplicación descargable desde los catálogos de aplicaciones de los distintos sistemas operativos móviles.

¿Geoo necesita algñun tipo de mantenimiento?

Para nada. Geoo funciona perfectamente, sin importar si está sucio o no. Olvida tener que limpiar tu Geoo, simplemente colocalo donde quieras y disfruta encontrando todo aquello que habías perdido.

¿Geoo estará disponible en mi país?

Seas de donde seas, podrás hacerte con tu Geoo. La distribución será global, por lo que tu país también está incluido.

¿Qué dispositivos puedo usar para localizar mi Geoo?

Cualquier dispositivo con tecnología Bluetooth es válido para encontrar tu Geoo. Pensamos que sería una gran ventaja utilizar una tecnología que sea familiar para el mayor número de personas posibles y sea fácil de usar. También, cualquier tipo de conexión a Internet permitiría la conexión, reduciendo aún más los requisitios para los usuarios y facilitando su uso.

¿Quién puede ver dónde está mi Geoo?

Hemos diseñado Geoo de forma que cada uno tenga un código único e irremplazable que sólo el usuario conocerá. Por ello, nadie puede saber el código de identificación de tu Geoo y será totalmente privado. Además, nuestro sistema de seguridad genera los códigos de identificación como combinaciones de 32 bits encriptados, evitando así posibles pirateos.

¿Por qué sólo ofrecemos Geoo Home en nuestras recompensas?

De momento, Geoo Home es nuestro principal objetivo a cumplir. De este modo hemos pensado lanzar primero el modelo básico de los Geoos, y si todo se cumple y va como es esperado, tenemos intención de lanzar nuestro segundo producto, Geoo Pro. Hablando de la versión Pro, hemos incluido algunos códigos de descuento entre algunas de nuestras recompensas, principalmente porque son de gran ayuda para nuestro desarrollo de los productos, y queremos de alguna forma devolver el favor con nuestros inversores.

¿Geoo es flexible?

Nuestros últimos diseños han demostrado que sería mucho más costoso y complicado de obtener la capacidad flexible en los Geoos. Pensamos que sería de una mayor trascendencia aplicar la resistencia al agua y polvo que la flexiblidad del localizador en sí, y así hemos hecho.

¿Mi código de Geoo es único y confidencial?

¡Por supuesto! Cada Geoo tiene su propio código de identificación. De esta forma, no puede haber errores de sincronización y el usuario puede sentirse totalmente seguro usando su Geoo.

¿Geoo tiene algún coste mensual?

No. Geoo ha sido diseñado para operar sin necesidad de pagos adicionales por el servicio, más allá del precio del dispositivo. Hemos tenido constantemente presentes el objetivo de mantener los costes para el cliente los menores posibles.

¿Geoo es nuestro único proyecto?

Para nada. Durante el desarrollo de Geoo hemos iniciado, planeado e incluso diseñado numerosos proyectos de los que estamos seguros sacaremos a la luz tarde o temprano. Para más información, consulta nuestra web: www.arkynetech.com

¿Dónde está localizada la empresa?

Arkyne Technologies fue fundada y permanece ubicada en Barcelona, España.


Política de Devoluciones:

Arkyne Technologies no asume ninguna responsabilidad del envío de las recompensas en caso de no llegar a nuestro objetivo económico; sin embargo, enviaremos el dinero de vuelta a aquellos que lo pidan (en un plazo máximo de 1 mes tras el cierre de esta campaña) y que a su vez compraron una recompensa. Se restará un 9% de las devolución total debido a comisiones de Indiegogo y gastos de gestión. Las devoluciones pueden tardar entre 30 y 40 días en realizarse.

story_txt:
(Versión en Español Abajo)  
  What is Geoo?
Forget about losing anything. Forget about wasting your valuable time trying to find that one thing you need. Just tag it with Geoo, and you´re ready to go. We present Geoo, the Bluetooth and GPS tracker for all your belongings.Our main objective with Geoo is to provide a fast and precise location of what you most care about, so you don´t have to worry a second about losing it. We offer a wide variety of possibilities, because Geoo is designed to fit everyone and everything. Geoo is very easy to use, adapting itself to everybody´s needs perfectly. Put a Geoo on what you want to keep track of, open the app on your smartphone or other device with internet connection and localize it in a simple map or radar. As easy as it sounds, that’s all you have to do.The options are endless: track your wallet, bag, car or even your pet. Anything you want to keep, just add a Geoo to it.Geoo can be applied to many professional appliances, many of which would cause a great impact due to its low-cost and high efficiency in tracking by GPS. Many companies spend vasts amounts of money only to track down their business, and it is a very useful tool for many different tasks. There are currently two models; Geoo Home, with a 15.000 square meter range, and Geoo Pro, covering your whole country.Our latest goal will be: Geoo Ultimate, with the same characteristics of the Pro version, but with a world-wide range.


   The Initiative
The Arkyne Tech group is presenting a new innovative investment challenge to develop Geoo. These personal geo-localizers are not only small and efficient, they are also flexible stickers and reach all kinds of distances. Using GPS and bluetooth technologies, every geoo device is able to send its precise position directly to your smartphone and sketch it on a real time map and radar.Our development team has been working on the idea during the last 6 months until we finally acomplished the final designs. Right now, Geoo is more than an idea. However, in order to reach the next step of our plan and be able to finish its entire development we need your help.  One of our main goals is to achieve the most affordable and cheapest price in the market while keeping the highest possible quality. This needs a high starting budget to adquire the most efficient manufacturing and distribution processes. That's why we decided to open this crowdfunding campaign, we appreciate all the support we are receiving and we thank every single person who trusted our project.




 How it Works
Geoo uses a simple Bluetooth connection for short distances, and GPS for longer ones. We have optimized the technology taking part in Geoo, so we are sure about providing the best connection as possible with the user. We are launching 2 different models of Geoo, based on your basic needs. Firstly, Geoo Home, thought for a smaller radius of use, such as a house or a store. Geoo Home is built with a Bluetooth based communication system, easily connectable with many compatible devices. Open the app and Geoo Home will show on a radar where it´s located precisely.




But if Geoo Home doesn´t provide the enough range of use you were looking for, worry no more, because we also present Geoo Pro, the advanced version of our first product. With Geoo Pro you can forget about distance barriers, forget about the optimal connection range. We provide coverage for your whole country´s territory. Whether you go on a trip and want to protect your car or luggage, or if you want to make sure your pet or your most vulnerable family members are well protected, Geoo Pro offers more than a wide enough radius for you to be able to track them with your devices. The gps localizer is easily tracked down and displayed on a detailed map so you can be sure that you recover whatever you are looking for.
    Why Geoo?
We think it would be great to always have localized all our valuable items and possesions. However, we tend to lose many things around our house, car, workplace, etc. So, why not place a Geoo on everything you really need in your daily life and easily find it with a simple search? Why would you waste time looking for anything when you could use Geoo and find it in seconds?


Comparing Geoo with our closest competitor in crowdfunding...




 
   Our Hardware
We will be using a battery that will last over 12 months, providing for a more than enough life cycle for your Geoo. Furthermore, our batteries can be recharged if needed by an induction system. The Bluetooth has a very low power consumption rate,  however it is not a condition for it to reduce its effectivity. As well, optimizing performance is key for all the new technology for it to work at its best, without reducing the user experience. We provide an update rate of your location optimized for the product we are selling. Our refresh rate is set to 1 minute for the Home version, and the amazing 0.5s for the Pro edition, more than an enough accurate time interval for you to localize and track down your Geoo, and with it, your belongings.





The working radius of Geoo Home is also revolutionary. The area fully covered by Geoo Home is of 15000m², sufficient for any Home user to find their device. And you might be wondering, what will happen if I leave this area? Very interesting question with a very easy solution. A notification alert will immediately display on your smartphone, warning you about the distance issue. From there on, you can start the localizing process of your Geoo, or maybe use another interesting feature we have implemented. You can use Geoo Home as a map pin which will save for you to find it later on. For example, leave a Geoo Home in your car when you are going to work, save its location in the map, and you will be able to find it later on when you return.



 Geoo Boundaries
Secure your things with Geoo-Boundaries, set a range for your Geoo device. Once reached this distance, a notification will alert you that the Geoo has exceeded its programed limit. It’s not only easy to use but vital for keeping your things saved when you don’t have time to look after them.






   Geoo Fits Anywhere
Geoo is also very compact. Size has been key for this project. We have taken our designs to the limit, allowing enough space for all the components to fit adequately inside, but without forgetting the need for it to be as slim and tight as it could possibly be. This allows the user to hide a Geoo nearly anywhere without using up much space.



 Geoo is Inexpensive

Prize is also one of our advantages against all the other trackers out on sale. All the other devices ask for a monthly cost for the tracking system to fully function, but we don´t. Our users don´t have to pay for more than the device itself. Other companies charge from $15 to as high as $40 every month, multiplying the tracker's cost every year for it to deliver the same service.






 Geoo is secure, and easy to use.

Many are the ways of tracking down a device, but we thought that the easiest and most user-friendly would have to be an app for your smartphone. Find it in your smartphone´s app store and synchronize your Geoo with your phone by inserting its unique ID code. Nothing else is required. You can add several Geoos to the same phone, easily switching from one to another in a very intuitive menu. By default, your Geoos will have stock names. Simply edit them and name them whatever you like, for example keys, bag or wallet. And you are all done and ready to start finding!

   Look who is involved in Geoo.


 Some quotes and opinions about Geoo:
“Easy-to-use technology at a very low price, just what everybody looks for.”
“It´s hard to find an easier to use device which works so well.”
“A friend always forgets where he leaves his car keys. Geoo is just the best gift I could possibly get him”


 Our Team



Pablo M. Vidarte Gordillo
CEO of Arkyne Technologies
Technical developer and designer of Geoo. Experienced inventor; areas of work are engineering, programming and electronics. Has created several technology based companies.


Javier Rodríguez Macías
COO of Arkyne Technologies
Business developer of Geoo. Native investigator with high business experience. Areas of work include nanotechnology, chemistry and biology.


Rafael Rebollo Cacín
CDO of Arkyne Technologies
Detail experience and advanced marketing abilities. Areas of work are engineering, marketing and media.



 FAQs



Why Indiegogo? Why crowdfunding?
We are a still growing technology based company, and crowdfunding offers the possibility to almost everyone to be recognized as well as valuing their work and ideas. This way, Indiegogo seems to be the perfect spot for us to show our ideas to the world.
Is Geoo protected in any way?
Of course! We have designed Geoo for it to be as durable as it can possibly be. This way, Geoo is waterproof and dust resistant, to make sure that it will continue functioning correctly even if it gets wet or dirty. Our International Protection Marking is set to IP-65, resisting any type of solid particle and water jets. 
When do we start shipping?
Once our campaigns have ended successfully and reached our set goals, we will start with our mass production phase, and around 2 to 3 months later, we will start delivering all Geoo devices. 
How much is the shipping for the rewards?
Every reward which includes the delivery of Geoo´s have been assigned a certain shipping cost. To fully acknowledge the total cost of each reward, we recommend reading all the information posted about them specifically.
What will be the price for the smartphone app?
 It´s totally free! Our goal is to simplify as much as possible the process of tracking your Geoo, so an easy-to-install app from your phone´s operating system´s store
Does Geoo need a maintenance of some kind?
Geoo is fully functional whether you clean it or not. No taking care is needed on Geoo, just place it wherever you think it is needed, and enjoy the precise tracking system.
Will Geoo be available in my country?
Yes, we plan on maintaining a worldwide shipping system to provide everyone with their own Geoo.
What devices can I use to find my Geoos?
Any device which is Bluetooth compatible is able to track down the Geoo Home. We think it was our best shot at finding a communication channel that most of the users are familiar with and can have an easy access to. As well, Internet based connection can be made with basically any device, narrowing down even more the user´s requirements to fully use the Geoo´s tracking experience. 
Could anyone track my personal Geoo?
Our design is made for each Geoo to have a unique identification code that will only be given to the tracker’s owner. Therefore, nobody will know your Geoo´s ID code and it will be totally confidential. Furthermore, our faultless system is hack-proof by implementing a 32-bit encryption for the code.
Why do we only offer Geoo Home in our perks?
So far, Geoo Home is our big goal to accomplish. This way, we thought about launching the basic model of Geoo first, and if everything continues going as planned, we intend on launching our advanced version of Geoo, the Pro version. Speaking about the Geoo Pro, we have included some discount codes in our reward system for some specific donations, mainly because they will be a great help for our development and feel the need to compensate in some way our trustful investors. 
Will Geoo be flexible?
Our latest designs have proved that it would be much more expensive and harder to obtain a flexibility state in our Geoos. However, we thought that adding the water and dust resistance was prior to flexibility and so we did.
Is my Geoo ID code unique?
Of course it is! Every Geoo device has its own, unique ID code. This way no synchronization issues can occur and you can fell totally safe when using your Geoo, nobody else can track it down.
Does Geoo apply a monthly cost for its use?
No. Geoo has been designed to be used without having to pay anything else rather than the device itself. We consider it was key for the costs to cause the least impact on the user as possible.
Is Geoo our only project?
Certainly not. We have been simultaneously developing Geoo but also starting to think, plan and design many more appealing projects which we will surely end up displaying and explaining. For further information, you can visit our site: www.arkynetech.com

Where is the company located?Arkyne Techonologies was founded and is still located in Barcelona, Spain.



Refunds' Policy:
Arkyne Technologies does not assume any responsibility of the perks' delivery in case we don't reach our economical goal; however, we will send the money back to every person who bought a perk and asks for it to be returned (in a maximum time limit of 1 month after the closing of this campaign) A 9% will be subtracted from the total refund due to Indiegogo's taxes and management expenses. Refunds may delay from 30 to 40 days time.

 (Versión en Español) 

  ¿Qué es Geoo?


Olvídate de perder nada nunca más. No pierdas tu valioso tiempo intentando buscar aquello que necesitas. Tan solo tienes que pegar Geoo y listo. Presentamos Geoo, el rastreador Bluetooth y GPS para que no vuelvas a perder nada de vista.

Nuestro objetivo principal con Geoo es dar una localización rápida y precisa de aquello que más te importa, para que así no te tengas que preocupar ni un segundo si lo pierdes. Ofrecemos una amplia variedad de posibilidades, ya que Geoo está diseñado para adaptarse a todos y a todo. Te sorprenderás con la facilidad que se utiliza Geoo. Pon un Geoo en lo que quieras tener localizado, abre la app en tu móvil u otro dispositivo que tenga conexión a internet y localízalo sencillamente en un mapa o radar. Es tan fácil como parece, no tienes que hacer nada más.



Las opciones son interminables: rastrea tu cartera, la mochila, el coche o incluso tu mascota. Cualquier cosa que quieras mantener cerca basta con que tenga un Geoo adherido.
Geoo también tiene incontables aplicaciones profesionales, las cuales causarían un gran impacto debido a su bajo coste y su alta precisión en el rastreo GPS. Son muchas las empresas que gastan una importante suma de dinero en tener localizadas sus operaciones, y Geoo es una herramienta muy útil para poder llevar a cabo infinidad de tareas diferentes, su uso es ideal tanto para pequeñas como grandes empresas.


Nuestro próximo objetivo será: Geoo Ultimate, con las mismas características que Geoo Pro, pero con alcance mundial.



  Nuestra iniciativa
El grupo Arkyne Tech presenta un nuevo reto de inversión para desarrollar Geoo. Estos geolocalizadores no son únicamente compactos y eficientes, sino que también son flexibles y funcionales a distancias superiores. Haciendo uso de las tecnologías Bluetooth y GPS, cada dispositivo Geoo puede enviar su posición con precisión directamente a tu smartphone y mostrarlo a tiempo real en un mapa o radar. Nuestro equipo de desarrollo ha estado trabajando en esta idea durante los últimos 6 meses hasta que finalmente hemos conseguido finalizar nuestros diseños. Actualmente, Geoo es más que una idea. Sin embargo, para poder alcanzar nuestra siguiente fase y poder terminar por completo el desarrollo necesitamos de tu ayuda. Uno de nuestros principales objetivos es mantener nuestro precio lo más bajo posible, sin que ellos afecte a un servicio de máxima calidad. Esto necesita de una inversión inicial más elevada, para poder asegurar mayor eficiencia en los procesos de producción y distribución. Por ello hemos elegido abrir esta campaña de crowdfunding, agradecemos todo el apoyo que estamos recibiendo y a todos los que confiaron en nuestro proyecto.








  ¿Cómo funciona?
Geoo usa una conexión Bluetooth para distancias cortas, y GPS para distancias mayores. Hemos optimizado la tecnología desarrollando Geoo, por ello, estamos seguros de que ofrecemos la mejor conexión posible con el usuario. Contamos con dos modelos de Geoo basados en tus necesidades. En primer lugar, Geoo Home, pensado para un rango de uso doméstico o para tu almacén o tienda. Geoo Home tiene incorporado un sistema de conexión Bluetooth, fácilmente enlazable con multitud de dispositivos disponibles. Abre la app y Geoo Home mostrará en un radar su ubicación exacta.


Pero si Geoo Home no te proporciona un radio de uso suficiente, no te preocupes, porque te presentamos Geoo Pro, la versión avanzada de nuestro primer producto. Con Geoo Pro te puedes olvidar de las distancias límite y el radio de conexión óptimo, ya que ofrece cobertura en todo el territorio nacional de tu país. Si te vas de excursión y quieres tener controlado tu coche o equipaje, o si te quieres asegurar de que tu mascota o algún familiar estén localizados, Geoo Pro tiene un radio de uso más que suficiente para que seas capaz de saber dónde se encuentran. El localizador GPS es fácilmente rastreado y se presenta en un mapa detallado para que encuentres lo que buscas con total seguridad.





¿Por qué Geoo?
Sería genial tener siempre localizados todos nuestros objetos importantes y pertenencias personales. Sin embargo, tendemos a perder muchas cosas por casa, en el coche o en el trabajo. Así pues, ¿por qué no ponemos un Geoo a todo lo que utilizamos en nuestro día a día y poder localizarlo con una simple búsqueda? ¿Para qué molestarse en perder tiempo buscando algo cuando podrías encontrarlo con Geoo en unos segundos?



Comparando Geoo con nuestro competidor más próximo en crowdfunding...






Nuestro hardware
La batería que usaremos tiene una duración estimada de más de 12 meses, proporcionando así una vida útil más que suficiente para tu Geoo. Además, nuestras baterías son recargables mediante inducción. La tecnología Bluetooth usada tiene un consumo muy reducido, pero ello no significa que disminuya su efectividad. La optimización del sistema es clave para que todos los nuevos productos tecnológicos funcionen al máximo rendimiento, sin entorpecer la experiencia hacia el usuario. Nosotros proporcionamos una frecuencia de refresco de la ubicación de 1 minuto para el Geoo Home, y de unos increíbles 0.5 segundos para la versión Pro, más que suficiente para que el cliente pueda localizar su Geoo, y con él, sus bienes.



El radio de funcionamiento de Geoo Home es totalmente revolucionario. Geoo Home puede cubrir un área total de 15000 m². Y te puedes estar preguntando, ¿qué ocurre si me alejo de esta zona? Una muy buena pregunta que tiene una muy fácil respuesta. Una notificación alertará inmediatamente al usuario en su smartphone, avisándole de la situación. Desde ahí el usuario decide cómo proceder, si iniciar la búsqueda del Geoo, o quizás hacer uso de una nueva característica implementada en los Geoo. Puedes usar los Geoo Home como marcador en tu mapa que se guardará para que lo puedas encontrar más tarde. Por ejemplo. Deja tu Geoo Home en el coche cuando vayas a trabajar y marca su localización en el mapa, para que cuando vuelvas más tarde al coche, lo tengas localizado en tu mapa personal.




 Geoo Boundaries
Asegura todas tus pertenencias con Geoo-Boundaries fijando un rango para tu dispositivo Geoo. Una vez alcanzada esta distancia, una notificación te avisará de que tu Geoo ha excedido su límite programado. No sólo es fácil de usar, sino que también vital para mantener controladas tus pertenencias cuando no tienes tiempo para buscarlas.




 Geoo se adapta a ti
Geoo tiene un diseño compacto. Hemos llevado al límite nuestros diseños para que todos los componentes pudieran entrar con suficiente espacio para su correcto funcionamiento, pero sin olvidarnos de que pueda ocupar el menor espacio posible y así ocultarse en tu bolso o cartera.







 Geoo es económico
El precio también es uno de nuestros puntos fuertes con respecto a la competencia del sector. Todas las demás compañías ofrecen su servicio mediante pagos mensuales. Sin embargo, nuestros usuario sólo deben preocuparse del precio del Geoo en sí, ya que no hay pago mensual por la conexión. Como ejemplo, algunas marcas cobran desde $15 hasta incluso llegar a los $40 mensuales, multiplicando por tanto el precio real del dispositivo, y por tanto el total al cabo del año por el mismo servicio.




 Geoo es seguro, y fácil de usar
Muchas son las formas de conectarse con el dispositivo para poder localizarlo. Sin embargo, hemos pensado que la forma más cómoda para todos los usuarios es mediante aplicaciones de smartphone. Simplemente busca nuestra aplicación dedicada a Geoo y sincronízalo introduciendo el código identificativo de tu Geoo. Así de sencillo y rápido. También puedes añadir más de un Geoo al mismo terminal, seleccionando entre uno y otro con un intuitivo menú de selección. Para simplificar la selección, modifica el nombre del Geoo que trae por defecto, y llamalo cualquier cosa, por ejemplo, llaves o mochila. ¡Todo listo para empezar a buscar tus Geoos!


 Involucrados en Geoo






Algunas citas y opiniones sobre Geoo:
“Tecnología fácil de usar a un precio muy bajo, todo lo que uno busca.”
“Es difícil encontrar un dispositivo que sea tan fácil de usar y trabaje tan bien.”
“Un amigo siempre olvida dónde deja las llaves de su coche. Geoo es el mejor regalo que le puedo hacer.”


 Nuestro Equipo





























 FAQs

¿Por qué Indiegogo? ¿Por qué crowdfunding?
Somos una empresa joven y en crecimiento basados en el diseño y desarrollo de tecnología, y el crowdfunding nos ofrece rápidamente la posibilidad de ser conocidos y que todos puedan valorar nuestro trabajo e ideas. De esta forma, Indiegogo parece el portal de crowdfunding idóneo para mostrar nuestro trabajo al resto del mundo.
¿Con qué protecciones cuenta Geoo?
Hemos diseñado Geoo de forma que sea lo más duradero posible. Para ello, Geoo es resistente al agua y polvo, para asegurarnos de que continue funcionando correctamente aun si se moja o ensucia. Nuestro Grado de Proteccion IP es de IP-65, resistiendo chorros de agua y partículas sólidas de cualquier tipo.
¿Cuándo comenzarán los envíos de Geoo?
Una vez hayan finalizado nuestras campañas con éxito y se hayan cumplido nuestros objetivos, comenzaremos la producción en masa, para poder empezar a enviar los Geoo entre 2 y 3 meses después. 
¿Cuál es el coste de envío en las recompensas?
Cada recompensa que tiene asignada la entrega de un Geoo tiene cierto coste de envío. Para poder conocer al detalle dichos costes, recomendamos consultar la información específica de cada recompensa.
¿Qué precio tendrá la aplicación de Geoo para móvil?
¡Ninguno, es gratis! Nuestro objetivo es simplificar al máximo el hecho de encontrar nuestro Geoo, y por tanto hemos decidido crear una sencilla aplicación descargable desde los catálogos de aplicaciones de los distintos sistemas operativos móviles.
¿Geoo necesita algñun tipo de mantenimiento?
Para nada. Geoo funciona perfectamente, sin importar si está sucio o no. Olvida tener que limpiar tu Geoo, simplemente colocalo donde quieras y disfruta encontrando todo aquello que habías perdido.
¿Geoo estará disponible en mi país?
Seas de donde seas, podrás hacerte con tu Geoo. La distribución será global, por lo que tu país también está incluido.
¿Qué dispositivos puedo usar para localizar mi Geoo?
Cualquier dispositivo con tecnología Bluetooth es válido para encontrar tu Geoo. Pensamos que sería una gran ventaja utilizar una tecnología que sea familiar para el mayor número de personas posibles y sea fácil de usar. También, cualquier tipo de conexión a Internet permitiría la conexión, reduciendo aún más los requisitios para los usuarios y facilitando su uso.
¿Quién puede ver dónde está mi Geoo?
Hemos diseñado Geoo de forma que cada uno tenga un código único e irremplazable que sólo el usuario conocerá. Por ello, nadie puede saber el código de identificación de tu Geoo y será totalmente privado. Además, nuestro sistema de seguridad genera los códigos de identificación como combinaciones de 32 bits encriptados, evitando así posibles pirateos.
¿Por qué sólo ofrecemos Geoo Home en nuestras recompensas?
De momento, Geoo Home es nuestro principal objetivo a cumplir. De este modo hemos pensado lanzar primero el modelo básico de los Geoos, y si todo se cumple y va como es esperado, tenemos intención de lanzar nuestro segundo producto, Geoo Pro. Hablando de la versión Pro, hemos incluido algunos códigos de descuento entre algunas de nuestras recompensas, principalmente porque son de gran ayuda para nuestro desarrollo de los productos, y queremos de alguna forma devolver el favor con nuestros inversores.



¿Geoo es flexible?
Nuestros últimos diseños han demostrado que sería mucho más costoso y complicado de obtener la capacidad flexible en los Geoos. Pensamos que sería de una mayor trascendencia aplicar la resistencia al agua y polvo que la flexiblidad del localizador en sí, y así hemos hecho.
¿Mi código de Geoo es único y confidencial?
¡Por supuesto! Cada Geoo tiene su propio código de identificación. De esta forma, no puede haber errores de sincronización y el usuario puede sentirse totalmente seguro usando su Geoo.
¿Geoo tiene algún coste mensual?
No. Geoo ha sido diseñado para operar sin necesidad de pagos adicionales por el servicio, más allá del precio del dispositivo. Hemos tenido constantemente presentes el objetivo de mantener los costes para el cliente los menores posibles.
¿Geoo es nuestro único proyecto?
Para nada. Durante el desarrollo de Geoo hemos iniciado, planeado e incluso diseñado numerosos proyectos de los que estamos seguros sacaremos a la luz tarde o temprano. Para más información, consulta nuestra web: www.arkynetech.com
¿Dónde está localizada la empresa?
Arkyne Technologies fue fundada y permanece ubicada en Barcelona, España.


Política de Devoluciones:
Arkyne Technologies no asume ninguna responsabilidad del envío de las recompensas en caso de no llegar a nuestro objetivo económico; sin embargo, enviaremos el dinero de vuelta a aquellos que lo pidan (en un plazo máximo de 1 mes tras el cierre de esta campaña) y que a su vez compraron una recompensa. Se restará un 9% de las devolución total debido a comisiones de Indiegogo y gastos de gestión. Las devoluciones pueden tardar entre 30 y 40 días en realizarse.




.   .   .

story:
• Original
  • Funny
  • Recognizable
  • Collectionable
  • Customizable
  • Eco-friendly

FOLIO is a modern design product born using new technologies as CNC machine

FOLIO is made to make happier yourself or the person you love

FOLIO is a collection of original designs astonishing and always growing

FOLIO is designed and made in Italy

I am an architect and I work with my friend-colleagues of www.greentales.it , a startup specialized in prototyping that is also an architectural/design/graphic studio, with a fablab inside.

When the last purchase arrived, a laser cut machine, I have immediately fallen in love with her new possibilities. I am an earlier fan of model making, I love to draw something bidimensional becoming real objects.

I started designing products for Christmas period expressing  myself creatively and creating something to share with friends and family: I wanted something new and funny, making people smile!

And so I had idea of FOLIO, a collection of products with fun and fresh design, made with wood. I’ve gotten really great feedback and want to continue to grow!

Now Folio becomes my first project in progress and I want to develope it until to see it as a product known all over the world.

FOLIO has UNI sizes (A4, A5, B3), recognizable and simply to ship and deliver, and the most important feature is that YOU HAVE TO BUILD UP IT: I think it’s not important your age, this is something will always funny.

The material is plywood, cheap and eco-friendly, with a vintage look.

Every piece of FOLIO has a unique plate, detachable and usable, with the name, a specific number, and a row to write a name, “made with love for….”.

Special features or drawings can be made by order, because FOLIO is customizable.

      

The FOLIO project is developed in Collections, so to have a range of different products, for younger and older, for funny or decorations, for gifts or enjoyment.

The first Collection made is XMAS2014, but I have many more in my head and I want to hurry up and make it all. You can buy one, but you can buy the Collection, or you can buy an album with a mix of those.

I have already made these series:

  • XMAS: 4 amusing gifts for Christmas period
  • 3D PUZZLE: 5 little animals, cute and funny, plus a small Deer trophy and a Heart where to put candies or cares.
  • KIDS: 3 little family of animals for different environment, for younger supporters
  • CANDLES: 4 pretty square cases with original designs, where to put your pens, your candles, or what you want
  • BIG: 2 animals a the moment, Dog and Chiken, in two version, Normal or Lamp
  • LAMQ: 3 stunning lamp creating a lovely light atmosphere and wonderful shadows on your walls.

But I have others I have started working with:

  • STORY
  • CITY
  • PLAY
  • ART
  • ...

You can have more informations and pictures on our web site, please take a look!

www.foliolaserfun.com

Folio is very simple to build: the pieces are pre-cutted and for the joints you just have to follow the construction numbers or the instructions. For a better work, you need a simple cutter and little bit of glue (vinavil type), but they are not necessary. I will put some simple instructions in the web site, so to make it even easier. For the small one, you just need 5 minutes to make one, for the big one, just a little little more...and I promise it will surprising and amusing time. :) 

I trust in the quality and the design of my products and I have had already good feedback  from buyers but now I have demand I can‘t support at the moment. The master pieces are ready and I want to work on others, and now I need to improve the production.

I use the laser cut machine of the company of my friends, where I worked hard to design the products in the last few months, and now I have to face new charges.

I want to develope the project: I need a website with e-commerce, I want to promote it, I want to design special packaging for shops, I would like to obtain safety certification for lamps, I would develope a trade policy, so the products will be available in places as bookshops, design shops, souvenir shops, and I want to show project and products in public faire, as the next Design Week in Milan.

I need a little budget to improve our workspace, especially the machine for fumes digestion: the one we have is not working well, so many times I have to work in a smelly fog (uncomfortable and unhealthy).

At last, I need a small, cheap, second hand car, because I crashed mine one month ago and I need it to go to laboratory located in industrial zone of my town - It’s all true, and my friends well know it.

With your support we can make a lot of people happier: the person you give FOLIO as a gift, your self if you put a FOLIO in your home, and me that I make a dream reality :)

It is my first project of e-commerce, but It is a long time I follow and study other similar cases and now there are a lot of tools in Internet to make it easier and productive, as e-commerce platform, crowdfunding platform, website for checking orders and deliveres.

I have to improve my experience in shipping worldwide but I am ready to do it, so I will be able to deliver products in six weeks all over the world in a secure and safe packaging.

FOLIO models have different design, size, function. You can suggest other creations, ask for other solutions or have special customization: you can write names, phrases or ask for special wishes. You can also have a special gift to give in your special celebration... I will do my best for your satisfaction!


Please share the project, social network or your blog! Thank you!
You can find pictures with fine resolution here:
https://www.dropbox.com/sh/pep1mirowqxz1sb/AAAV...

www.foliolaserfun.com
