story:
Bandbox LLC was created out of a need for a combination of fashion and safety. Founded in 2010, Bandbox designs and manufactures beautiful biking helmets that look like hats; for both men and women Bandbox has created tons of designs to choose from.  

 

 

 

 

             

 

 

The ability of protective headgear to save lives is generally accepted.  Yet, the majority of adult bicyclists fail to wear helmets complaining that they are ugly and uncomfortable.  People who bicycle for fitness and for basic transportation are especially underserved by bicycle helmet manufacturers whose primary focus is high profile competitive cyclists.

 

 

 

 

 

There has been a serious need for disruption in the market and Bandbox has taken the initiative. No longer will there be casual riders who refuse to wear a helmet because of the unattractive look. Bandbox wants to bring the joy of biking back into peoples lives with their stylish and innovative helmets. 

 

 

         

 

Bandbox™ has created a helmet-hat comprised of a high-tech streamlined protective interior shell covered by interchangeable traditionally styled hats.  We believe that you shouldn't have to sacrifice safety for style. From wide-brimmed straw hats that provide sun protection during the summer months to wool felt fedoras that provide warmth during the winter months, Bandbox™   has you covered. 

 

 

 

Bandbox has created tons of variety so no matter what style you have, you'll be able to find the helmet that best suits you! 

 

 

             

 


The way Bandbox develops its underlying helmet is unlike anything on the market today. Working with RVCC Labs out of NJ (depicted above), they have developed a simple, yet advanced design for both style and protection. 

 

 

 

 

 

                      

                

 

            

 

While hat makers have the millinery skills to create attractive hats, they are uninterested in retooling for over-sized hats and have no capacity for helmet design.  Conversely, to large helmet makers who are interested in large volume durable helmets, the fashion helmet-hat is an unimportant niche market.  Bandbox™ succeeds because it has been able to meld millinery and helmet design to create a superior helmet constructed of compact high-tech materials that have been shaped to mimic the natural contours of the human skull, facilitating its concealment beneath a variety of attractive decorative covers.

 

Bandbox™ helmets fulfill the pressing and poorly met need of utility bicyclists who ride for transportation in addition to recreation and exercise.  In the past decade, concerns for national obesity rates and global warming have spurred bicycle sales to women and their families.  The federal government has encouraged this trend by funding the Safe Walks to School program and other bicycle friendly initiatives. According to the American League of Bicyclists' study, "Women on a Roll," women own 60% of the nation's bicycles and from 2006 to 2012 the number of women bicycle commuters rose 58%.  This shift in purpose has fostered a demand for innovation in bicyclists’ wardrobes. 

 

Bandbox Customer Appreciation Photo Contest

Eric Petersen Fighting for ADA Access, Nez Perce County Courthouse

 

Congratulations to Eric Petersen, Bandbox's Customer Appreciation  Contest Winner.  Eric is an advocate for people with disabilities.    His daughter bought him his first Bandbox Helmet last year when she felt his Hells Angels motorcycle helmet did not give him the appropriate professional demeanor when testifying in legal settings.  Eric, Kudos to you and your supporters.  Also congratulations to Patricia Pardue who won  the random drawing.  
Final Contest Standings
First Place 37 votes - Eric Petersen#5  Free Cover
2nd Place 19 votes - Katie Kelley#3 $50 Gift Certificate
3rd Place 13 votes - Kathy Swartz#27  $25 Gift Certificate
Random Drawing - Patricia Pardue - Free Cover
 
 

                                          Rose Torres - Customer Photo Contestant

 

 

 

           Free US Shipping On All Perks! 

International shipping will receive an equivalent US shipping value credit.  Product shipping will commence immediately on conclusion of Campaign, October, 2016

 

 

 

Its time to bring back the joy of riding. Stop being embarrassed to ride because of what you're forced to wear on your head! Join the Bandbox team today and start riding in style! 

 

New Market

As we expand, we are searching for new markets. The areas we are looking to get into are both equestrian helmets for riders and those with medical needs who need to wear helmets in their daily lives. We found these markets to be interesting and believed Bandbox could provide something that doesn't yet exist. 

For medical needs, we found creating attractive hats allows people to feel more comfortable in their daily lives.   As for Equestrian, we have sold numerous helmets to riders looking to change up the style in an industry that has been pretty much the same for a long time. In a sport where flair is apart of competition, Bandbox is looking to bring that style and flair with custom equestrian helmets. 

 

Company History

Always the early adopter, Cheryl Allen-Munley was one of the first purchasers of the Bell bicycle helmet in the late 1970s.  But after viewing one photo of herself cycling through the French countryside sporting a monstrous white plastic mushroom on her head, Cheryl spent the rest of her European tour with the helmet firmly strapped to the rear rack of her bicycle.  For the next 30 years, she refused to wear a helmet until the publication of her doctoral dissertation on urban bicycle route safety in 2003 suddenly transformed her into a bicycle safety expert.  Suddenly, her historic distaste for bicycle helmets became a public issue.  Tired of parrying the frequent jibe of "How can you of all people not wear a helmet," Cheryl determined to attack the problem head on.

Management Team

 

 

Dr. Cheryl Allen-Munley is responsible for product design, helmet-hat production, and marketing.  She has a BS in civil engineering from MIT, a MBA from the Columbia and a PhD in transportation from NJIT.  Dr. Munley’s research on bicycle safety has received commendations from the Federal Highway Authority.  She previously managed the Newark Division of Traffic and Signals.

Dean Munley oversees company finances, helmet production and order fulfillment.   He is a graduate of the NJIT School of Architecture.  During his 30-year career of project development, he has managed multi-million dollar projects from planning, though permitting, design, construction and operations

Antonina Babenko (not pictured), seamstress/milliner, began assisting with production and design of helmet-hats in April 2015. Ms. Babenko received a Master degree as "Designer of sewing products” and a Bachelor degree in Industrial Engineering from Kiev University of Technology and Design.

 

                           Use of funds


Since its founding in 2010, Bandbox™ could be characterized as a start-up company. The company has been self-financed.  Company partners have been responsible for all activities from design to manufacturing to sales.  Promotion costs are minimal: limited to social networking, press coverage and local trade shows.  The sales volume ranges between 25-100 units per month.  The company is profitable because the partners contribute their labor at below market rates and the business operates out of their home.

Raising $30,000 on IndieGoGo will enable Bandbox™ to address our most pressing problem: our production capacity’s inability to meet demand.  During the summer of 2015, customers were forced to wait as long as 6 weeks to receive helmet-hats.  Failure to fulfill orders in a timely manner produce a number of negative results including customer complaints, poor ratings on Amazon.com, retail stores reluctance to carry the product, and worst of all, diversion of sales to our competitors.  The following proposed investments will both increase Bandox’s capacity as well as increase sales volumes to convert this increased capacity into revenues. 

                                  

 

 

                                          

Current helmet manufacture consists of a time-consuming process whereby foam is hand mixed and molded within the shell.  Outsourcing foam core production would reduce labor costs and increase Bandbox’s production capacity.   New molds for the thermoplastic vacuum formed exterior ABS molds will also be required.  Bandbox™ has enlisted the aid of Conrad Mercurious, the RVCC manufacturing engineering lab director, to conduct modeling and 3D printing. New production methods will require new testing for CPSC certification at the SGS Laboratory.  Helmets will also be tested to meet EU and Australian/New Zealand standards to allow sale of Bandbox™ Helmets in retail store in these countries.  

 

 

                                     

While exports to the southern hemisphere shelters Bandbox™ from the extreme seasonality of most bicycle and equestrian accessory manufacturers, it is indisputable that sales peak each year in late spring.  Maintaining sufficient levels of inventory to meet this anticipated has added benefits beyond the obvious need to provide rapid order turnaround.  Firstly, maintaining higher inventory allows for larger supply orders which result in both lower unit costs and lower shipping costs, which can be substantial.  Secondly, producing helmet-hats at a uniform level allows Bandbox™  to rely on trained contract part-time staff working instead of scrambling to meet rush orders requiring tradeoffs between paying premium labor rates pay or relying on untrained staff with the potential for quality irregularities.

 

                                 

Current helmet-hat production consists of the time-consuming process of soaking and hat-blocking hat bodies.  With commercial quality millinery steamers, hat blocks, hat dryers, industrial sewing machines and sergers, helmet-hats could be fabricated more rapidly and with a more consistent quality.  

 

 

 

                                      

Online retail sales result in much higher margins than wholesale sales to stores.  The Bandboxllc.com website hosted by Register.com was created using a standard template.  The company catalog was created using a MSWord template with photography done primarily by the in-house.  A professionally built website and catalog with professional photography and text would certainly increase Internet sales.  Ideally, customers would be able to upload pictures of themselves, then superimpose images of the helmets in varying styles and colors to assist in making their selection.  In addition, videos are needed for instruction: how to fit the helmet, how to change the helmet-hats, etc. Bandbox™ is currently soliciting bids through Freelancer.com.

 

                                  
                                

Bandbox™ sales are packaged in white, rectangular hat boxes with computer printer adhesive labels.  These generic boxes are not sufficiently sturdy to withstand rough handling during shipping.  Distinctive, mail-able packaging would reinforce the company’s trademark.  Bids have been received from overseas box manufactures requiring minimum purchases of 500-1,000 units.    A unified printing program is needed for company brochure, business cards, and other labels.  Point of sale hang tags with SPC codes must be obtained for individual products.

The way Bandbox develops its underlying helmet is unlike anything on the market today. Working with RVCC Labs out of NJ (depicted above), they have developed a simple, yet advanced design for both style and protection. 
 
   
 
                      
                
 
             While hat makers have the millinery skills to create attractive hats, they are uninterested in retooling for over-sized hats and have no capacity for helmet design.  Conversely, to large helmet makers who are interested in large volume durable helmets, the fashion helmet-hat is an unimportant niche market.  Bandbox™ succeeds because it has been able to meld millinery and helmet design to create a superior helmet constructed of compact high-tech materials that have been shaped to mimic the natural contours of the human skull, facilitating its concealment beneath a variety of attractive decorative covers.
 

Bandbox™ helmets fulfill the pressing and poorly met need of utility bicyclists who ride for transportation in addition to recreation and exercise.  In the past decade, concerns for national obesity rates and global warming have spurred bicycle sales to women and their families.  The federal government has encouraged this trend by funding the Safe Walks to School program and other bicycle friendly initiatives. According to the American League of Bicyclists' study, "Women on a Roll," women own 60% of the nation's bicycles and from 2006 to 2012 the number of women bicycle commuters rose 58%.  This shift in purpose has fostered a demand for innovation in bicyclists’ wardrobes. 
 
Bandbox Customer Appreciation Photo Contest

Eric Petersen Fighting for ADA Access, Nez Perce County Courthouse
 
Congratulations to Eric Petersen, Bandbox's Customer Appreciation  Contest Winner.  Eric is an advocate for people with disabilities.    His daughter bought him his first Bandbox Helmet last year when she felt his Hells Angels motorcycle helmet did not give him the appropriate professional demeanor when testifying in legal settings.  Eric, Kudos to you and your supporters.  Also congratulations to Patricia Pardue who won  the random drawing.  
Final Contest StandingsFirst Place 37 votes - Eric Petersen#5  Free Cover2nd Place 19 votes - Katie Kelley#3 $50 Gift Certificate3rd Place 13 votes - Kathy Swartz#27  $25 Gift CertificateRandom Drawing - Patricia Pardue - Free Cover  
                                          Rose Torres - Customer Photo Contestant


 
 
 
           Free US Shipping On All Perks! 
International shipping will receive an equivalent US shipping value credit.  Product shipping will commence immediately on conclusion of Campaign, October, 2016
  
 
Its time to bring back the joy of riding. Stop being embarrassed to ride because of what you're forced to wear on your head! Join the Bandbox team today and start riding in style! 

 New Market
As we expand, we are searching for new markets. The areas we are looking to get into are both equestrian helmets for riders and those with medical needs who need to wear helmets in their daily lives. We found these markets to be interesting and believed Bandbox could provide something that doesn't yet exist. 
For medical needs, we found creating attractive hats allows people to feel more comfortable in their daily lives.   As for Equestrian, we have sold numerous helmets to riders looking to change up the style in an industry that has been pretty much the same for a long time. In a sport where flair is apart of competition, Bandbox is looking to bring that style and flair with custom equestrian helmets. 
 Company History
Always the early adopter, Cheryl Allen-Munley was one of the first purchasers of the Bell bicycle helmet in the late 1970s.  But after viewing one photo of herself cycling through the French countryside sporting a monstrous white plastic mushroom on her head, Cheryl spent the rest of her European tour with the helmet firmly strapped to the rear rack of her bicycle.  For the next 30 years, she refused to wear a helmet until the publication of her doctoral dissertation on urban bicycle route safety in 2003 suddenly transformed her into a bicycle safety expert.  Suddenly, her historic distaste for bicycle helmets became a public issue.  Tired of parrying the frequent jibe of "How can you of all people not wear a helmet," Cheryl determined to attack the problem head on.
Management Team
 
 

Dr. Cheryl Allen-Munley is responsible for product design, helmet-hat production, and marketing.  She has a BS in civil engineering from MIT, a MBA from the Columbia and a PhD in transportation from NJIT.  Dr. Munley’s research on bicycle safety has received commendations from the Federal Highway Authority.  She previously managed the Newark Division of Traffic and Signals.

Dean Munley oversees company finances, helmet production and order fulfillment.   He is a graduate of the NJIT School of Architecture.  During his 30-year career of project development, he has managed multi-million dollar projects from planning, though permitting, design, construction and operations
Antonina Babenko (not pictured), seamstress/milliner, began assisting with production and design of helmet-hats in April 2015. Ms. Babenko received a Master degree as "Designer of sewing products” and a Bachelor degree in Industrial Engineering from Kiev University of Technology and Design.
 
                           Use of funds

Since its founding in 2010, Bandbox™ could be characterized as a start-up company. The company has been self-financed.  Company partners have been responsible for all activities from design to manufacturing to sales.  Promotion costs are minimal: limited to social networking, press coverage and local trade shows.  The sales volume ranges between 25-100 units per month.  The company is profitable because the partners contribute their labor at below market rates and the business operates out of their home.
Raising $30,000 on IndieGoGo will enable Bandbox™ to address our most pressing problem: our production capacity’s inability to meet demand.  During the summer of 2015, customers were forced to wait as long as 6 weeks to receive helmet-hats.  Failure to fulfill orders in a timely manner produce a number of negative results including customer complaints, poor ratings on Amazon.com, retail stores reluctance to carry the product, and worst of all, diversion of sales to our competitors.  The following proposed investments will both increase Bandox’s capacity as well as increase sales volumes to convert this increased capacity into revenues. 
                                  
 
 
                                          
Current helmet manufacture consists of a time-consuming process whereby foam is hand mixed and molded within the shell.  Outsourcing foam core production would reduce labor costs and increase Bandbox’s production capacity.   New molds for the thermoplastic vacuum formed exterior ABS molds will also be required.  Bandbox™ has enlisted the aid of Conrad Mercurious, the RVCC manufacturing engineering lab director, to conduct modeling and 3D printing. New production methods will require new testing for CPSC certification at the SGS Laboratory.  Helmets will also be tested to meet EU and Australian/New Zealand standards to allow sale of Bandbox™ Helmets in retail store in these countries.  
 

 
                                     
While exports to the southern hemisphere shelters Bandbox™ from the extreme seasonality of most bicycle and equestrian accessory manufacturers, it is indisputable that sales peak each year in late spring.  Maintaining sufficient levels of inventory to meet this anticipated has added benefits beyond the obvious need to provide rapid order turnaround.  Firstly, maintaining higher inventory allows for larger supply orders which result in both lower unit costs and lower shipping costs, which can be substantial.  Secondly, producing helmet-hats at a uniform level allows Bandbox™  to rely on trained contract part-time staff working instead of scrambling to meet rush orders requiring tradeoffs between paying premium labor rates pay or relying on untrained staff with the potential for quality irregularities.
 
                                 
Current helmet-hat production consists of the time-consuming process of soaking and hat-blocking hat bodies.  With commercial quality millinery steamers, hat blocks, hat dryers, industrial sewing machines and sergers, helmet-hats could be fabricated more rapidly and with a more consistent quality.  
 
  
                                      Online retail sales result in much higher margins than wholesale sales to stores.  The Bandboxllc.com website hosted by Register.com was created using a standard template.  The company catalog was created using a MSWord template with photography done primarily by the in-house.  A professionally built website and catalog with professional photography and text would certainly increase Internet sales.  Ideally, customers would be able to upload pictures of themselves, then superimpose images of the helmets in varying styles and colors to assist in making their selection.  In addition, videos are needed for instruction: how to fit the helmet, how to change the helmet-hats, etc. Bandbox™ is currently soliciting bids through Freelancer.com.
 
                                                                  Bandbox™ sales are packaged in white, rectangular hat boxes with computer printer adhesive labels.  These generic boxes are not sufficiently sturdy to withstand rough handling during shipping.  Distinctive, mail-able packaging would reinforce the company’s trademark.  Bids have been received from overseas box manufactures requiring minimum purchases of 500-1,000 units.    A unified printing program is needed for company brochure, business cards, and other labels.  Point of sale hang tags with SPC codes must be obtained for individual products.

story:
Easily rent RVs and Trailers from owners everywhere. 

If you like to travel, you're going to love Caravana...

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Own more than 1 RV?

 

Here’s where Caravana separates from the pack. Everyone is familiar with the peer-to-peer home rental website Airbnb; or Uber who revolutionized ride share. Now imagine if these companies made their technologies and software platform available for other companies to use on their website.

With Caravana’s Enterprise edition, an RV dealership or anyone with a fleet can use our software to run their business. Let renters book your RV without ever leaving your website. 

 

Product Demo - Rv Owners Management System

 

 

 

 

 

ABOUT THE CARAVANA

 

Similar to Uber's reinvention of the "ride", we are looking to reinvent the RV rental industry. Our mission is to create the safest RV rental platform on the market. Our commitment to innovation has helped drive us to creating the Caravana RV rental platform and fleet management services. 

Some might say Caravana "is like Airbnb for RVs", but its much more than that...

- Our platform makes the rental process easy and fun.

- We provide enterprise level software to RV rental companies allowing them to compete with the large corporations like Cruise America. 

- We look to launch Peer-to-Peer rentals turning RV owners into Entrepreneurs. 

- Our proprietary rental software can easily be adapted to other industries such as cars, boats or planes.

Read more about Caravana Rentals

 

Perk Rewards

 
Trucker Hat

Men's Tee Shirt #1

Available in various colors. We will ask for size and color in an email.

Men's Tee Shirt - "Travel Buddy"

Available in various colors.

Men's Tee Shirt - "campsite"

 
Ladies Tee Shirt #1

Ladies Tee Shirt - "love life, live long, travel far"

Ladies Tank Top (front)

Back

dashboard hula doll

 

OUR PROGRESS

After hundreds of cups of coffee, thousands of hours in market research and relentless efforts to create the perfect platform; we have reached a beta version of our software. We took valuable feedback from RV owners and are now back in development getting ready for our first software release.

WHAT WE NEED

We are looking to raise a little money to help us speed up the timeline.  With the money raised we will be able to launch Caravana faster and get to revenue.  

  • We are looking to raise $15,000 to help pay for startup costs. 
  • some of the money raised will be used for attorney fees to review our contracts, legal disclaimers, and general liabilities.  
  • a portion of the money raised will also go towards insurance policies for the company. 

    OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

    The biggest reason why we chose to campaign on Indiegogo was to build our fan base and get users on our website.  How can you help? Glad you ask.

    • Please share this campaign with your friends, family, and co-workers.
    • You can share the link on social media
    • If you know someone who owns an RV or Trailer be sure to let them know about us.  Send them here or to www.caravana.rentals.

story:
English / Türkçe / 日本語

Please have a see our blog page if you are interested in our  project and life story.

        Hayat hikayemizi okumak isterseniz lütfen blog sayfamızı ziyaret edin

                                          私たちのブログのページをご覧ください

                                       http://journeyto-miracle.blogspot.jp/

                                   -------------------------------------------------------

Journey to Miracle

A family travels through Earth Chakras & Vortices through 3 continent and chants the vibes of healing.

                                       


This is the story of a soul couple and their 4 years old daughter, whose dream is to make a 6 months long journey through 3 continents.

We are Yuuka, Strong Wings (Gökhan) and Maya. Mother, father and daughter... Our motivation in life is to inspire people to awaken the love, power and freedom that they possess in themselves.

 For that, we just live.

We live from heart and go with the flow by following the dreams of heart-spirit-God.

Journey to Miracle is one such dream.

          There is one more thing to it... 

We are spiritual healers, performing sound healing,- translating energy into sound-. 

Our route will pass through Earth Chakras (High frequency energy centers). 

 We will  translate the unique frequencies of the earth chakras in to sounds by playing some instruments and chanting, which later we will upload on our blog page as sound files for people to listen and meditate with them in order to receive the purifying and healing affects.

As a summary, we aim...

+To inspire...

+To give an unforgetable birthday present to our 4 yrs old daughter, 

+To travel, to see beauties of the Earth, to meet new people, to experience Earth Chakra vibratitions and to have spiritual rememberings.

+In 3 Continents, 6 months long, visiting the Earth chakras and vortices; uploading their unique energies onto sound frequencies by playing shaman drums, Tibetian singing bowls and chanting; sharing those sound records on our blogger freely with people, so anyone can meditate with those special vibrations.

+To share our Earth Chakra experiences by blog writing and photography.

+To write the story of our life flow trough and after the journey to create an inspirational book.

+To create an ‘Earth Chakra meditation’ music album with our recordings, upon the end of journey.

+ To find and become more of our true self by the help of experiences we will get from the journey.

======

We intend to begin the journey in 2017, at the time of Maya’s birth day, which is 

16 th of March 04:55 am.

Route of the journey*

Turkey-Gobeklitepe (First temple of the world)

Bosnian Pyramids

Usa- Mt. Shasta

Usa- Arizona-Sedona

Mexico – Pyramid of the Sun and other Mayan Temples

Peru- Lake Titicaca – Machu Picchu

Bolivia – Lake Titicaca

Japan- Mt. Fuji summit

(Depending on the flow of life, we may visit more different places than the original plan)

More about earth chakra chantings;

Some of those places are small chakras – vortices and some of them are the main chakras of the Earth. Being and meditating in those energy fields have known affects of increasing the consciousness vibration and purifying the emotional heaviness of the people. Our intention is to channel those unique frequencies in to sounds by chanting, accompanied by a rattle, drum or singing bowls, which we will record and share for bringing those affects to people who will listen and meditate.

Till now we have made sound healing to many people, many groups,  and builded up the deeper understanding and gained the  level of experience which was necessary for this mission. It feels like we have been preparing ourselves for this journey all life long.


We have calculated that 25,000 Usd will be enough to make this journey happen.

Good news is that, we have allready collected some of this amount by our savings.


What we need is 15,000 Usd to make it happen.

"Journey to Miracle" is a flower.

We planted it's seed at a new moon night, in to heart of the universe

Would you be the water and sunlight for the growth of it, by your funding and/or your prayer?



If more money  than we need for the journey is collected, it will be used for another of our future project, which is about buying a green land, building few Ti Pi tents in it for creating a retreat and rest center where people can volanteer work at organic farming, receive healing session, do  yoga and meditation etc. A meeting point of backpackers and spiritual seekers... But this is the next chapter...


NOW, 

We are thankful to each one of you for helping our dream become true by funding and/or your prayers.

We know that all your support will be coming from your unconditional love, without expecting anything in return.
However as a tradition of Crowdfunding, we would like to present you a small gift of our appreciation. 

For all amount of donations: We will pray for your well being and ascension of your soul.

50 Usd: 1 Oracle card reading to bring the message of your  spirit - higher self to you. The message that you need to hear that time.

250 Usd: We will find and post to your home a power stone that we will find for you in one of those Earth Chakra-vortices.


500 Usd: We will find 3 power stones from 3 different Earth Chakras for you. We will post them to your home at a convenient time during the journey.

^^^

Down, you may listen our sound healing chanting which we recently made in a bamboo forest in Japan.

(Please listen Hd, with head phones)


God Bless you.

---

Gobeklitepe - Turkey

Bosnian Pyramids

USA- Mt. Shasta 

USA - Arizona - Sedona

Mexico - Pyramid of the Sun and other Mayan pyramids.

Peru - Lake Titicaca

Peru - Machu Picchu

Japan - Fuji Mountain

For reading our life story please visit our blog page :
 http://journeyto-miracle.blogspot.jp/

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                                                    Türkçe


                                                  Mucizeye Yolculuk

~~Kitlesel fonlama ile ‘Mucizeye Yolculuk’ için gerekli maddi kaynağın, bütüne hayrı dokunacağına inanan insanlar tarafından toplanması.~~

Mucizeye yolculuk, 4 yaşındaki kızlarıyla, 3 kıtada, 6 ay sürecek bir yolculuğa çıkmaya niyet eden şifacı bir ruh eşi çiftin öyküsüdür.

Biz Yuuka, Strong Wings Gökhan ve Maya. Hayattaki motivasyonumuz ve amacımız insanlara içlerinde uyumakta olan sevgiyi, gücü ve özgürlüğü uyandırmaları konusunda ilham olmak. Bu ilhamı yalnızca olduğumuz gibi yaşayarak sunuyoruz. Kalpten yaşıyoruz; yani kalpten – Ruh’dan - Yaratan’dan gelen arzuyu takip edip onurlandırarak yaşıyoruz.

‘Mucizeye Yolculuk’ ismini taktığımız bu hayal (proje) böylesine bir arzu.

Bu hayale dair bir şey daha var…

Biz ‘Ses ile Şifa’ yöntemiyle çalışan ve enerjileri sese dönüştürebilen şifacı bir çiftiz.

Mucizeye Yolculuk’un rotası yeryüzü çakraları olarak bilinen yüksek frekanslı enerji merkezlerinden geçecek. Amacımız her bir yeryüzü çakrası geçişimizde, o yere has, arındıran, şifalandıran, bilinç yükselten enerjileri, şamanik-evrensel yöntemlerle sese dönüştürmek ve kaydedeceğimiz ses dosyalarını blog sayfamızdan yayınlamak. Böylece binlerce km ötedeki enerji alanlarının frekanslarını, ihtiyaç duyanların kulağına-varlığına ulaştırmış olacağız.

Özetle yolculuğun amaç ve hedefleri:

+ İlham olmak ve bütüne hizmet etmek

+ Yolculuğun başlayacağı gün 4. Yaş gününü kutlayacağımız kızımız Maya’ya unutulmaz bir hediye olarak varlığın gücü, öz sevgi ve Yaratan'ın birliğini hissettirecek bir yolculuk deneyimi sunmak.

+ Seyahat etmek, dünya güzelliklerini görmek, yeni insanlarla tanışmak, yeryüzü çakralarının enerjilerini deneyimlemek ve ruhani hatırlamalar yaşamak.

+ 3 kıtada 6 ay sürecek yolculuk boyunca, yer yüzü çakralarında şaman davulu, Tibet çanakları ve insan sesini, şifa aktarmak niyetiyle seslendirerek, kayıtları blog sayfamızdan paylaşmak.

+ O yerlerin kendine has enerjilerini görseller ve yazılar ile blog sayfamızda paylaşmak.

+ Akıştaki hayatımızın öyküsünü bu yolculuk esnasında ve sonrasında kaleme alarak kitaplaştırmak.

+ Yolculuk dönüşünde, ‘Yeryüzü Çakraları ile Meditasyon’ adlı bir müzik albümünü uyanışa hizmet etmek niyetiyle çıkartmak.

+Yolculuk boyunca edineceğimiz deneyimler ile içsel yolculuğumuzda derinlik kazanmak.

============  

Niyetimiz yolculuğa Maya’nın doğum günü olan 16 Mart 04:55 ‘ de (2017) başlamak.

Rotamız:

Türkiye – Göbeklitepe (Dünyanın ilk tapınağı)

Bosna Piramitleri

K. Amerika, Shasta Dağı

K. Amerika, Arizona – Sedona

K. Amerika, Mexico, Güneş Piramiti ve diğer Maya Tapınakları

G. Amerika, Peru, Titicaca Gölü ve Machu Picchu

G. Amerika, Bolivya, Titicaca gölü

Japonya, Fuji dağı zirvesi

(Yolculuğun akışına teslim olduğumuzda aklımızı ve yolumuzu esnek tutarak eksik ya da fazla başka mekanlara gitmemiz kuvvetle muhtemel.)

=========

Yeryüzü çakraları hakkında daha fazla bilgi:

Ziyaret edeceğimiz alanların kimileri küçük çakra denilen enerji girdap (vortice) alanları, kimileri ise ana çakralar denilen daha yüksek frekanstaki alanlar.

(İnsan bedeninde yedisi ana çakra olmak üzere toplam ~72,000 den fazla çakra var. Aynı durum Dünya içinde geçerli)

Bir dünya çakrasının içinde-üstünde bulunmanın ve orada meditasyon yapmanın insan bilincinin frekansını yükselten, duygu ağırlıklarını serbest bırakan, ruhani ve fiziksel olarak şifalandıran etkileri olduğu bilinmekte.

Niyetimiz bu çakraların enerjilerini ve olumlu etkilerini ses frekanslarına yükleyerek insanlara ulaştırmak.

Şu ana dek pek çok kimse ve guruplara ses ile şifa aktardık. Bu misyonu yerine getirebilmemiz için gerekli anlayış ve deneyimi edindik. Sanki bütün hayatımız boyunca kendimizi bu yolculuğa hazırlamışız gibi hissediyoruz.

=============

Gerekli Visalar, donanım, uçak biletleri, konaklama, yeme-içme düşünüldüğünde 70,000 Tl, yaklaşık 25,000 dolara ihtiyacımız olduğunu anladık.

Güzel haber, biz bu paranın bir kısmını biriktirdik.

Bu yolculuğun gerçekleşmesinde toplanması yeterli olacak olan miktar 42,000 Tl (15,000 USD)

 “‘Mucizeye Yolculuk’ bir Arzu Çiçeğidir.

Biz onun tohumunu, bir yeni ay gecesi evrenin kalbine ektik.

Edeceğiniz dua ve yapacağınız bağış ile bu çiçeğin güneş ışığı ve yağmur suyu olur musunuz?

 Çiçeğin büyümesinde ve açmasında katkınız olsun ister misiniz?”

Desteğiniz için hepinize ayrı ayrı şükranlarımızı sunarız.

Bütünün en yüksek hayrına olsun.

Ve öyle olsun…

Ve Öyle oldu…

Şükürler Olsun

(Şayet bu proje için gerekenden daha fazla miktarda para toplanacak olursa, onu da bir sonraki projemiz için kullanacağız: ‘Doğa içinde, yeşil bir alan edinmek, içine bir doğal ev ve birkaç Ti Pi (Amerikan yerli çadırı) kurmak; gönüllülerin organik çiftçiliğe yardımcı olacağı, gönüllülerin mutfağa ve diğer alanlara yardımcı olacağı; ruhani arayıştaki insanları bir araya getirecek; öz bilginin paylaşılacağı, şifanın akacağı ve bağış usulüyle işleyecek ütopik bir yaşam alanı oluşturmak. Ama bu hayat kitabının daha ilerleyen bir bölümü..)

~Hayat hikayemizi okumak isterseniz lütfen blog sayfamızı ziyaret edin:

http://journeyto-miracle.blogspot.jp/

Not*

Biliyoruz ki tüm yardımlarınız koşulsuz sevginizden, beklentisizce gelecek.

Yine de, Indiegogo toplu fonlama sisteminin geleneğinin yerini bulması için bizim de size ufak bir armağanımız olacak.

Tüm bağışlarınız için: İsminizi anarak hakkınızda hayırlar ve mutluluklar dileyeceğiz 

50 USD: Oracle card okuyarak yüksek benliğinizden, özünüzden size iletmemiz istenen bir mesajı ileteceğiz.

250 USD: Dilediğiniz bir Yeryüzü çakrasından bulacağımız özel bir taşı adresinize postalayacağız.

500 USD: 3 Yer yüzü çakrasında bulacağımız 3 taştan oluşan ufak bir kolleksiyonu adresinize postalayacağız.

Japanese
ミラクルな旅

＂ミラクルな旅" へのクロウドフンディングは、この旅が、多くの人を、インスパイアし、より良きものへのサービスになるなと信じてくれた人たちのものです。

（もし、他の言語に、通訳をしても良いなと感じる方がいましたら、サポートをお願いします。ありがとうございます。）

これは、ソウルメイトカップルと4歳になる娘を連れて、４大陸を6ヶ月という長い旅をしてみようというお話です。

私たちは、ゆうか、ギョカン、まやです。

お母さん。お父さんと娘です。

私たちの、モチベーションは常に、どうしたら人は愛に目覚めてくれるのか、どうしたらそのようにインスパイアしていけるのか？です。

どうしたら、人びとに、彼ら自身の力や自由を取り戻してあげられるんだろう。ということにあります。

それは、

私たちがまずは、まっすぐに、生きることなんじゃないか。

ハートに従って生きることなんじゃないか。

私たちが、聖なるスピリット、神の声にハートから従うことなんじゃないか。ということなのではないか。

そこから本質的なことができるのではないかと思います。

＂ミラクルな旅”は、そういう旅なのではないかと感じています。

もっと言っておきたいことがあります。

私たちは、スピリチュルなヒーリングをしています。そして、スピリチュルな世界を音に変容させるサウンドヒーリングをしています。

私たちの旅は、アースチャクラを通ります。

（地球上で、高い振動数のエネルギーの場所）

私たちは、アースチャクラごとの、ユニークな振動数を音に変換して、後でサウンドファイルにして皆さんが聞けたり、ダウンロードできるようにしたいと思います。

このサウンドファイルで、皆さん瞑想などをして、浄化や、ヒーリングの効果が得られると思います。

私たちがやろうとしていること。

☆私たちの娘が4歳になるので、忘れられないプレゼントになるだろうということ。

☆地球の美しい場所は、新しい人に会うことで、自分達の深い記憶が蘇りよりよく、自分達としての役割を果たせるのではないかと感じていること。

☆地球のアースチャクラを訪れそこで、私たちのシャーマンドラムやチベタンシンギングボール、そして声のチャンティングをして皆さんがフリーで瞑想ができるようブログにアップしていくこと。

☆アースチャクラでの経験をブログで写真や、日記などで紹介していくこと。

☆私たちの体験や日記を一冊の本にまとめて出版するもしくは何かの形で発表すること。

☆この旅でのアースチャクラのレコーディングをひとつのCDにまとめて、CDアルバムを作ること。

私たちの旅の経験からより深い私たちの自己と繋がれると信じています。

…………………………………………………………………

"ミラクルな旅"は夢の花です。

私たちは、新月の日に、宇宙のハートにこの種を蒔きます。

あなたは、この夢に、水や太陽の光を与えてくれますか。

フンディングや祈りなどを通して、、

……………………………………………………………………

私たちは、２０１７年の３月１６日 ＡＭ ４:５５分からこの旅を始めようと思っています。

娘のまやの誕生日なのです。

★旅の予定★

トルコ     ギョベキ テペ （ 世界で初めての寺院）

ボスニア ピラミッド

アメリカ   シャスタ山

アメリカ   アリゾナ  セドナ

メキシコ    太陽のピラミッド  マヤの神殿

ペルー   チチカカ湖   マチュピチュ

ボリビア    チチカカ湖

日本            富士山

（この旅は、フローしていますので、状況により新しい場所に寄ったりしていく予定です。）

……………………………………………………………………

アースチャクラチャンティングについて。

旅の予定で訪れる場所は、いくつかは、地球上の小さなチャクラ、もしくは、メインチャクラと言われています。

その場所での瞑想は、人びとの意識や感情を浄化し向上させます。

私たちは、その場所のユニークな振動数と繋がり、ラトルやシャーマンドラム、チベタンシンギングボール、声のチャンティングなどを通して、皆さんが聞いて瞑想などができるようシェアしていきます。

今まで、私たちはサウンドヒーリングを多くの人たくさんのグループにやってきました。

そして、深い意識に貯蓄されたものを明らかにしたり、ミッションのための必要な経験を与えたりしてきました。

この経験は、私たち自身が、この次の段階へいく準備だったのかなと感じています。

私たちはこの旅で ２５０００USドル必要なのですが、私たちはすでに、今までの活動で１００００USドルは持っています。

あと、必要なのは、１５０００USドルです。

もしもですが、

お金がより多く集められたら、私たちには、次の夢もあります。大きな緑に囲まれた土地を、買って、ティピを建てて、創造的なことをしたり、休んだり、オーガニックな野菜を作ったり、ボランティアをしてくれる人や、ヨガや瞑想をしたり、ヒーリングをしたり、受けたり、イベントをしたり、バックパッカーの人が落ち合うような場所にしたり、スピリチュアリティに探求しているような人が来てくれたり、、

しかし、これは次の私たちの夢です。

今

私たちは、私たちの夢を叶えてくれようとしているひとりひとりに感謝しています。なぜならば、あなたの祈りが真実であると感じるからです。

あなたに、神のご加護がありますように。


indiegogo クロウドフンディングは、寄付をしていただいた方にプレゼントを贈る伝統があります。

もちろん、あなたの寄付は無条件の愛の元送っていただけているのは知っているのですが、、


1ドル　　あなたへのご加護をお祈りします。

50ドル　1オラクルカードリーディング

250ドル　アースチャクラのパワーストーンを１つあなたのお家に送りします。

500ドル　アースチャクラのパワーストーンを3つあなたのお家にお送りします。



Strong Wings

ライトワーカー　トルコ人

富豪の祖父母から遺産相続できなかったという両親から育ち、非常な貧困状態を幼少期に経験する。両親のステイタスを守るよう育てられ９年間大型船の２番キャプテンを務め妹などのイギリス留学学費なども算出する。

もともと霊性があり、２００８年ソウルメイトについてチャネリングで書いた小説 Gaak ve Baap を出版し、２０１１年この強い家族の絆から出ることを決め自ら書いた小説どおりに旅をすることをきめる。

２０１２年　１月　YUUKAとインドプシュカルであう。

小説には笛を吹いた着物を着たシャーマニックな女性という記載がありYUUKAは笛を吹き日本人で、シャーマニックなヒーリングをしていた。

インドで２回のビパサナ瞑想やウクライナ人のライトワーカーなどの出会いがあり、

自らの霊性を高める。

同年結婚。

その後本格的にヒーラーとして日本、トルコをベースに活動を開始。

シャーマンドラムやチベットのシンギングボールを使ってのヒーリング、ワークショップ

ソウルギャザリング。ヒーリングやチャネリング個人セッション、チャネリングワークショップなど。


YUUKA


ライトワーカー

幼少期より芸術、自然に興味があり、絵画などに親しみ、美術系の学校に進学。

同時に精神的な病にかかりこの世の中が

この次元だけでないことに気が付きエネルギーに敏感になり病のため学校を中退。

自分が社会で生きていけないことに苦しみ自転車で沖縄まで旅をしたり、１年間　タイ、インド、ネパールなどに旅をし、曼荼羅画家やチベットの僧侶、クリスタル　瞑想　コミュニティライフなど体験する。最後に訪れたハワイ島であなたは光を取り戻すために働く人なんだつまりは

ライトワーカーであるという啓示をうけ、そこからヒーリング、ライトワーク活動をはじめる。

同時期に舞や声でエネルギーを降ろすことができるようになる。

１２年間の活動ののちヨガの勉強でちょくちょく訪れていたインドでstrongwingsと会う。

２０１２年結婚　　２０１３年まやを出産

MAYA


２０１３年３月１６日産まれ

社会の枠の中で生きることを選択せず、出産もプライベートバース　自分たちだけでの出産を選び、肉や魚、卵の動物性のものをほぼ食さない子供。日本語、トルコ語、英語での環境で３か国言葉を習得中。

自分が欲しいもの、必要なものがあると現実化がとてもはやい。

０歳より国内外の旅を開始し、３歳の誕生日にはUFOが出現
story_txt:
English / Türkçe / 日本語Please have a see our blog page if you are interested in our  project and life story.        Hayat hikayemizi okumak isterseniz lütfen blog sayfamızı ziyaret edin                                          私たちのブログのページをご覧ください                                       http://journeyto-miracle.blogspot.jp/                                   -------------------------------------------------------Journey to MiracleA family travels through Earth Chakras & Vortices through 3 continent and chants the vibes of healing.                                       This is the story of a soul couple and their 4 years old daughter, whose dream is to make a 6 months long journey through 3 continents.We are Yuuka, Strong Wings (Gökhan) and Maya. Mother, father and daughter... Our motivation in life is to inspire people to awaken the love, power and freedom that they possess in themselves. For that, we just live.We live from heart and go with the flow by following the dreams of heart-spirit-God.Journey to Miracle is one such dream.
          There is one more thing to it... 
We are spiritual healers, performing sound healing,- translating energy into sound-. 
Our route will pass through Earth Chakras (High frequency energy centers). 
 We will  translate the unique frequencies of the earth chakras in to sounds by playing some instruments and chanting, which later we will upload on our blog page as sound files for people to listen and meditate with them in order to receive the purifying and healing affects.
As a summary, we aim...
+To inspire...
+To give an unforgetable birthday present to our 4 yrs old daughter, 
+To travel, to see beauties of the Earth, to meet new people, to experience Earth Chakra vibratitions and to have spiritual rememberings.
+In 3 Continents, 6 months long, visiting the Earth chakras and vortices; uploading their unique energies onto sound frequencies by playing shaman drums, Tibetian singing bowls and chanting; sharing those sound records on our blogger freely with people, so anyone can meditate with those special vibrations.
+To share our Earth Chakra experiences by blog writing and photography.
+To write the story of our life flow trough and after the journey to create an inspirational book.
+To create an ‘Earth Chakra meditation’ music album with our recordings, upon the end of journey.
+ To find and become more of our true self by the help of experiences we will get from the journey.

======
We intend to begin the journey in 2017, at the time of Maya’s birth day, which is 
16 th of March 04:55 am.
Route of the journey*
Turkey-Gobeklitepe (First temple of the world)
Bosnian Pyramids
Usa- Mt. Shasta
Usa- Arizona-Sedona
Mexico – Pyramid of the Sun and other Mayan Temples
Peru- Lake Titicaca – Machu Picchu
Bolivia – Lake Titicaca
Japan- Mt. Fuji summit
(Depending on the flow of life, we may visit more different places than the original plan)
More about earth chakra chantings;
Some of those places are small chakras – vortices and some of them are the main chakras of the Earth. Being and meditating in those energy fields have known affects of increasing the consciousness vibration and purifying the emotional heaviness of the people. Our intention is to channel those unique frequencies in to sounds by chanting, accompanied by a rattle, drum or singing bowls, which we will record and share for bringing those affects to people who will listen and meditate.
Till now we have made sound healing to many people, many groups,  and builded up the deeper understanding and gained the  level of experience which was necessary for this mission. It feels like we have been preparing ourselves for this journey all life long.

We have calculated that 25,000 Usd will be enough to make this journey happen.

Good news is that, we have allready collected some of this amount by our savings.
What we need is 15,000 Usd to make it happen.

"Journey to Miracle" is a flower.
We planted it's seed at a new moon night, in to heart of the universe
Would you be the water and sunlight for the growth of it, by your funding and/or your prayer?
If more money  than we need for the journey is collected, it will be used for another of our future project, which is about buying a green land, building few Ti Pi tents in it for creating a retreat and rest center where people can volanteer work at organic farming, receive healing session, do  yoga and meditation etc. A meeting point of backpackers and spiritual seekers... But this is the next chapter...
NOW, 

We are thankful to each one of you for helping our dream become true by funding and/or your prayers.

We know that all your support will be coming from your unconditional love, without expecting anything in return.However as a tradition of Crowdfunding, we would like to present you a small gift of our appreciation. 
For all amount of donations: We will pray for your well being and ascension of your soul.
50 Usd: 1 Oracle card reading to bring the message of your  spirit - higher self to you. The message that you need to hear that time.
250 Usd: We will find and post to your home a power stone that we will find for you in one of those Earth Chakra-vortices.
500 Usd: We will find 3 power stones from 3 different Earth Chakras for you. We will post them to your home at a convenient time during the journey.^^^
Down, you may listen our sound healing chanting which we recently made in a bamboo forest in Japan.
(Please listen Hd, with head phones)
God Bless you.

---Gobeklitepe - TurkeyBosnian PyramidsUSA- Mt. Shasta USA - Arizona - SedonaMexico - Pyramid of the Sun and other Mayan pyramids.Peru - Lake TiticacaPeru - Machu PicchuJapan - Fuji MountainFor reading our life story please visit our blog page : http://journeyto-miracle.blogspot.jp/
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                    Türkçe
                                                  Mucizeye Yolculuk
~~Kitlesel fonlama ile ‘Mucizeye Yolculuk’ için gerekli maddi kaynağın, bütüne hayrı dokunacağına inanan insanlar tarafından toplanması.~~
Mucizeye yolculuk, 4 yaşındaki kızlarıyla, 3 kıtada, 6 ay sürecek bir yolculuğa çıkmaya niyet eden şifacı bir ruh eşi çiftin öyküsüdür.
Biz Yuuka, Strong Wings Gökhan ve Maya. Hayattaki motivasyonumuz ve amacımız insanlara içlerinde uyumakta olan sevgiyi, gücü ve özgürlüğü uyandırmaları konusunda ilham olmak. Bu ilhamı yalnızca olduğumuz gibi yaşayarak sunuyoruz. Kalpten yaşıyoruz; yani kalpten – Ruh’dan - Yaratan’dan gelen arzuyu takip edip onurlandırarak yaşıyoruz.
‘Mucizeye Yolculuk’ ismini taktığımız bu hayal (proje) böylesine bir arzu.
Bu hayale dair bir şey daha var…
Biz ‘Ses ile Şifa’ yöntemiyle çalışan ve enerjileri sese dönüştürebilen şifacı bir çiftiz.
Mucizeye Yolculuk’un rotası yeryüzü çakraları olarak bilinen yüksek frekanslı enerji merkezlerinden geçecek. Amacımız her bir yeryüzü çakrası geçişimizde, o yere has, arındıran, şifalandıran, bilinç yükselten enerjileri, şamanik-evrensel yöntemlerle sese dönüştürmek ve kaydedeceğimiz ses dosyalarını blog sayfamızdan yayınlamak. Böylece binlerce km ötedeki enerji alanlarının frekanslarını, ihtiyaç duyanların kulağına-varlığına ulaştırmış olacağız.
Özetle yolculuğun amaç ve hedefleri:
+ İlham olmak ve bütüne hizmet etmek
+ Yolculuğun başlayacağı gün 4. Yaş gününü kutlayacağımız kızımız Maya’ya unutulmaz bir hediye olarak varlığın gücü, öz sevgi ve Yaratan'ın birliğini hissettirecek bir yolculuk deneyimi sunmak.
+ Seyahat etmek, dünya güzelliklerini görmek, yeni insanlarla tanışmak, yeryüzü çakralarının enerjilerini deneyimlemek ve ruhani hatırlamalar yaşamak.
+ 3 kıtada 6 ay sürecek yolculuk boyunca, yer yüzü çakralarında şaman davulu, Tibet çanakları ve insan sesini, şifa aktarmak niyetiyle seslendirerek, kayıtları blog sayfamızdan paylaşmak.
+ O yerlerin kendine has enerjilerini görseller ve yazılar ile blog sayfamızda paylaşmak.
+ Akıştaki hayatımızın öyküsünü bu yolculuk esnasında ve sonrasında kaleme alarak kitaplaştırmak.
+ Yolculuk dönüşünde, ‘Yeryüzü Çakraları ile Meditasyon’ adlı bir müzik albümünü uyanışa hizmet etmek niyetiyle çıkartmak.
+Yolculuk boyunca edineceğimiz deneyimler ile içsel yolculuğumuzda derinlik kazanmak.
============  
Niyetimiz yolculuğa Maya’nın doğum günü olan 16 Mart 04:55 ‘ de (2017) başlamak.
Rotamız:
Türkiye – Göbeklitepe (Dünyanın ilk tapınağı)
Bosna Piramitleri
K. Amerika, Shasta Dağı
K. Amerika, Arizona – Sedona
K. Amerika, Mexico, Güneş Piramiti ve diğer Maya Tapınakları
G. Amerika, Peru, Titicaca Gölü ve Machu Picchu
G. Amerika, Bolivya, Titicaca gölü
Japonya, Fuji dağı zirvesi
(Yolculuğun akışına teslim olduğumuzda aklımızı ve yolumuzu esnek tutarak eksik ya da fazla başka mekanlara gitmemiz kuvvetle muhtemel.)
=========
Yeryüzü çakraları hakkında daha fazla bilgi:
Ziyaret edeceğimiz alanların kimileri küçük çakra denilen enerji girdap (vortice) alanları, kimileri ise ana çakralar denilen daha yüksek frekanstaki alanlar.
(İnsan bedeninde yedisi ana çakra olmak üzere toplam ~72,000 den fazla çakra var. Aynı durum Dünya içinde geçerli)
Bir dünya çakrasının içinde-üstünde bulunmanın ve orada meditasyon yapmanın insan bilincinin frekansını yükselten, duygu ağırlıklarını serbest bırakan, ruhani ve fiziksel olarak şifalandıran etkileri olduğu bilinmekte.
Niyetimiz bu çakraların enerjilerini ve olumlu etkilerini ses frekanslarına yükleyerek insanlara ulaştırmak.
Şu ana dek pek çok kimse ve guruplara ses ile şifa aktardık. Bu misyonu yerine getirebilmemiz için gerekli anlayış ve deneyimi edindik. Sanki bütün hayatımız boyunca kendimizi bu yolculuğa hazırlamışız gibi hissediyoruz.
=============
Gerekli Visalar, donanım, uçak biletleri, konaklama, yeme-içme düşünüldüğünde 70,000 Tl, yaklaşık 25,000 dolara ihtiyacımız olduğunu anladık.
Güzel haber, biz bu paranın bir kısmını biriktirdik.
Bu yolculuğun gerçekleşmesinde toplanması yeterli olacak olan miktar 42,000 Tl (15,000 USD)
 “‘Mucizeye Yolculuk’ bir Arzu Çiçeğidir.
Biz onun tohumunu, bir yeni ay gecesi evrenin kalbine ektik.
Edeceğiniz dua ve yapacağınız bağış ile bu çiçeğin güneş ışığı ve yağmur suyu olur musunuz?
 Çiçeğin büyümesinde ve açmasında katkınız olsun ister misiniz?”
Desteğiniz için hepinize ayrı ayrı şükranlarımızı sunarız.
Bütünün en yüksek hayrına olsun.
Ve öyle olsun…
Ve Öyle oldu…
Şükürler Olsun
(Şayet bu proje için gerekenden daha fazla miktarda para toplanacak olursa, onu da bir sonraki projemiz için kullanacağız: ‘Doğa içinde, yeşil bir alan edinmek, içine bir doğal ev ve birkaç Ti Pi (Amerikan yerli çadırı) kurmak; gönüllülerin organik çiftçiliğe yardımcı olacağı, gönüllülerin mutfağa ve diğer alanlara yardımcı olacağı; ruhani arayıştaki insanları bir araya getirecek; öz bilginin paylaşılacağı, şifanın akacağı ve bağış usulüyle işleyecek ütopik bir yaşam alanı oluşturmak. Ama bu hayat kitabının daha ilerleyen bir bölümü..)
~Hayat hikayemizi okumak isterseniz lütfen blog sayfamızı ziyaret edin:
http://journeyto-miracle.blogspot.jp/
Not*

Biliyoruz ki tüm yardımlarınız koşulsuz sevginizden, beklentisizce gelecek.
Yine de, Indiegogo toplu fonlama sisteminin geleneğinin yerini bulması için bizim de size ufak bir armağanımız olacak.
Tüm bağışlarınız için: İsminizi anarak hakkınızda hayırlar ve mutluluklar dileyeceğiz 
50 USD: Oracle card okuyarak yüksek benliğinizden, özünüzden size iletmemiz istenen bir mesajı ileteceğiz.
250 USD: Dilediğiniz bir Yeryüzü çakrasından bulacağımız özel bir taşı adresinize postalayacağız.
500 USD: 3 Yer yüzü çakrasında bulacağımız 3 taştan oluşan ufak bir kolleksiyonu adresinize postalayacağız. (Aşağıdaki video'da sizlere, bir yeryüzü çakrası olmasa da kendine has rahatlatan ve şifalandıran enerjisi olan , Japonya'daki küçük bir Bambu ormanının enerjisini sese dönüştürerek kaydettik. Lütfen kulaklık ile dinleyin. Sanki sesler dışarıdan değil, içinizden geliyormuşçasına...)

(

Not: Toplu fonlama sisteminin geleneğince bizim de size ufak bir armağanımız var kabul ederseniz.1 USD ve üstü bağışlarınız için: İsminizi anarak hakkınızda hayırlar ve mutluluklar dileyeceğiz :)50 USD: Oracle card okuyarak yüksek benliğinizden, özünüzden size iletmemiz istenen bir mesajı ileteceğiz.250 USD: Dilediğiniz bir Yeryüzü çakrasından bulacağımız özel bir taşı adresinize postalayacağız.500 USD: 3 Yer yüzü çakrasında bulacağımız 3 taştan oluşan ufak bir kolleksiyonu adresinize postalayacağız. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Japanese

ミラクルな旅

＂ミラクルな旅" へのクロウドフンディングは、この旅が、多くの人を、インスパイアし、より良きものへのサービスになるなと信じてくれた人たちのものです。
（もし、他の言語に、通訳をしても良いなと感じる方がいましたら、サポートをお願いします。ありがとうございます。）
これは、ソウルメイトカップルと4歳になる娘を連れて、４大陸を6ヶ月という長い旅をしてみようというお話です。
私たちは、ゆうか、ギョカン、まやです。
お母さん。お父さんと娘です。
私たちの、モチベーションは常に、どうしたら人は愛に目覚めてくれるのか、どうしたらそのようにインスパイアしていけるのか？です。
どうしたら、人びとに、彼ら自身の力や自由を取り戻してあげられるんだろう。ということにあります。
それは、
私たちがまずは、まっすぐに、生きることなんじゃないか。
ハートに従って生きることなんじゃないか。
私たちが、聖なるスピリット、神の声にハートから従うことなんじゃないか。ということなのではないか。
そこから本質的なことができるのではないかと思います。
＂ミラクルな旅”は、そういう旅なのではないかと感じています。
もっと言っておきたいことがあります。
私たちは、スピリチュルなヒーリングをしています。そして、スピリチュルな世界を音に変容させるサウンドヒーリングをしています。
私たちの旅は、アースチャクラを通ります。
（地球上で、高い振動数のエネルギーの場所）
私たちは、アースチャクラごとの、ユニークな振動数を音に変換して、後でサウンドファイルにして皆さんが聞けたり、ダウンロードできるようにしたいと思います。
このサウンドファイルで、皆さん瞑想などをして、浄化や、ヒーリングの効果が得られると思います。
私たちがやろうとしていること。
☆私たちの娘が4歳になるので、忘れられないプレゼントになるだろうということ。
☆地球の美しい場所は、新しい人に会うことで、自分達の深い記憶が蘇りよりよく、自分達としての役割を果たせるのではないかと感じていること。
☆地球のアースチャクラを訪れそこで、私たちのシャーマンドラムやチベタンシンギングボール、そして声のチャンティングをして皆さんがフリーで瞑想ができるようブログにアップしていくこと。
☆アースチャクラでの経験をブログで写真や、日記などで紹介していくこと。
☆私たちの体験や日記を一冊の本にまとめて出版するもしくは何かの形で発表すること。
☆この旅でのアースチャクラのレコーディングをひとつのCDにまとめて、CDアルバムを作ること。
私たちの旅の経験からより深い私たちの自己と繋がれると信じています。
…………………………………………………………………
"ミラクルな旅"は夢の花です。
私たちは、新月の日に、宇宙のハートにこの種を蒔きます。
あなたは、この夢に、水や太陽の光を与えてくれますか。
フンディングや祈りなどを通して、、
……………………………………………………………………
私たちは、２０１７年の３月１６日 ＡＭ ４:５５分からこの旅を始めようと思っています。
娘のまやの誕生日なのです。
★旅の予定★
トルコ     ギョベキ テペ （ 世界で初めての寺院）
ボスニア ピラミッド
アメリカ   シャスタ山
アメリカ   アリゾナ  セドナ
メキシコ    太陽のピラミッド  マヤの神殿
ペルー   チチカカ湖   マチュピチュ
ボリビア    チチカカ湖
日本            富士山
（この旅は、フローしていますので、状況により新しい場所に寄ったりしていく予定です。）
……………………………………………………………………
アースチャクラチャンティングについて。
旅の予定で訪れる場所は、いくつかは、地球上の小さなチャクラ、もしくは、メインチャクラと言われています。
その場所での瞑想は、人びとの意識や感情を浄化し向上させます。
私たちは、その場所のユニークな振動数と繋がり、ラトルやシャーマンドラム、チベタンシンギングボール、声のチャンティングなどを通して、皆さんが聞いて瞑想などができるようシェアしていきます。
今まで、私たちはサウンドヒーリングを多くの人たくさんのグループにやってきました。
そして、深い意識に貯蓄されたものを明らかにしたり、ミッションのための必要な経験を与えたりしてきました。
この経験は、私たち自身が、この次の段階へいく準備だったのかなと感じています。
私たちはこの旅で ２５０００USドル必要なのですが、私たちはすでに、今までの活動で１００００USドルは持っています。
あと、必要なのは、１５０００USドルです。
もしもですが、
お金がより多く集められたら、私たちには、次の夢もあります。大きな緑に囲まれた土地を、買って、ティピを建てて、創造的なことをしたり、休んだり、オーガニックな野菜を作ったり、ボランティアをしてくれる人や、ヨガや瞑想をしたり、ヒーリングをしたり、受けたり、イベントをしたり、バックパッカーの人が落ち合うような場所にしたり、スピリチュアリティに探求しているような人が来てくれたり、、
しかし、これは次の私たちの夢です。
今
私たちは、私たちの夢を叶えてくれようとしているひとりひとりに感謝しています。なぜならば、あなたの祈りが真実であると感じるからです。
あなたに、神のご加護がありますように。


indiegogo クロウドフンディングは、寄付をしていただいた方にプレゼントを贈る伝統があります。
もちろん、あなたの寄付は無条件の愛の元送っていただけているのは知っているのですが、、
1ドル　　あなたへのご加護をお祈りします。
50ドル　1オラクルカードリーディング
250ドル　アースチャクラのパワーストーンを１つあなたのお家に送りします。
500ドル　アースチャクラのパワーストーンを3つあなたのお家にお送りします。



Strong Wings
ライトワーカー　トルコ人
富豪の祖父母から遺産相続できなかったという両親から育ち、非常な貧困状態を幼少期に経験する。両親のステイタスを守るよう育てられ９年間大型船の２番キャプテンを務め妹などのイギリス留学学費なども算出する。
もともと霊性があり、２００８年ソウルメイトについてチャネリングで書いた小説 Gaak ve Baap を出版し、２０１１年この強い家族の絆から出ることを決め自ら書いた小説どおりに旅をすることをきめる。
２０１２年　１月　YUUKAとインドプシュカルであう。
小説には笛を吹いた着物を着たシャーマニックな女性という記載がありYUUKAは笛を吹き日本人で、シャーマニックなヒーリングをしていた。
インドで２回のビパサナ瞑想やウクライナ人のライトワーカーなどの出会いがあり、
自らの霊性を高める。
同年結婚。
その後本格的にヒーラーとして日本、トルコをベースに活動を開始。
シャーマンドラムやチベットのシンギングボールを使ってのヒーリング、ワークショップ
ソウルギャザリング。ヒーリングやチャネリング個人セッション、チャネリングワークショップなど。


YUUKA
ライトワーカー
幼少期より芸術、自然に興味があり、絵画などに親しみ、美術系の学校に進学。
同時に精神的な病にかかりこの世の中が
この次元だけでないことに気が付きエネルギーに敏感になり病のため学校を中退。
自分が社会で生きていけないことに苦しみ自転車で沖縄まで旅をしたり、１年間　タイ、インド、ネパールなどに旅をし、曼荼羅画家やチベットの僧侶、クリスタル　瞑想　コミュニティライフなど体験する。最後に訪れたハワイ島であなたは光を取り戻すために働く人なんだつまりは
ライトワーカーであるという啓示をうけ、そこからヒーリング、ライトワーク活動をはじめる。
同時期に舞や声でエネルギーを降ろすことができるようになる。
１２年間の活動ののちヨガの勉強でちょくちょく訪れていたインドでstrongwingsと会う。
２０１２年結婚　　２０１３年まやを出産
MAYA
２０１３年３月１６日産まれ
社会の枠の中で生きることを選択せず、出産もプライベートバース　自分たちだけでの出産を選び、肉や魚、卵の動物性のものをほぼ食さない子供。日本語、トルコ語、英語での環境で３か国言葉を習得中。
自分が欲しいもの、必要なものがあると現実化がとてもはやい。
０歳より国内外の旅を開始し、３歳の誕生日にはUFOが出現

story:
WELCOME ADVENTURER!

 

THANK YOU FOR VISITING OUR CAMPAIGN

 

 

OUR STORY

 

 

We are family company. Our goal is to create portable, multifunctional, easy to use and practical outdoor device.

 

Many of us thought that it is impossible to invent something new in outdoor food preparation.

 

 

But... Our Team has created the most revolutionary and innovative breaktrough in outdoor food making!

We are pleased to introduce the Bear... BEAR GRILL.

 

The Bear Grill is more than a regular grill.

It is the best and most powerful home appliance ever invented.

 

100% Manufactured in UE

 

 

OUR KEY OBJECTIVES

Grilling is a very pleasant activity as you can enjoy a nice time together with family and friends and eat some tasty food. 

 

 But we wanted to make take a huge step forward and extend this pleasant experience, not only to your backyard but to any place you wish to be.

 

 

 

 

To follow that we set goals to ourselves and we defined key objectives to make it happen:

 

 

 - Make Portable and Heavy Duty construction 

 

- Make it Easy to Use ( NO TOOLS required!) 

 

 

- Make it Multifunctional

 

- Allows Precise Control of Temperature

 

- Allow to Prepare All cuisine, All food 
 

- Limit costs of maintenance for Users


- Create add-ons and more opportunities for Users. 

 

- Make Design and Quality approved by Pro Chefs

 

 

WE DID IT! :)

Whole design, construction, optimizations and

tests took us almost 3 years. 

 

REAL BREAKTHROUGH

IN OUTDOOR FOOD MAKING

 

There is no other single device to provide such features:

 
1. MULTIFUNCTIONALITY
All cuisines, all food - only with BEAR GRILL 

you can cook almost anything.

 

 

 
Grill 


Barbecue

 
Conrolled Campfire

 
Boiling water for tea/coffee, soups, etc.

 

and much much more.

 

 

 

 

 

 

2. EASY TEMPERATURE CONTROL

and easy to add wood or charcoal (no burned hand and etc.)

 

 
 

3. PORTABILITY

Take BEAR GRILL with you - in car or camp or bus. 

You are lucky when you have 4x4 under your feet. 

 
4. EASY TO USE
Quick and easy to assemble (no tools required).
Real footage:

5. SAFE AND HEAVY-DUTY

BEAR GRILL will last for a very long time. No more "one season" purchase.

 

 

6. BOTTLE OPENER

Integrated with Hearth - very useful item in outdoor conditions.

With BEAR GRILL, it is impossible to lost it.

 

 

 

7. LOW COST OF MAINTENANCE

Save your money!

 

 

No charcoal, briquette or gas reqiured to purchase - to make food outdoor!

BEAR GRILL is heavy-duty cooking machine. It runs efficiently on natural wood, which you can find easily around you while spending time outdoor.
 
 

8. ANY CONDITIONS

 

All day fishing! Fishing on frozen lakes for many hours

    or winter grilling will be much comfortable and fun from now on.

 

 

 

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION

 

 

No compromise in design and materials has been made.

 

 

WEIGHT:

20 [kg]

 

 

OVERALL DIMENSIONS (assembled device):

Height: 747 [mm]

Grate diameter: 600 [mm]

Regulated high of hearth: [0-250] mm

 

 

MATERIALS (HIGH QUALITY):

Hearth enamelled

Stainless steel

Acid resistant steel 

Forge iron 

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

 

We took the hard work out of wood-fire cooking subject. 

Production is almost ready to go, but our production process is very limited since most of the works and parts are handmade. 

We need to boost our production process and we have plenty of new ideas to implement as well.

 

 

"I trully love when my dad makes burgers and other food for me" 

 

 

TYPICAL GRILLING PROBLEMS SOLVED

 

We  have solved typical problems with regular grills or barbecues:

 

DESIGNED FOR OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES

 

BEAR GRILL is designed to be used for outdoor activities mainly: fishing, camping, offroad activieties, family time and hunting.  

 

BEAR GRILL will be the jewel in your garden too.
 

BEAR GRILL combines features of grill, bbq, fireplace and many more.

 

 

Wherever you are and whatever the weather condition.

 

Now , you have an opportunity to make all food and cuisines 
with just one portable appliance. 

 

 

 

Whether you enjoy the outdoors, happy campers or just good old food lovers, Bear Grill will enrich your life. 

It will immediately become the major focal point wherever you stay.

 

 


With plenty of opportunities, the use of BEAR GRILL 

is only limited by your own imagination, 

 

Take BEAR GRILL with you, and it will be your best companion ever.

 

Take your family and friends into the great outdoors and and create the best days of their lives.

 
Take a tasty trip with Bear Grill. 
 

All my family and friends really enjoyed it. 

 

PRESS

 

We kept this project secret to prevent copying.

You'll be the first reviewer as an Owner.

You will not be disappointed.

Trust Us.

 

 

OUR TEAM

 

 

WE ARE READY FOR FIRST USERS

 

        Be first to have it!

 

RISK & CHALLENGES

 

The production is ready to go.

 

 

 

 

We work exceptionally hard to ensure your order is fulfilled on time.

 

 

PERKS

 

A. BEAR GRILL SET.

In the box you will get a BEAR GRILL SET which consist of:

 

1. Black enamelled Hearth with attached bottle openers.

2. Main leg assembly.

3. The "Mercedes" item - it holds grid.

4. Grid.

5. Multifunctional Holder.

6. Grate.

7. Bowl with chains.

8. User Manual and Guaranty.

9. Exclusive Recipes made by Pro Chef.

10. Some extra items ;)

11. Simple cover for device.

 

B. INDIVIDUAL PERMIUM MARK.

 

 

BON APPETIT!

 

Please, support us and share this content and link with your family and friends. 

Thank you!

story:
'Hi' and thanks for checking out our campaign! 

We are Wonca Longboards and we are pretty happy dudes.

Why? Because we are all good friends and working on this unique project that is our hobby and passion at the same time. All of us enjoy traveling around the globe, exploring new cultures and experiencing nature’s diversity while living a healthy and sustainable lifestyle.

In short: We love what we do and want to pass this love on to you – in the shape of a longboard.

The Team: Henning, Andreas, Tim, Alex & Sami 


Our Story and our challenge

When we built our first longboard a couple of years ago back in 2009, we didn’t really plan to actually do it in exchange for money. Nonetheless we continuously kept on developing our longboards with a lot of passion and ambition, because that’s what we love. The awareness and demand from our friends, friends of friends and others was constantly growing and encouraging us to find a way to create the best possible longboard one can think of, up to this very second and beyond.

So last year we finally decided to set up our very own company and by now we have established a great foundation to be able to produce enough high quality boards following our standards: handmade & eco friendly.

Unfortunately we appear to be hitting our financial limits as we have pretty much put all the money we own into our small company. That’s why we need YOUR help to give Wonca Longboards the push it needs.

So far we have been selling our longboards mainly locally but of course it is our goal to take these beauties across the boarders, out into this world and make more people happy. Who else other than YOU could help us better to accomplish this goal?

With your support we can go further, merge our creative minds, develop new shapes and improve the current boards even more. Right now we’re planning a downhill board and a fish shape. For the downhill board we would need a vacuum press, which we want to buy from the raised funds.


Wonca Organic Clothing

Our beloved friend Susi from Berlin is studying fashion design and created our first handmade hoodies and t-shirts. We are more than proud of wearing our very own handmade clothes.

Simply buying cheap t-shirts and having the Wonca logo printed on them is not our style. We believe in craftsmanship and eco-friendly products by all means. And we also want to give this handmade feeling to YOU!

If we achieve our goal, we are going to buy Susi her very own sewing machine and all the supplies she needs in order to create Wonca Longboards clothes and accessories with the passion and love that you deserve.




What We Need & What You Get


We’re looking for 15.000 Euro funding; since you get a very valuable product in return we obviously won’t get 15k in our pockets. But we could reduce our debt and use the funds for a new vacuum press, the development of new shapes and the start of an own handmade clothing line.  

As perks we offer you our beloved products for incredible prices.


Our Bongo King has the optimal size to carry it with you everywhere, even on a airplane in the carry-on luggage.


There is for instance the so-called Bongo King, a charming minicruiser that’s the perfect buddy no matter where you go. For our other boards and precise descriptions feel free to check out our website. (Find more information here: http://www.woncalongboards.de/products.php )



All the boards here on Indiegogo come with a COMPLETE SET UP 

That includes: Board, Grip tape, Bear or Wonca Trucks, Hawg Wheels, Bearings and a hand adjusted setting that suits your needs. Leave us a comment with your height, weight and drive preferences so we can adjust it even better for you! 

Our first downhill boards are reserved just for you. Make sure to be so hip and get one of the first ever-built Wonca downhill boards. 

No matter if we are going to reach our goal or not. Every single Wonca board that’s going to cruise in the streets within this world will make us happy. And if you are getting one of our shirts, sweatshirts or caps – you are already a legend!

In short – the funds will still be well invested in a sustainable enterprise and additionally it will make us very happy.

Lizard, Wizard and the Venom - our classic shapes.  Get them now here on Indiegogo for prices that are better than ever seen. And ever will be offered. 




Our promise to manage the challenges and deliver your board

We’ve been working hard to get to this point and can ensure you that all the ordered boards will be shipped out without any long lead times.

We have quite some stock ready and will press and finalize the rest of the boards as soon as the orders have arrived, as usual with our own hands and a lot of love and sweat. The downhiller is in construction and will be in your hands this summer. 

The same goes for our handmade & organic clothing line. Our lovely designer Susi will get a brand new sewing machine and is then ready to make your very unique t-shirt or sweatshirt.


Other Ways You Can Help

We totally understand that not everyone can contribute in a financial way and that is absolutely OK. But please help us spread the word and share our campaign with the sharing tools on this site and share our web and Facebook site with your friends. We really appreciate it. Keep on cruising and welcome to the family.

Your WONCA-Team
story_txt:
'Hi' and thanks for checking out our campaign! 
We are Wonca
Longboards and we are pretty happy dudes.
Why? Because we
are all good friends and working on this unique project that is our hobby and
passion at the same time. All of us enjoy traveling around the globe, exploring
new cultures and experiencing nature’s diversity while living a healthy and
sustainable lifestyle.
In short: We
love what we do and want to pass this love on to you – in the shape of a longboard.
The Team: Henning, Andreas, Tim, Alex & Sami 
Our Story and
our challenge
When we built
our first longboard a couple of years ago back in 2009, we didn’t really plan
to actually do it in exchange for money. Nonetheless we continuously kept on
developing our longboards with a lot of passion and ambition, because that’s
what we love. The awareness and demand from our friends, friends of friends and
others was constantly growing and encouraging us to find a way to create the
best possible longboard one can think of, up to this very second and beyond.
So last year we
finally decided to set up our very own company and by now we have established a
great foundation to be able to produce enough high quality boards following our
standards: handmade & eco friendly.
Unfortunately we
appear to be hitting our financial limits as we have pretty much put all the
money we own into our small company. That’s why we need YOUR help to give Wonca
Longboards the push it needs.
So far we have
been selling our longboards mainly locally but of course it is our goal to take
these beauties across the boarders, out into this world and make more people
happy. Who else other than YOU could help us better to accomplish this goal?
With your
support we can go further, merge our creative minds, develop new shapes and improve
the current boards even more. Right now we’re planning a downhill board and a
fish shape. For the downhill board we would need a vacuum press, which we want
to buy from the raised funds.

Clothing

friend Susi from Berlin is studying fashion design and created our first
handmade hoodies and t-shirts. We are more than proud of wearing our very own

the so-called Bongo King, a charming minicruiser that’s the perfect buddy no

check out our website. (Find more information here: http://www.woncalongboards.de/products.php )

story:
Campaign Update


RuggedPOD latest prototype came in Today (Feb, 27th 2015) in our office. Here are some pictures of the system with some early outdoor Deployment.

This Pod is using Cellular Fins based on pure Aluminium. Our Perks will received this technology which is improving heat exchange by 30% and reduce raw material usage by 25%.



RuggedPOD is a revolutionary modular computer chassis that doesn’t require any active cooling solutions, like air conditioners or humidity controllers to build datacenters. 

It follows the same principles used by the power transformers industry and is based on a sealed tank filled up with organic dielectric oil and electronics to create a new generation of computers.


1) Why RuggedPOD?

Today's datacenters are very expensive and complex tools, becoming unaccessible to new market comers, emerging countries and even mid-size owners. They are forming the Internet backbone, and deploying them at the right cost with relevant energy management is key. This is why we designed RuggedPOD.

2) RuggedPOD goals

Our goals are to limit as much as possible datacenter wastes and costs by reaching:

  • a Power Usage Effectiveness (PUE) of 1,
  • a Water Usage Effectiveness (WUE) of 0, 
  • an optimal Carbon Usage Effectiveness (CUE) by using energy harvesting
  • a minus 1 US$ cost per VM (1VPCU/1GB/20GB SSD) 
  • a fast and easy deployment of critical computing resources
and publishing our technology through an open hardware program to which you can participate.

We successfully achieved these by leveraging true free cooling with outdoor computing, and a 2 years R&D program.

3) Who are we ?

Experts in the data centers design and in disruptive products, we created various computers focused on energy efficiency (including fastest fanless PC in the world, and the first server to break 1Gflops/W on the Linpack benchmark).

4) RuggedPOD: The five benefits !

a) True Free Cooling:

  • No air conditioning
  • No water usage or humidity control

Incredible but true!


b) Everywhere: you can use your RuggedPOD outdoor or indoor.

Yes you can use RuggedPOD in desert, in high humidity jungle,  on country side fields, or roofs, as long as it is protected against direct sun light.


c) Eco Friendly : 100% of the electricity brought to RuggedPOD is used by electronic devices. The RuggedPOD is fully recyclable. Moreover we have reduced the maximum power consumption of any electronics parts.



d) Quick and Easy deployment : adaptive, modular, with easy redeployment and dismantling.

e) Standard electronic devices and easy upgrade: support Mini and Micro ATX boards ! Compatible with: Openstack, Windows, Linux, etc.


f) Next Steps: Exploring energy harvesting

- Heat up greenhouses

- Heat up district buildings.

- Create free electricity with TEG devices.


5) Summary.

RuggedPOD datacenter benefits:


Now we want to start RuggedPOD industrialization to introduce this revolution to the market. 


6) Perks: save money by becoming an early adopter!

-  Ready to start RuggedPOD including full RuggedPOD chassis and electronic devices! We can install the software that you want! Ready to try ?

- RuggedPOD "chassis only" without electronic devices : 899$ Save 400$.  The entry level solution for advanced users. Street price is 1299$

- RuggedPOD ( chassis, power supply 600 watts, oil, 2xpumps, remote management card,  sealed cables) , without electronic devices : 1199$ Save 600$.  The best to begin and try this new vision. Street price is 1799$

- RuggedPOD ( chassis, power supply 600 watts, oil, 2xpumps,  remote management card, sealed cables ) , with electronic devices : 6999$ Save 3000$.  Ready to use and to install. 322 VMs capability. The street price is 9999$. The configuration is based on 8 cores AMD FX9370, 64GB DDR3 ECC memory and 1TB SSD per node.

- Reserve now 1 RuggedPOD ( chassis, power supply 600 watts, oil, 2xpumps, card remote management, cable sealed ) and pay later: 599$: By reserving now for 599$, we will guarantee you a total price of $1199 per unit. Pay the remaining $600 balance before delivery. Quantities are limited and pricing will go up as the next pricing level is reached.

The following systems are RuggedPOD ( chassis, power supply 600 watts, oil, 2xpumps,  remote management card, sealed cables ) volume offers:

- Ready to put in production : 4 RuggedPOD! 4 579$ Save 2 617$ ( starter solution ) without electronic devices ( you are free to choose your computing configuration ). The street price is 7 196$.

- Ready to put in production: 8 RuggedPOD! 8 999$ Save 5 393$ ( silver solution ) without electronic devices ( you are free to choose your computing configuration). The street price is 14 392$

- Ready to put in production: 16 RuggedPOD! 17 799$ Save 10 985$ ( gold solution ) without electronic devices ( you are free to choose your computing configuration ). The street price is 28 784$.

- Ready to put in production: 24 RuggedPOD! 26 689$ Save 16 487$ ( Titanium solution) without electronic devices (  you are free to choose your computing configuration ). The street price is 43 176$.

- Ready to put in production:  48 RuggedPOD! 52 799$ Save 33 553$ ( Best way to earn money ) without electronic devices ( you are free to choose your computing configuration ). The street price is 86 352$.


7) How will we use your money?

-  Prepare RuggedPOD for production and produce the required tools

-  Produce first RuggedPOD units

-  Make RuggedPOD known by a wider audience

- Pay Indiegogo

- Give two RuggedPOD for charity


8) Project timeline



9) Why crowdfunding?

First: we want to deliver RuggedPOD  worldwide! In every country. We want that all people can leverage RuggedPOD benefits to share internet and technology development. 

Second: We could have partner with big companies to help us but we prefer to have direct contact with our early adopters, that we hope you will be part of.


10) Meet us!

In March, the team will be in the US. If you have interest to see the product and to talk with us, you are welcome to visit our booth during Open Compute Summit in San Jose on march 10th and 11th or contact us for a private meeting during this period in Silicon Valley. You will see a live RuggedPOD running !


11) History.

RuggedPOD project history: we began with a simple idea to test RuggedPOD concept following theoretical works. "Do it yourself !"

We began to buy raw material in a local DIY store. We wanted to demonstrate that this idea is valid.


It works ! We successfully displayed and introduced this early prototype during OCP Summit Europe in October 2014.



12) The Team.

Jean-Christophe VOLKAERTS : campaign leader

Feel free to contact me, send me a mail : jcv(at)splitted-desktop.com

Jean-Marie VERDUN: crazy architect

Jean-Jacques CHANUT: mechanical designer

Farshia KAMALOUDINE: shy electrical engineer

Maxime TERRAS: handy man

Sabrina COLAUTTI: handy girl


13) Partners.

We have a lot of technology partners on this project. They help us by giving free sample for our prototypes as well as technicals specifications, and datas.

-  MSI

-  Intel

-  HGST

-  Crucial by Micron

-  Be Quiet

-  WD

- AMD


14) How can I influence the development of RuggedPOD? 

Please contact JC at jcv(at)splitted-desktop.com. He will answer quickly and promote your idea to the RuggedPOD team.

15) FAQ.
After sales
We will be there for you
- during the project
- after the project
We will help you to deploy your RuggedPOD in order to prepare your NextGen Datacenter. After your purchase, we will send you an email where you will find the contacts and names of technical support people. We are established in France since 2006.
Are shipping costs included in the Perk price ?
No. After your order and when the project will be done, we will send you an email to prepare the shipping and how much it will cost through our services. You will be free to choose the best solution for you between our proposal our using your own carrier.
Does the Perk price include VAT or other taxes?
All prices are VAT and taxes excluded. For France, we need to add 20% for VAT. For another country, we will first ask your shippping address, and then we will tell if VAT and taxes are applicable.

Which countries?

The regions and countries where the campaign is applicable are: Europe, Norway, Switzerland, United States, Canada, India, China, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Japan, South Korea, Russia, Australia, Brazil, Peru, Middle East.

What is the shipping fare?

The estimated price is:

For France: 109€ VAT included for 1xRuggedPOD without electronic device.

After you bought the RuggedPOD, we prepare the price of delivery.

We need to wait the end of the campaign to ask for the best price to our carrier !

Please contact us for another countries.


16) Datasheet

- Name: RuggedPOD

- Brand: Horizon

- Version: RP1

- Made in France

- EAN:3760168440199

- Size: 39,6 x 35,6 x 39,6 cm

- Max operational humidity: 100%

- Operational temperature: between -20°C (-4°F) to 40°C(95°F)

- Waterproof compliance: IP68

- Accessory included ( not for the RuggedPOD at 899$ ):

x1 Powersupply 600 watts / x1  remote management card / x4 motherboards support blade / oil ( Shell Diala S3-ZXI, IEC60296, IEC62535 and ASTM D1275B )

- Electronic device (s): not included.

- Important: no  directly sunlight on RuggedPOD
- Major raw material: aluminium
-  Warranty: 10 years for tank, 5 years for oil, 2 years for electronic devices.
