story:
Grow your own healthy nutritious food right outside your door!  The GroBucket is the most versatile, economical, and easiest to use growing system on the planet. The insert transforms any 4, 5, or 6 gallon bucket into the ultimate self-watering container garden that can be used indoors and out. The 5 gallon size is ideal for most garden plants, house plants & ferns, flowers, and even dwarf fruit trees. The water level indicator tells you when your plant needs water, no more guess work. The one gallon reservoir protects the plants from even the most neglectful owner.

Grow your own food even in an Apartment! (Blueberrie and Lemon Tree on Apartment Balcony)

Click on the video below for an overview:

GroBucket Irrigation Kit (Never Water Again!)

Healthy & virtually maintenance free ferns!
 
Citrus Trees Planted in GroBuckets (Grow oranges, lemons, limes, & kumquats)
 
GroBuckets ready for planting.
 

It is probably easier to say what can't be grown in a GroBucket. Nearly any garden vegetable can be grown in the GroBucket including tomatoes, pepper, carrots, squash, watermelon, beans, potatoes, okra, cabbage, greens, herbs, and many more. Dwarf fruit trees like lemon, lime, kumquat, and oranges as well as shrubs like blueberry bushes do well in GroBuckets. They are also great for house plants. You can also grow nearly any flower.

There is quite a wide selection of plants available at your local nursery or garden center, but that is only scratching the surface. The average heirloom seed catalog has over 200 pages, but that is still a very limited offering of each type of plant. There are over 3000 varieties of heirloom tomatoes alone. The possibilities are endless. One of the most rewarding aspects of gardening is growing a fruit, vegetable, or herb that you can't buy in a local store.

  • Grow in small spaces. (Great for Apartments)
  • No more weeding.
  • Its the most affordable self watering system on the market.
  • Perfect size for nearly any garden plant.
  • No more forgetting to water or over-watering.
  • Grow year round.
  • Less susceptible to pests.
  • Garden in seated position for mobility impaired.
  • Made in the USA from recycled material.
  • It's portable and easy to move.
  • Space saving, each bucket takes up only one square foot.
  • Compact storage, buckets and insert stack.
  • Optional irrigation system eliminates watering.
  • Great for schools, each child can have their own GroBucket.
  • No more plant sitters needed for travelers.
  • Perfect for small spaces, even Tiny Houses and RVs.
  • Use indoors without the mess, no more saucers or drip trays.
  • Easily painted to match any decor.
  • The14 inch soil depth makes it more versatile that similar products on the market.

Beginners: Gardening can be intimidating. There is so much to know, like the makeup of the soil, pH, soil amendments, when to water, plant spacing, where to plant and so on. GroBucket will help you be successful the first time.

Advanced Gardeners: GroBuckets will allow you to augment your garden, extend your growing season, overwinter plants, isolate plants for seed saving, move plants to take advantage of optimal conditions, isolate and quarantine sick plants, get an early start to the season, and grow indoors to enjoy gardening year round.

  • GroBuckets pay for themselves many times over.
  • Grow your own food - the average tomato plant produces over 25 lbs of tomatoes.
  • Heirloom tomatoes sell for $3 to $4 per pound.
  • No more paying for someone to water your plants while your away.
  • No more replacing dead plants you forgot to water.
  • GroBuckets require no garden tools.
  • GroBuckets can last for many seasons Overwinter perennials like pepper plants and don't buy new plants the next season.
  • Grow expensive herbs for a fraction of the cost.
  •  If you move your garden can move with you. No more replanting.

Risks and challenges

Product Design, Development, Testing, Project Management, is what we do in our every day jobs. We have all the details worked out even down to the custom packaging for each pack optimized to minimize shipping cost.

Our injection mold tooling is already on order and we will be molding parts by the end of July.  It a little later than we wanted, but the good news is that the GroBucket is a year around growing device.  Here are some ideas for late in the growing season:

  • Plant a second vegetable crop in the southern zones
  • Plant fall vegetable like greens, broccoli, and winter squash
  • It almost fall Mum season, plant Mums outside your front door.
  • December is a great time to plant small living Christmas trees and Poinsettias.
  • Overwinter perennials such as pepper plants. 

The good news is, no matter when you get your GroBucket kits, you will be able to use them right away. You will also get many years of use out of them -- they are designed to last!

story:
Help reach £15k today!

OK, maybe our initial target was ambitious... but the great news is that with your support we are well on our way to getting the prototype kranog up and running. We just need to reach £15k today! With other investors lined up to double your contribution, when this campaign ends in a few hours time we will then move into phase 2 of the funding process. This will involve finalising the supplier and installation orders, interior design plans and time schedule so that we can take confirmed forward bookings.

So don't delay - contribute today and together we will make eco-cabin history!

 

The Kranôg - off grid living with nature, anywhere!

Hello! We are Andrew and Fiona, two Scottish entrepreneurs passionate about changing the world of holiday accommodation, especially the lodge and mobile home sector. We would love you to join us as we build the prototype Kranôg!

The cabin of the future, now

The Kranôg brings together existing off-grid technologies to create something that has never been done before: a luxury, design-led, off-grid cabin, utilising 100% renewable energy and rainwater and making zero harmful emissions to the environment. As the design is modular and doesn’t need intrusive foundations, it can easily be located anywhere using normal farm machinery (no cranes necessary!) and it falls within ‘light touch’ mobile-home planning regulations. This means that it also opens up new possibilities for rural and remote communities to earn a living from tourism without spoiling the landscape and environment that visitors come to enjoy.

Sustainable, design-led, celtic roots

Inspired by ancient Scottish bronze-age dwellings (Crannogs), the Kranôg is designed to connect people with their environment; visually, but also by challenging guests to think about how they use resources. Guests will be able to easily monitor their power and water use. If they are running low they will be able to top up using a manual pump, or reduce electricity consumption by turning off devices. 

The unit is 100% Scottish designed and built. It is built to last, with a certified design life of at least 80 years. We are especially proud of the toilets: the guest just sees a normal clean flushing toilet. But follow the pipes and you come to a box of magic where native creatures will be going about their business to dispose of your business!

The exterior design of the prototype Kranôg is largely wood and is unashamedly clean and minimalist so that the natural environment can take centre stage. Large areas of glass, covered and outside plaswood deck made from recycled plastics ensure that you are fully connected to your natural surroundings. The prototype will also feature a wood-fired hot-tub. It will be sited with stunning views of the hills surrounding Comrie Croft and good privacy from the surrounding vegetation and landforms. 

The prototype interior is being designed by one of Scotland’s leading young designers. She will create a quirky, cosy, and luxurious feel, while keeping it healthy and highly practical as a base for outdoor activities and families. Materials used will mostly be up-cycled, such as old bike parts, and natural materials. 

Your part?

The first prototype Kranôg will cost £150,000 to build. That includes minimal site preparation, off-site prefabrication, installation and interior design. Funding has been secured from our partners, but we still need £70,000. 

We have a range of unique perks that you won't find anywhere else, for anyone who is able to contribute. These include eco-luxury breaks in the Kranôg itself, or perks that make an ideal gift such as tree planting and your name (or the name of a loved one) inscribed on the Kranôg Founders Wall. 

Every £ raised will go towards the prototype Kranôg even if we don’t reach our funding goal. In that scenario we may have to take on personal loans ourselves – whatever happens we are 100% committed to making this happen. 

Our approach has been to pre-empt the risks to this project. A maximum price contract is in place for the build – this means that the total cost cannot go above £150,000, but cost savings may be possible. If we do save costs we will invest these in additional features. The Kranôg is specifically designed to fall within the same ‘light touch’ regulatory framework as mobile homes. Specifically, we have made sure that the Kranôg will comply with planning, building and environmental health regulations and we have the professional backing to ensure it will continue to do so as the project progresses.

Join us!

Besides the 'money can't buy' perks, join us in this endeavour and you will be doing a lot of good: Helping to develop two Scottish businesses (Kranôg Ltd and Comrie Croft Ltd) with strong social and environmental goals; and introducing a world first in the cabin and mobile-homes market that could make a difference to communities and the environment around the world.

Our track records are ideal for this project: Kranôg Ltd is a young company with strong foundations in responsible tourism. Comrie Croft is an award-winning community of eco-rural enterprises. The Croft has built a reputation for sustainable stewardship of the land and environment, and maximising community social and economic benefit. We are doers who get things done!

You can still support the Kranôg even if you can’t contribute financially – sharing this campaign on your social networks will give the campaign a big boost. Use the Indiegogo share tool and help us make some noise about our campaign!

Specifically, we have made sure that the Kranôg will comply with planning, building and environmental health regulations and we have the professional backing to ensure it will continue to do so as the project progresses.Join us!Besides the 'money can't buy' perks, join us in this endeavour and you will be doing a lot of good: Helping to develop two Scottish businesses (Kranôg Ltd and Comrie Croft Ltd) with strong social and environmental goals; and introducing a world first in the cabin and mobile-homes market that could make a difference to communities and the environment around the world.Our track records are ideal for this project: Kranôg Ltd is a young company with strong foundations in responsible tourism. Comrie Croft is an award-winning community of eco-rural enterprises. The Croft has built a reputation for sustainable stewardship of the land and environment, and maximising community social and economic benefit. We are doers who get things done!You can still support the Kranôg even if you can’t contribute financially – sharing this campaign on your social networks will give the campaign a big boost. Use the Indiegogo share tool and help us make some noise about our campaign!

story:
wolftraders usa  is pleased to bring you the world patented "turbocot" hammock style cot system.. the turbocot is the easiest cot in the world to setup, and is so comfortable.  It feels like you are sleeping in a hammock, but with added support that only a cot can give while still keeping you off the ground, away from the cold, bugs and dirt!  We've taken all of the pain and hassle out of your standard cot.  Yes, the old standard cot that makes you "swear at it" while setting it up, is now a thing of the past!!, say hello to "turbocot"  its patented design(s) makes set-up and take down a breeze!

 

 

the turbocot suspension lets you setup just about anywhere u want! :)  

 

Say hello to the TurboCot by WolfTraders.  Unlike most other crowdfunding projects, we've already sold our first truckload of turbocots.  We took them to trade-shows, and sold to some outdoor retailers with great response... they all want more!!   Now, we want to get this product out to the masses, but we need your help to make that happen. We are working out of my brothers garage, we have another order of turbocots on the way, but this won't be enough and we now have so many more people that want our products with no way to get them made.. We hope you will step aboard and join the "wolfpak" we know you will love our products as others already have. We are excited about the possibilities that we can achieve with your backing support! 

 

setup & takedown so easy it's FUN!

suspended hammock style comfort 19" above the ground

ever wanted to take a nap by the river?

smart, functional & elegant!

 

 

 

 

 

all black turbocot

easy as 1-2-3 :) nothing better than a simple sleeping system!

olive green turbocot

 

 

turbocot has unique patented saddlebag straps built right in! Now that's genius... never lose your earrings, phone, flashlight, etc... and finding them is a snap, even in the dark!... when it's time to go, the saddlebag gear straps wrap around your turbocot with ease, and keep it secure for storing and packing up!

We have built in buckle straps to the bottom of the saddle bags, versus the velcro straps you see in traditional cots, allowing the cot to remain tight during transport or while in storage.

 

 

Ever sleep on a cot that feels stiff and uncomfortable? The turbocot has no cross-bars from top to bottom, left to right!, which means it feels like sleeping on a hammock!  Cumbersome crossbars on other cots at the top and bottom and even the middle make a good night's sleep hard to find! Now you no longer run the risk of bruising your head or feet, or wake up with numbness! The contour hammock design allows you to lie down, and feel comfortable, no rolling around and making creaking noises all night long!

 

 

guaranteed mega comfort with "no crossbar" technology

 

 

no crossbars means more fun!!!

 

 

The foot-tab was designed and implemented to assist in taking down the cot. While stepping on the tab, simply pull up on the handle and the cot will collapse into its most compact position.

 

 

 

coolgrip handles on both sides for easy pickup and handeling

 

 

Wt. Capacity: 350lbs./158kg Frame/Mat Dimensions: 79"x29"x19"H ( 200x73x48Hcm) Folded: 37"x8"x6" (94x20x15cm) Wt: 25lbs/55kg Frame made from 25 x 16 x .7mm steel tubing I bed fabric from heavy duty 600D polyester with a PVC coating 

 

Material closeup

 

Logo embroidery

 

There are always challenges & obstacles that arise in production, and product design. We hope to have already overcome those as this is already our second production run on the turbocots. "theboyz" from WolfTraders have designed & built premium outdoor gear for a combined 30 years and have sold worldwide for past companies & products we helped develop.. Wolftraders is our own brainchild! We are 100% confident in our ability to deliver incredible products for your outdoor lifestyle. We have developed many products with patented innovative designs with Unique flavor that have seen tremendous growth & success!

Being in the outdoor industry as long as we have, we have built a vast network of suppliers, manufacturers and distributors all over the world. We have connections others only dream about. You can be 100% confident in our ability to overcome challenges that may arise as our #1 goal is the satisfaction of our customers. We strive daily to offer you the highest quality product that you can use over and over for many years to come.

***All EARLY BIRD backers are guaranteed to have their rewards shipped once the campaign ends!!***

Please help us get the word out and share with your family, friends and coworkers!!

story:
Who we are

Created by a group of respected journalists and wildlife travel professionals, Safarious started as an online forum to bring enthusiasts and experts in conservation and wilderness tourism together in one place. Under the stewardship of veteran South African journalists, Tony Weaver and Anton Crone, It has evolved into a highly respected news source for conservation issues and a key resource for wilderness travel.

Safarious has attracted an audience of passionate conservationists, wilderness travellers, and travel professionals, and with your help we can turn it into the go-to-place for people who are passionate about conserving and travelling to the world's wild places.

Over time we've added loads of useful tools and features:

  • A professionally-curated online magazine and news desk which is garnering more and more respect in the conservation and wilderness travel world.
  • Enhanced self-publishing tools so our community can post travel stories and images in a quality format.
  • In-depth country guides for travel research.
  • In April this year we added an exciting new travel portal where visitors can search for  accommodation and experiences, build their own itineraries and recruit travel operators to help make their dream trips come true. 

Why we're asking for funding

To promote ethical journalism

We see a dire lack of well-balanced, informative journalism available on conservation, wilderness travel and local communities. Readers are often exposed to a mad clutter of opinions and misinformation, reports that are funded by organisations with vested interests, news that is sensationalist or fake, and unethical publications that steal material from the original sources.

We aim to be the antidote to this. It's important to have funding to pay professional journalists and news sources such as Reuters and AFP. Your support can help us achieve this so our readers get the best possible information on our website. 

To avoid advertising

Ours is a community-focused website. We don't offer advertising space because we don't want to be led by marketing agendas. It also means we keep our website clean and easy to navigate. Without advertising funding we need an alternative source of income.

The bottom line

We calculate that we need US$60,000 for the next twelve months for our magazine and news desk to be fully operational. We will renew this campaign after twelve months if successful to keep the momentum going. 

Funds will go towards:

  • Paying professional journalists
  • Paying respected news sources
  • Web development and maintenance

The Impact

With your support we can raise the standard of journalism in the world of conservation and wilderness travel and educate the public on the real conservation issues that need attention.

What if we don't reach our funding goal?

We will do our best with the funds we are given to maintain and improve our standard of content.

Contributor Perks

Photographic prints

Choose from a selection of limited edition photographic prints to decorate your home, office or lodge.

 

 

Check out this gallery of prints on offer, then select your favourite images from the Perks on right. 

"Sunbird" by Anton Crone

"Launch" by Anton Crone

"Kunene Dust" by Michael Lorentz

"Lady on the Path" by Michael Lorentz

"Askari" by Michael Lorentz

"Abyssinian Red" by Michael Lorentz

"African Textures" by Sarah Crone

"Weave Africa" by Anton Crone

"Siblings" by Sarah Crone

"Omo Woman" by Michael Lorentz

"Omo Debonair" by Michael Lorentz

"Djenné Girl" by Anton Crone

"Ethiopian Klimt" by Michael Lorentz

 

Other Ways You Can Help

As a way of contributing to our campaign professional photographers can contact us with images they would like to offer for sale as perks. 

If you can’t contribute but believe in our campaign, we would be most grateful if you would share this campaign on your social networks.

story:
Black Crow Tours is a backpacking inspired tour company.  

We focus on genuine cultural experiences, meeting fun local people, and unique destinations; all while providing the best tour package value.

 

Available before our website even opens...

Our upcoming Kilimanjaro Climb! 

 

 
 

12 DAY TRIP - from $4000 with flight* 

- Two day Flight to Kilimanjaro Airport 
- 2 Days in Moshi exploring and preparing for the climb 
- 6 Day Kilimanjaro Climb 
- 1 Day in Moshi to rest and catch whatever we've missed! 
- Overnight Flight Home

 

16 DAY TRIP - from $5000 with flight* 

- Two day Flight to Kilimanjaro Airport 
- 2 Days in Moshi exploring and preparing for the climb 
- 6 Day Kilimanjaro Climb 
- 1 Day in Moshi to rest 
- 3 Day Safari to the Ngorongoro crater and much more 
- 1 Day in Moshi to catch whatever we've missed! 
- Overnight Flight Home

 

OUR TRIP INCLUDES:

- A Complete Mountain tour; with local guides, cooks and porters! 
- Pro-tips to get you ready ahead of time 
- Mountain lodge when not on the mountain
- All flights and transfers 
- Some incredible optional day trips
- Tent 
- Sleeping bag 
- Sleeping Pads 
- Cooking Equipment (and we do all the cooking!) 
- ALL Food on the mountain 
- Chairs, tables, and utensils 
- Oxygen (Just in case) 
- And other medical supplies (better to be safe)

 

Does NOT include:

-Personal gear (Packing suggestion list coming soon! Will focus on saving money and 'bang for the buck' items.)

-Local guide tips (Usually works out to around $300. But should only give if you are 100% satisfied! You will be though, don't worry :-)

-Food outside of the mountain  (Meals in Moshi or in the airport or whatever) 

-Gifts for friends and family 

 

More Details: 

Our first trip is February 1st!

After the deposit, you will be automatically entered into even monthly payments... starting September 1st, when our site goes live.  The trip total has to be paid in FULL December 1st. 

On September 1st, we will also send our terms and ask where you're flying from. 

The total trip cost will also be calculated after finding out which airport you want to fly from (prices above are quoted from JFK, could be more or less... trip prices will be adjusted accordingly). 

A bunch of bonus stuff will also be added to the trip;  
- Our Tour Director will be carrying professional video equipment, and is going to make a crazy video of the trip for FREE. 

- We have an awesome waterfall - coffee plantation warm-up hike planned out for you guys before the actual Kilimanjaro climb.

- And much more yet to be announced.

 

Any more questions? Please contact us!

 

Check out the full Itinerary

 
 

Why Indiegogo?

As you can imagine... websites, databases, software API installs, trip research, branding, and media creation are quite expensive. 

The purpose of this campaign is to use future profits for the website and administrative costs now. 

ALL of our funds will be going to developing and making our website the best most user friendly site we can make it. If we met or exceed our goal, we will also be making native apps so that people can easily access all of their trip's information from anywhere. 

We want to share the joys of backpacking with the world. To do that, we have our amazing trips but also want our site to be a window to the world of backpacking. Even if you decide to travel alone (without our services), we want to inspire and help you with your travels.

 

 

By giving to our campaign, you can select from one of our great perks!
Our Merch is custom designed by Lexi Quinn (Our Product Designer).
Each item was meticulously created with hours of thought and love poured into every piece.

Casual Tee Shirt

 

3D Printed Keychain

 

Your Impact

When we started Black Crow Tours, we did so with a purpose... to share the joys of backpack and to give back to our world. Jesse and I were both incredibly blessed in our upbringings, unfortunately all are not so lucky. 

A percent of profits are always given to charities of our choosing. We do not say this for grandstanding, to be 'eco-friendly tours', or any sort of marketing really; it's just a matter of personal principle and you have a right to know where your money is going. 

We've recently partnered up with the Amani Children’s Home in Moshi, Tanzania. So a small percent will be going there and to a environmental/animal rights charity yet to be determined.

 

A larger percent will be going toward the website: background systems, databases,  security, and some new cutting edge media ideas we had to get people really excited for the trips. 

Not just our trips, but for travel in general. 

Travel has so greatly effected our lives, that it's only nature we give back. We both solemnly agree that the world would be a much more peaceful, open, and accepting place... if other just traveled more. And not just travel, but truly engage with one another. 

This is our goal as a company, and where your funds are going. 

 

Whats next? 

If you want a life changing trip, book our Kilimanjaro climb now... and save an automatic $200 just for helping us out. 

If you're an amazing parent or friend (seriously amazing we'd say), book this trip for a friend**. 

 

Can't afford or not interested? 

Get some of our cool merch! 

or if you want to help without donating or paying... 

Sharing our Campaign or even our Facebook page would be seriously wonderful and we offer a thousand thanks! 

Thanks even for taking the time to read this! We honestly and truly appreciate it. 

 

Office stuff

* - Flight price is quoted from JFK, actual price may vary depending on actual departure location.

** - When booking a  trip for another person; the reciprocate must be in our required age demographic (Ages 21-35) and must agree to our terms following the transfer of deposit.

story:
Thank you for your interest.  As of Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015, we are asking people to stop contributing to this campaign.  We will not be going forward with seeking additional funding and are closing the business.  Thank you, Jake and Nick.



The Bull City Bike Park Story  

Let us introduce ourselves and our story. We are Jake Dolan and Nick Brown, the founders of Bull City Bike Park, Inc. Passionate cyclists with business experience running retail stores and bike shops, we launched this business to develop a large-scale, indoor mountain bike park in Durham, NC. We hope that bringing a marquee cycling project to Durham will enhance the Triangle cycling scene.            


The park will welcome riders of all abilities. At any given time, you might discover cyclists ranging from balance-biking kids to youth cycling on teams and in camps to families and friends looking for fun and fitness to mountain bikers and BMX riders pushing their skills to the next level.  Our motto describes how we see the genesis of Bull City Bike Park:

We build it together by helping fund, design and create it.  

We ride it together by coming for the day or becoming members and sharing the park with our families and friends.

We have fun together by enjoying an indoor playground for bikes where we can all feel like kids again.

This Indiegogo crowd-funding campaign will help in three important ways to launch this business. Firstly, it will spread the story of Bull City Bike Park. Secondly, it will demonstrate customer-demand and in doing so convince investors to back the idea. Lastly, it will raise the startup funds to help secure our location.  Please contribute what you can and invite your friends, family and riding communities to do the same.  Thanks.


What We Need & What You Get

For this round of funding we are aiming for $50,000.  The initial goal  is to raise funds to help secure a location.  Perhaps even more importantly, active participation at this stage will show potential investors that there is widespread demand for an indoor mountain bike park in Durham.  The more supporters we have, the better business case we have for investment in the project and the more likely we are to get the additional funding necessary to get the doors open.

To make this more exciting for our crowd funders, we are offering some fun perks to go along with our fundraising.  The perks will range from branded Bull City Bike Park gear to park passes and memberships for individuals or families.  Every donation helps make the business case; higher donations earn bigger perks.  Check out our perks and please give what you can.  Thanks.

 Bull City Bike Park Logo Stitch Hat


The Impact

We hope to build a hub for cycling in the Triangle, a place that people come to ride, get exercise, grow their skills and spend time with friends and family.  We also want it to be a place where bike-related non-profits can hold events and build bicycling advocacy. We need your help to make this happen!

North Carolina is a great place to ride.  But are enough people looking for an alternative to the gym, a place to grow their skills, learn to be better riders and ride in any weather, any time of the year?  We need to prove that there are enough of us who want this park.  Crowd funding allows us to build excitement in the community, spread the word about this project and create a strong business case for further investment.

We hope that you will not only be able to make a donation but that you will also connect us to others who would like to make Bull City Bike Park a reality.  You may only be able to give $20; however, if you share our information with others like a riding club or parents looking for great camps, you could multiply your impact!  The indoor mountain bike parks that exist around the country draw visitors from around the world.  We think that the Triangle deserves just such a destination!


Risks & Challenges

Opening any new business has lots of risks.  We have identified three main risks as we developed our business plan.  The first is the normal challenge of covering all of the costs of running the business--insurance, advertising, rent, taxes, employee costs, etc.  As we wrote the business plan, we discovered that bigger is better.  A larger park has some challenges. It is more expensive, takes longer to build and it is harder to find suitable locations.  But the benefits outweigh these risks.  More people can ride at the same time and the park can provide more types of riding areas.  We also have room to continue to add and update features without closing the park.  More space means that we can accommodate lots of riding levels and have plenty of interesting terrain for every type of rider.

As we looked at the business obstacles, we saw that the second and third major challenges are actually connected--acquiring funding and customers.  Advertising this kind of business with the normal marketing strategies is prohibitively expensive.  Of course, we will do some advertising, but we needed to find a different way to engage our core customer base.  This connection is why we chose to lead this project with a crowd-funding campaign instead of first securing other funding, beginning to build and then looking for customers.  We will use this crowd-funding campaign to simultaneously gauge our customer base, reach potential new customers and justify the investments in the business.  Please help us make the business case.


Other Ways You Can Help

Contributing money is not the only way you can support Bull City Bike Park.  In the short term, spreading the word to as many people as you can is the single biggest help.  In the long-term, we want to hear from you during the design phase and would love to have you join us during the building phase.  As we did in the demo park, we plan to use volunteer labor to speed up the building phases, keep costs down and create a park that reflects our community desires.

So please share our story and stay connected to the campaign through our social media sites and the website links below as we build Bull City Bike Park together.

Thanks for your support.
story_txt:
Thank you for your interest.  As of Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015, we are asking people to stop contributing to this campaign.  We will not be going forward with seeking additional funding and are closing the business.  Thank you, Jake and Nick.


The Bull City Bike Park Story  
Let us introduce ourselves and our story. We are Jake Dolan and Nick Brown, the founders of Bull City Bike Park, Inc. Passionate cyclists with business experience running retail stores and bike shops, we launched this business to develop a large-scale, indoor mountain bike park in Durham, NC. We hope that bringing a marquee cycling project to Durham will enhance the Triangle cycling scene.            





The park will
welcome riders of all abilities. At any given time, you might discover cyclists ranging from
balance-biking kids to youth cycling on
teams and in camps to families and
friends looking for fun and fitness to mountain bikers and BMX riders
pushing their skills to the next level.  Our motto describes how we see the genesis of Bull City Bike Park:
We build it together by helping fund, design and create it.  
We ride it together by coming for the day or becoming members and sharing the park with our families and friends.
We have fun together by enjoying an indoor playground for bikes where we can all feel like kids again.
This Indiegogo crowd-funding campaign will help in three important ways to launch this business. Firstly, it will spread the story of Bull City Bike Park. Secondly, it will demonstrate customer-demand and in doing so convince investors to back the idea. Lastly, it will raise the startup funds to help secure our location.  Please contribute what you can and invite your friends, family and riding communities to do the same.  Thanks.


   What We Need & What You Get For this round of funding we are aiming for $50,000.  The initial goal  is to raise funds to help secure a location.  Perhaps even more importantly, active participation at this stage will show potential investors that there is widespread demand for an indoor mountain bike park in Durham.  The more supporters we have, the better business case we have for investment in the project and the more likely we are to get the additional funding necessary to get the doors open.

We hope that you will not only be able to make a donation but that you will also connect us to others who would like to make Bull City Bike Park a reality.  You may only be able to give $20; however, if you share our information with others like a riding club or parents looking for great camps, you could multiply your impact!  The indoor mountain bike parks that exist around the country draw visitors from around the world.  We think that the Triangle deserves just such a destination!

So please share our story and stay connected to the campaign through our social media sites and the website links below as we build Bull City Bike Park together.


Thanks for your support.

story: Ill be taking on a few mini adventures to try and raise some awareness (and money) for Horsham Sea Cadets. We are a small unit which recieves no outside funding, our ultimate goal is to have our own premises to guarantee the future for Sea Cadets in Horsham. For my first adventure I will be kayaking on my own down the Thames from Lechlade to Teddington a distance of around 135 miles!!

story:
Hey there! We are Braeden and Caroline, a couple from Calgary, Alberta, raising money to support our year long adventure in Australia and surrounding countries!

"Why are you going to Australia?"
Like any crazy adolescent just wrapping up high school, we needed to find a way to educate ourselves further and grow in self. However, unlike other people our age, we are seeking this growth not through university or college, but rather through travel and adventure. While recognizing that university is probably a must someday (Yes, I know I need to go Dad! Stop bugging me!), we believe that learning is also to be had through the spirit of adventure! While we may not end up with a piece of paper certifying us as responsible adults ready for a career, the cultures and people we run into will make us fundamentally better people, and will improve our understanding of the world around us.

"Can we come with you?"
Unfortunately... No.
Howeverrrrr... naturally, (as the crazy adolescents we are) we believe that we are half-decent photographers and even better Instagram-mers, so you can be sure that if you support us you will be seeing a lot of our faces in photos posted on social media, as well as the beautiful scenery and people that we run into along the way. At the end of our trip, a select few of these photos will be turned into a gorgeous coffee table book! As well, we intend to frequently blog about our experiences (Maybe even vlog? If enough people want it, who knows!) so it will be almost like you are there with us! (just close your eyes and imaginneeeee) All in all it will be an immersive experience for you, the supporter, and you will thoroughly enjoy it alongside us! (That or you'll hate it. I don't know you or what you like!)

"What can I do to help?!"
Well how kind of you to offer! Obviously trips like these need money to sustain, and that's where you, our (hopefully) very wealthy donor, come in. You see, as fresh out of high-school as we are, money is sliiiightly hard to come by. And well, as much as we have earned so far through our dedicated hard work this previous year, we want to go on a YEAR long trip. Not 2-3 months. A full year. And that takes a lot of dough. So to help us sustain the duration of the trip, we would love any help we could get! Even if it just a small amount, any help we could get would be so lovely!

"What will you be using the money for?"
I think the best way for me to answer that question is with a series of emojis! (Need I remind you; crazy adolescents over here!)

- 

-

-


"So what do I, the donor, get out of this?"
We have several perks that come along with supporting our trip. Feel free to check them out and if you like 'em, get 'em!

I think that's all the relevant information! I hope you find it in your soul to contribute a penny or two towards our trip, and hopefully we don't die in a fiery plane accident!

story:
Seen on Fox 2 News St. Louis being worn by news anchor John Pertzborn:


Pre-tied and self tied bow ties have become one of the most popular fashion accessory trends of today. You see them on celebrities, pro athletes, at fashion shows, and all throughout the media. There are hundreds of thousands of bow ties to choose from, but none of which allow you to be you.The bow tie wearer is limited to wear only what the designer creates.  With Tri Bow Tie, you are the designer. 

Not your average pre-tied bow tie: 

Tri Bow Ties' handcrafted designs gives the pre-tied bow tie a self tie look! With customizing your bow ties, it even motivates bow tie skeptics to think twice about wearing bow ties!






 


 






Tri Bow Tie will donate a portion of it’s sales to Sharing Hope International Ministries, a local charity that reaches out to families all across the world helping to feed the hungry, rebuild communities, and provide necessary support for less fortunate families.

So when you support Tri Bow Tie, you are not just interchanging bow ties, you are changing lives! For more information on Sharing Hope International Ministries, please visit www.sharinghopeim.org.



Every donation helps , whether big or small. 




The gifts will vary by the donation amount.

 

Risks & Challenges

Delivery time: In manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time. We're working with a very professional, organized factory that has decades of experience. We trust them to help us coordinate other material suppliers and produce in a timely manner. We've added buffers to the lead times just in case.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not contribute monetarily, we would love for you to still spread the word! Spreading the word about Tri Bow Tie will allow others who have never heard of our company to get on board. Word of mouth is one of the oldest and  most effective ways of advertisement.

story:
Short Summary

Hello people!

My name is Serena Celani, I am Italian and I live in Rome.

I'm 39 years old and work at the Italian Red Cross.

I graduated in Economics and I got a Master's degree in "International Policies and Global Environmental Protection".

My father is Luigi Celani, mechanical designer and planner specializing in structures, installations and equipment of yachts, sailboats and motor.

He has started very young inventing disparate products, some patented, for his own and on commission of companies.

Our campaign is designed to launch a start-up in order to produce and market the DuoBike, latest invention of my father but the first one to want to be produced directly from us. 

This is why your help is so important for us. Managing to obtain funds both for patent protection at European level and to start a production would be the goal that contributors could help us achieve because we alone are not able to face such charges.


What We Need & What You Get

The $ 170,000 goal we have set is the amount necessary to cover patent expenses and production start. Unfortunately, the expenses to be addressed for the protection of a patent are many and sometimes substantial, to be added to those necessary for the start of production.

For an inventor the biggest satisfaction is precisely to produce the invention directly. Selling the invention demeans the rights and committed efforts.

We offer some perks, which are for us a way to thank for the help and for your contribution.

We offer the possibility of being cited as funding contributors on our site which will be modified and enriched or the chance to get a discount coupon on the future purchase price of a DuoBike, price that unfortunately we can not currently define but which will amount roughly between 2000 and 3000 euro (2200 - 3300 US dollars).

Even if we do not reach the entire goal, the funds raised there will still be useful to address first of all the patent expenses.


The Impact

Our project could make it available for everyone the use of a vehicle in muscle energy, offering greater safety and ease of use than the normal bicycle but similar motion performance and evolution.

You would have available a new vehicle, practical and unsurpassed for use in cities but also fun for trips out of town.

We really hope to start a DuoBike production considering that in the past, despite the validity of the various patents of my father, the lack of economic resources it has determined their commercial failure.

A case in point: in 1967 my father invented and patented in Italy a water moto ski. Some famous companies manufacturers of similar products were interested in building and producing this invention.

Unfortunately, not having my father the necessary funds to international patent protection, the proposals fell on deaf ears, and one of these houses has indeed proceeded to the building in own of a similar product but, because altered, has not had the expected success.


Risks & Challenges

The risk is that of not having sufficient resources to address the many expenses that characterize a patent and for a start up company.

Being our product a good product, designed in detail and tested, albeit still in the prototype stage, we are confident that once in the market will be appreciated by a good slice of it.

That is why your help is needed, in terms of contribution and also to spread the word, to help us to meet the challenge and avoid the risk.


Other Ways You Can Help

So folks  get the word out and make some noise about our campaign please! Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Try the GoSun Technology for just $59

GoSun Stove has revolutionized fuel-free cooking over the past three years. Now we are making our award winning solar cooking technology even more accessible and educational. After months of development the Dogger was born.

From the Field to the Classroom

Having developed a matching Educational Kit to explain the principles behind the stove, we aim to get the Solar Dogger into classrooms around the world. With your help we can make that a reality!


Mini but Mighty

Dogger is a portable, durable stove that belongs everywhere from the ballpark to the classroom. Using the same vacuum tube and compound parabolic reflectors as the GoSun Sport and GoSun Grill, the Dogger can roast a couple hotdogs, sausages or taquitos in minutes and will not leave you hungry in cloudy or cold weather.

More than a Toy

With the optional Dogger Plus Educational Kit, children and adults of all ages can learn the STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Math) principles behind the GoSun Solar Cooking Technology while tasting the power of the Sun first hand (more on the contents of the Educational Kit below).

Take it Anywhere

The Dogger packs into a durable, 2 LB clamshell case, perfect for any occasion. You can leave it in your car, so you're always ready when hunger strikes. 


Fire-Free Fun

Thanks to the vacuum tube’s near perfect insulation, the entire outside of the stove remains cool to touch while the inside hits temperatures up to 550°F/280°C.


More than just Hot Dogs

Delicious options include taquitos, spring rolls, tater tots and veggie dogs.

360° of Favor

The tubular cooking quality is unmatched.  The tube creates even temperatures throughout and prevents food from drying out by trapping moisture. The vacuum's insulation keeps your meal hot and ready to eat, whenever you are. 




There is no comparison; what you're seeing is NOT SMOKE AND MIRRORS.  GoSun Stove is already making 1,000's of customers happy to cook using JUST SUNLIGHT.  What?! Do you think Solar Energy is the Under Dogger? Think again...




Not convinced yet? Prepare for the WOW  factor.

Watch the full length (3:20) Video below:








Reflectors double as shields 

Protect your GoSun on the Go.  Grab the Dogger, some bun (bread of any kind), condiments and your favorite tubular food. Jump on the boat, bike, beach or bus. 



Roast from sun up to sun down

With the help to the integrated Multi-Position Base and Kickstand.  A full range of of sunlight angles, wavelengths and intensity are absorbed; from 0° to 75° tilt and ultraviolet through infrared. 


Want to see the Dogger in classrooms and ballparks around the world?


We need your help.



The children are the future -  so is the rest of your life.  Teach yourself and others how to harness power for free, all day, every day.   Dogger Plus includes some specialty items intended to make us more energy aware.  It's for those still interested in experimenting and pushing the limits of science and humanity.  





The GoSun Dial is another state-of-the-art devices that keeps you honed to the Primary Source of life on planet Earth - the Sun



Help grow this break-through and make history

Would you like more reasons to support this campaign? 

  • We're facing about $50,000 in tooling costs alone
  • GoSun is in its third year and trying to break free of finanacial barriers
  • This technology can Save the World (or at least part of it) 
  • Easy to Clean, even for a dirty hippy
  • Won't catch fire, unless you like hairspray on your hot dog
  • Set it up and walk away, come back and eat
  • No Operating Costs, ever


Is it safe? Yes.  Is it durable? Yes.  Is it awesome? You tell us.  



Product Specifications

Solar Dogger is in a Product Category of its own. 

One part stove, one part oven, half part grill and two full sausages:

  • Power Source: Solar - Batteries Not Required
  • Materials: Aluminum, Stainless Steel, Borosilicate Glass, Silicone & Plastic
  • Closed Overall Dimension: 14" long (35cm) , 7" wide (18cm), 3" tall (8cm)
  • Open Overall Dimension: 14" long (35cm), 10" wide (25cm), 6" tall (15cm)
  • Oven Inside Dimension: 1.3" diameter (3.3cm), 12" long (30cm)
  • Cooking Tray Dimension: 1.25" diameter (3.2cm), 11" long (28cm)
  • Weight: Solar Dogger 2.5 Lbs (1.1kgs), Dogger Plus Total 3.5Lbs (1.6kgs)
  • Maximun Oven Temperature: 550°F (260°C) 
  • Working Oven Temperature: 400°F (204°C) 
  • Outside Temp. Range: -40°F (-40°C) to  140°F (60°C)
  • Cooking Time: as fast as 10 minutes, as long as two hours, variable depending on meal and conditions
  • Two-Year-No-Questions-Asked Warranty on the Tube
  • One-Year Warranty for Parts and Labor on everything else


GoSun's Design Team fell in love

 In 2001, our founder, Patrick Sherwin, made his first meal in these incredible vacuum tube solar cookers - a Hot Dog. Now we're getting back to our roots.

Can you teach an old dog new tricks??

Hot dogs are very American, but this is going to change them forever. GoSun plans to make Solar Energy very American as well.  Join us in making a solar powered device accessible to everyone. Support this campaign starting at just $59.



Risks & Challenges

We are optimistic inventors and we tend to underestimate the complexity and costs that involve our design reaching production maturity.  We've done this a couple times now, so we are getting better and more realistic.

  • GoSun is a small company so we need people to share and echo our cause
  • Nothing like this has ever been put in mass production 
  • This campaign is pretty loud; we don't want to be taken too seriously 
  • Educating mainstream consumers to the power of these vacuum tubes
  • As a young team full of ideas, sticking to our timeline is challenging  
If things goes as planned, here's our production timeline estimates:


Sharing is what this is all about

Please share this campaign with your network.  Back This Campaign
story_txt:
Try the GoSun Technology for just $59
GoSun Stove has revolutionized fuel-free cooking over the past three years. Now we are making our award winning solar cooking technology even more accessible and educational. After months of development the Dogger was born.
From the Field to the Classroom
Having developed a matching Educational Kit to explain the principles behind the stove, we aim to get the Solar Dogger into classrooms around the world. With your help we can make that a reality!

 


Mini but Mighty
Dogger is a portable, durable stove that belongs everywhere from the ballpark to the classroom. Using the same vacuum tube and compound parabolic reflectors as the GoSun Sport and GoSun Grill, the Dogger can roast a couple hotdogs, sausages or taquitos in minutes and will not leave you hungry in cloudy or cold weather.
 

More than a Toy
With the optional Dogger Plus Educational Kit, children and adults of all ages can learn the STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Math) principles behind the GoSun Solar Cooking Technology while tasting the power of the Sun first hand (more on the contents of the Educational Kit below).
 

Take it Anywhere
The Dogger packs into a durable, 2 LB clamshell case, perfect for any occasion. You can leave it in your car, so you're always ready when hunger strikes. 

 

Fire-Free Fun
Thanks to the vacuum tube’s near perfect insulation, the entire outside of the stove remains cool to touch while the inside hits temperatures up to 550°F/280°C.

More than just Hot Dogs
Delicious options include taquitos, spring rolls, tater tots and veggie dogs.
 

360° of Favor
The tubular cooking quality is unmatched.  The tube creates even temperatures throughout and prevents food from drying out by trapping moisture. The vacuum's insulation keeps your meal hot and ready to eat, whenever you are. 






There is no comparison; what you're seeing is NOT SMOKE AND MIRRORS.  GoSun Stove is already making 1,000's of customers happy to cook using JUST SUNLIGHT.  What?! Do you think Solar Energy is the Under Dogger? Think again...






Not convinced yet? Prepare for the WOW  factor.
Watch the full length (3:20) Video below:











Reflectors double as shields 
Protect your GoSun on the Go.  Grab the Dogger, some bun (bread of any kind), condiments and your favorite tubular food. Jump on the boat, bike, beach or bus. 


Roast from sun up to sun down
With the help to the integrated Multi-Position Base and Kickstand.  A full range of of sunlight angles, wavelengths and intensity are absorbed; from 0° to 75° tilt and ultraviolet through infrared. 





Want to see the Dogger in classrooms and ballparks around the world?

We need your help.



The children are the future -  so is the rest of your life.  Teach yourself and others how to harness power for free, all day, every day.   Dogger Plus includes some specialty items intended to make us more energy aware.  It's for those still interested in experimenting and pushing the limits of science and humanity.  
















The GoSun Dial is another state-of-the-art devices that keeps you honed to the Primary Source of life on planet Earth - the Sun










Help grow this break-through and make history
Would you like more reasons to support this campaign?   We're facing about $50,000 in tooling costs alone GoSun is in its third year and trying to break free of finanacial barriers
This technology can Save the World (or at least part of it) 
Easy to Clean, even for a dirty hippy
Won't catch fire, unless you like hairspray on your hot dog
Set it up and walk away, come back and eat
No Operating Costs, ever 




   
Is it safe? Yes.  Is it durable? Yes.  Is it awesome? You tell us.  



Product Specifications Solar Dogger is in a Product Category of its own. 
One part stove, one part oven, half part grill and two full sausages:  Power Source: Solar - Batteries Not Required
Materials: Aluminum, Stainless Steel, Borosilicate Glass, Silicone & Plastic
Closed Overall Dimension: 14" long (35cm) , 7" wide (18cm), 3" tall (8cm) Open Overall Dimension: 14" long (35cm), 10" wide (25cm), 6" tall (15cm) Oven Inside Dimension: 1.3" diameter (3.3cm), 12" long (30cm)
Cooking Tray Dimension: 1.25" diameter (3.2cm), 11" long (28cm)
Weight: Solar Dogger 2.5 Lbs (1.1kgs), Dogger Plus Total 3.5Lbs (1.6kgs)
Maximun Oven Temperature: 550°F (260°C) 
Working Oven Temperature: 400°F (204°C) 
Outside Temp. Range: -40°F (-40°C) to  140°F (60°C)
Cooking Time: as fast as 10 minutes, as long as two hours, variable depending on meal and conditions
Two-Year-No-Questions-Asked Warranty on the Tube
One-Year Warranty for Parts and Labor on everything else    

GoSun's Design Team fell in love

 In 2001, our founder, Patrick Sherwin, made his first meal in these incredible vacuum tube solar cookers - a Hot Dog. Now we're getting back to our roots.
Can you teach an old dog new tricks??
Hot dogs are very American, but this is going to change them forever. GoSun plans to make Solar Energy very American as well.  Join us in making a solar powered device accessible to everyone. Support this campaign starting at just $59.







Risks & Challenges  We are optimistic inventors and we tend to underestimate the complexity and costs that involve our design reaching production maturity.  We've done this a couple times now, so we are getting better and more realistic.  GoSun is a small company so we need people to share and echo our cause Nothing like this has ever been put in mass production 
This campaign is pretty loud; we don't want to be taken too seriously 
Educating mainstream consumers to the power of these vacuum tubes
As a young team full of ideas, sticking to our timeline is challenging   
If things goes as planned, here's our production timeline estimates:


   
Sharing is what this is all about Please share this campaign with your network.  Back This Campaign

story:
Meet the world's most

affordable home robot

Robit is your friendly home robot that's here to help you around the house. We wanted Robit to be easy to use just like your mobile device. With great technology, yet extremely affordable, Robit is the perfect addition for your family.


Robit in the media

"This robot just wants to help" - mashable

"I fell in love with this adorable home robot!" - Gizmodo

"Should be friends or tools?" - ZDNET

"Robit launches campaign for home help robot" - VentureBeat

"Meet the robot that wants to help around the house" - Geektime

"What if your iphone had wheels and eyes?" psfk

"Robit isn't just a robot" - CHIPCHICK





Robit can do

many cool things for you!


Robit can also guard

your beloved pet 24/7




How does Robit work?




Oh... and one more thing!


Robit technical details:

Movement
Robit drives on 3 wheels: the two front ones are powered by 2 powerful DC motors and the back wheel is free. The 2 front wheels have wheel encoders that count the number of rounds so Robit knows the speed and distance of his movement

Head and Neck
The head can move up and down and right to left powered by 2 servo motors. The neck moves up and down with a servo motor.

The Real Time Board (Firmware)
Robit has a built in real time board similar to an Arduino. This board controls the hardware directly: the motors, the sensors, etc. The board has an API that can be accessed, although we recommend using our hi-level API.

Computer Board (The brain)
Robit is powered by a single board computer (Raspberry Pi). This computer includes a 4 quad CPU (ARM), 1 GB of RAM, and 16 GB of SSD memory for storing things like apps, music, etc.

Connectivity
Robit connects to the home WiFi with a Wi-Fi card and an Antenna so it's always in range. Robit also has Bluetooth that you can use when WiFi is not available. When using BT some features are limited or disabled (such as: video streaming)

Sensors
Robit has a video camera in his head that can stream live video and images. He also has a led flash light to see in the dark (in his forehead). Robit has several ultrasonic sensors for feeling what's in front of him, And a 9-Axis (Gyro, Accelerometer, Compass) so he knows what direction his moving.

Sound
Robit has a speaker and microphone connected to a sound card (and not the simple on board HDMI sound) so he can do sophisticated sound manipulations.

Eyes
Robit has 2 eyes, each has an 8X8 LED matrix. LED's could be deemed to different levels.

Software
Robit's Operating System is Linux (Debian Based distribution). We provide a very easy to use Python and Node.js (JavaScript) API. The API libraries include:
Movement
Events (sensors, sound, etc)
Controlling the eyes: you can draw bitmaps, letters, animations
Sound
We also provide a wider API for cool stuff:
Gestures - play interesting expressions on his eyes
Image Recognition - Based on OpenCV we offer a library of useful functions you can use out of the box
Object Detection and Object Tracking
Connectivity

Low Level API
If you want to support other languages (C++, Java, etc), or write your own API we provide a low level API and Protocol to communicate with all Robit modules. This is a basic binary protocol where you can send low level commands to the RT Board and implement your own software if required.

 


FAQ

➤ Who is Robit designed for?

Robit is designed for the entire family. Adults and children can download suitable apps for their needs

➤ Is Robit easy to set up?

No set up needed! Just push the button and enjoy

➤ How heavy is Robit?

About 1.5 Kg / 3.3 lb

➤ Is there enough storage for apps?

Robit comes with 16GB of storage space (Flash SD Card) - that's more than enough for all your apps and more

➤ Is there any accessories for Robit?

Robit currently offers a missile launcher for games, a tray and gas detectors. We plan to release even more accessories in the future

➤ Can Robit move on any type of house floor?

Robit can move around flat surfaces and regular carpets. However, he can not climb stairs

➤ What languages does Robit speak and understand?

Currently he speaks English but we're working on other languages as well. Robit will be programmed to speak most common languages

➤ How does Robit navigate around the house?

Robit uses special indoor navigation algorithms that are currently being patented. He will be able to find his way around the house by using his sensors

➤ Can Robit communicate with my mobile?

Sure. We have an Android and iOS apps and Robit will communicate over the WiFi Network

➤ Does Robit work on iOS and Android?

Yes, and you will also be able to control Robit from your PC or laptop with a regular Browser (FireFox, Chrome, Safari)

➤ Does Robit require Wi-Fi?

Yes. Robit can communicate with only Bluetooth, but some functions will now work (like video streaming)

➤ How long does the battery last?

 Normally between 5-8 hours, depends on usage and especially movement

➤ Does Robit charge automatically?

Robit can find his way to his docking station when battery power gets low and charge himself

➤ When will Robit ship?

We plan to ship Robit within 12 months after the campaign ends

➤ Where does Robit ship?

We ship Robit worldwide. Outside the US, there might be some additional shipping costs

➤ What makes you qualified for this project? 

Our team is built of highly experienced tech professionals. We engineer, code and design everything in house.

➤ Is there a risk I won't get my Robit at the end?

Unlikely. We already completed most of the development and manufacturing. Our main concern is getting as many apps as possible.


Apps FAQ

➤ How can I download apps for Robit?

Get the Robitstore App from the App Store or Google Play, and choose the Robit apps you want

➤ What kind of apps will be available for Robit?

The categories: monitoring and home security, games, lifestyle, education and many more

➤ Are the apps free?

Yes. The apps we provide are all free.


Dev FAQ

➤ How is the developer edition different from the regular edition?

Developer editions gives you access to our special dev support, and you can contact us 24/7 to get full support.

➤ What programming language do I need to know?

Currently we support Python and Node.js (JavaScript). You can also write C/C++ code and compile it to the ARM Linux (Raspberry Pi)

➤ How do I get information and support as a developer?

We will have a special dev support page, where you can contact our team 24/7

➤ Is your software open source?

The API, software packages and even OS is open source and will be available on GitHub as well as the apps we release

➤ What kind of access do I have to the Robit internal board? What can I modify?

You have full SSH (root) access to the Linux OS installed. You can do whatever you want with it. You can always download and install a clean image if needed

story:
OUR STORY

Biking is our passion, trail building is our devotion and with your help, our mission is to boost Armenia's biking/hiking community! I am the founder Emma Petrosyan along with Vaghinak Karapetyan. We want to show bikers of the world that Armenia is not only about Lake Sevan and Yerevan, but it is also about amazing highlands and mountains that offer fascinating views and hiking experiences!  In partnership with local riders over the last 2 years, we have worked hard to build trails on Pambak Mountain in the town of Vanadzor, but now we need your help to spread our trails further. 

By giving a few dollars, you’re not only helping us to build more trails, but you’re also helping to make Armenia a better destination with credible tourism, healthy recreational sports & encouraging a healthier lifestyle for the people of our community.

This campaign is extremely important to us because we want to attract visitors from all over the world to come and see what biking opportunities Armenia can offer. Whether you are an avid hiker or have experience in mountain biking,

Boo Mountain Bike Park is the perfect place for those who love the outdoor activities and are passionate about active recreation, sports and nature. Our contributors will help our NGO by providing funding to assist with the costs associated with the equipment needed to finish building the trails on Mount Pambak, food and transportation costs, as well as trail building heads for the 20 km of land that we will be covering.

OUR DREAM

Our long term goal is make mountain biking  the national sport in Armenia and in the region including Georgia. We believe that we can reach it by making changes in educational systems and motivate people to go riding trails during the weekends.

Our goal is to build world class mountain biking park to promote biking and outdoor sports, host different contests in BMX, trial, enduro, xc and downhill riding styles at the global level and become one of the major centers for worldwide mountain biking event organization.

 

What We Need & What You Get

8$ donation- FREE Stickers collection

20$ donation- SPECIAL EDITION camping mug Tar Indz Sar(arm. take me to the mountains)

35$ donation-LIMITED EDITION Kraft paper sketchbook 

40$ donation- FREE crazy t-shirt line

100$ donation- FREE Boo park ticket (transportation, 3 times food, accommodation, hiking trip)

The Impact

 

  • This project is valuable because it will help Armenia gain a larger presence in the world and the visitors, as well as residents, will see a shift in the economy in the service industry sector. Not only do we feel it will help boost the economy, but it will give those in the diaspora valid reasons to come and visit the country and truly connect and immerse in the overall culture.
  • It will create jobs for the locals
  • Will promote healthy lifestyle
  • Will promote adventure and sport tourism

  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share the event and invite your friends to donate 
  • Host a fundraising event  
  • Donate your birthday 

Thank you very much for your support,

Boo park team.
