story:
Pet Stems is the world’s first orally administered nutritional cell therapy products designed to enhance and extend the quality of life for sick or aging pets.

What is Pet Stems?

Pet Stems is formulated to treat damaged cells of diseased or aging organs (cells that are not functioning properly) and revitalizes “dormant” cells where needed. Pet Stems uses “healing cells” (the body’s internal medicine cabinet) to direct stem cells and crucial growth factors to repair, regenerate, and restore damaged cells and organs.


Pet Stems will provide pet owners with safe and effective cellular products and relevant information that is based upon sound research, science, and clinical applications.

When our companion animals become ill, their cells and growth factors may not be able to heal or repair damaged tissues effectively. We have formulated Pet Stems to help improve the following conditions:

  • Normal and premature aging issues
  • Allergies
  • Heart Disease
  • Insulin Dependency
  • Joint Degeneration
  • Kidney & Liver Disease
  • Non-healing Wounds
  • Stomach Disorders

Studies indicate that Pet Stems can boost stressed cells of diseased organs and revitalize "dormant" cells where needed.

Pet Stems is:

  • 100% organic
  • 100% gluten free
  • 100% safe
  • Administered Orally- Non Invasive- Requires no surgery
  • Restores youthfulness- Boosts the Immune system
  • Treats ailments by helping to heal damaged cells and tissues
  • No Doctor required- as easy as giving your pet a daily treat
  • Very affordable alternative to traditional cell therapy surgery

For more information, you can visit our website (www.petstems.com).

What's really important, is that Pet Stems is 100% safe and was specifically designed to help restore and strengthen your Pet's damaged cells and tissues.

How are the funds raised going to be used?

The product has been developed and tested in our laboratories. Now we are raising money to get the product produced and distributed so pets everywhere can have access to cell therapy in order to improve their lives.

So, how can you get your Pet Stems Fresh Start Kit?

Click one of our funding links and become a Pet Stems Inner Circle Member now. You can choose what funding level you'd like. Anyone who helps to fund our campaign will become part of the Pet Stems Inner Circle. This allows you to order our Pet Stems product at a discounted rate as well as you will receive Pet Stems at a 10% discount on all future orders!

Pet Stems, living longer, living stronger.


Pet Stems Research and Development Center

Testimonial: Hear the story of Jack the Golden Retriever and his 3 month experience with Pet Stems.

Pet Stems Fresh Start Kits

The Pet Stems Fresh Start Kit is a once a day orally administered chewable tablet or sublingual gel that the animal will take for a period of three months. Once the first three month’s phase is complete, we recommend that the pet takes one tablet or gel packet per week for a period of 9 months. This is our Maintenance Kit.

Supporting Service Dogs for Veterans and Those with Special Needs 

Pet Stems works with the trainers of Service Dogs for veterans and those with special needs and will provide its cell therapy product for aging service dogs who help people fulfill tasks in their daily lives. These service dogs are highly trained members of the community and Pet Stems will donate cell therapy products to these remarkable animals. This will help keep them healthy and enable them to live longer, healthier lives. Those that buy Pet Stems for their Pets will be helping service dogs in communities around the world.

A Pet Stems Story, Chip and His Dog Forrest

Chip is a firefighter that works for the National Forest Service.  He and his wife have a young son named Jack and an Australian Shepherd, Corgie mix, named Forrest.  Forrest always went out on patrol with Chip and, when at home, helped ride herd on young Jack, and even kept Jack from walking into the street a few times when the tyke had escaped the back yard.  But Forrest developed severe skin hot spots and the constant trips to the vet was a major drain on the young couple’s financial reserves.  Nothing seemed to work, but there was no question that Chip was going to continue doing everything he could to help Forrest. 

The vet wanted to adopt an ever aggressive regimen that would provide needed relief to Forrest, but was only temporary, would cost a lot of money, and would likely shorten Forrest’s life.  This was a Hobson’s choice that nobody wants to go through.  But when you have a pet that you love, that deserves your loyalty after all of the loyalty they have given you, you want to do anything you can.  This is a family member and you do what has to be done.  Unfortunately, the course of treatment prescribed by the vet was just not in the young family’s budget.

In doing a little research, Chip found Pet Stems and opted to try a different option that was far less expensive and much easier to administer at home instead of at the vet. Although this was a new type of treatment, they tried it and within a few weeks, the hot spots started to disappear.

Thanks to Pet Stems, Forrest doesn’t have to go on the life shortening steroid regimen any more.  He’s back on happy patrol with Chip and is making sure that Jack stays safe!


Pet Stems Corporate Mission

Our mission is to define, standardize and advance the field of regenerative therapy by offering the highest quality technology, research and delivery in a simple, non-clinical "At Home" setting.

Premier Solutions for your Pet's "At Home" Cellular Therapy

After many years of research and clinical application, Pet Stem makes it possible to provide affordable "At Home" nutritional stem cell therapy for your Pet.

Pet Stems is a regenerative therapy company committed to providing pet owners with the best possible cell therapy for their dogs in the comfort of their own homes, and without the need of veterinarian assistance.

Pet Stems has a seasoned management team with over 100 years combined experience in developing cell therapeutics for both human and animal use. The Pet Stem team has experience manufacturing products within established stem cell manufacturing facilities, cellular product development & enhancement, clinical & preclinical studies with multiple cell types for multiple indications, and more. The Pet Stems team knows what you need to provide your Dog with the best cell therapy safely & effectively within your own home!

The Pet Stems team has a passion for cell therapy which originates from seeing our human and animal family members suffer from debilitating diseases and injuries even with the best possible pharmaceutical and medical device therapies available. We knew there had to be a better way. Therefore, we've committed many years of our lives to developing cellular therapeutics. We believe that the body knows how to heal itself better than any other therapy with the least possible side effects. With the nutritional Pet Stem therapy, you are harnessing your Pet's body to heal itself.

We started Pet Stems with one goal in mind... developing the safest and best possible cell therapy to help Pets in need, and give them the best chance for improvement!


Stem Cells and Why they are Important

Stem Cells are "healing cells". They have the remarkable potential to develop into many different cell types. They serve as an internal repair system, dividing as needed to replace diseased or damaged cells. When a stem cell divides, each new cell either becomes a different type of cell with specialized functions, such as liver cell, cartilage cell, nerve cell, or can remain a stem cell.

Stem cells are distinguished from other cell types by two important characteristics. First, they are unspecialized cells capable of renewing themselves. Second, they can become tissue or organ-specific cells with special functions. In some organs, such as the intestines and bone marrow, stem cells regularly divide, repairing or replacing worn out or damaged cells. In other organs, such as the pancreas and the heart, stem cells only divide under special conditions.

Growth Factors and their Importance

Genes found within all tissue cells (brain, liver, kidney, heart, etc.), are coded with cell specific chemicals called peptides. These peptides, also referred to as "Growth Factors," are necessary for rapid cell repair and reconstruction after injury or illness. A remarkable benefit is that the Growth Factors of different species are so similar that they can be used between all species. The "Growth Factors" from sheep and pigs can stimulate the Stem Cells within your dog to assist in their healing processes. When your dog's body is injured by poisons, toxins, bacteria, viruses, & parasite infections, the necessary Peptides or "Growth Factors" in an aging body may not be available in adequate quantities to heal damaged organs. The symptoms of this cellular damage may be a dog with decreased energy, slower wound healing, depression, decreased appetite, vomiting, and diarrhea.


Pet Stem Nutritional Stem Cell Therapy and Restoration

Stem cells have the ability to self-renew and multiply resulting in new generations. These new generations can potentially replace diseased and damaged organs in your Dog. By healing damaged cells, the result can be a "reversal of and restoration of the anti-aging process." As we age, cells become old and can no longer replace themselves with healthy cells. Cell therapy works at the cellular level to induce cells to reproduce. The goal is to repair or replace damaged cells with new cells.

The implications for a rapid and full recovery from everything from broken bones to liver and kidney disease are enormous. We now have the potential to create healing where previously there was no hope of recovery.


How is Pet Stems different?

Presently, no other company in the world offers convenient and affordable "At Home" nutritional stem cell therapy for Pets. Companies that do offer stem cell therapy require a licensed veterinarian to surgically remove fat tissue from the Pet. After several weeks of processing, the Pet's isolated stem cells are returned to the veterinarian for re-implantation back into the Pet. This procedure is time consuming, expensive, invasive, and requires an approved veterinarian before and after the therapy.

Pet Stems does not require a veterinarian to put our Pet to sleep and surgically remove fat tissue, nor later require a veterinarian to implant the processed stem cells back into your Pet.

Pet Stems is simple and proven to be effective.

Click on one of our Funding Perk Links to help us today!

The Pet Stems Team
Greg DiRienzo- Director and Co-Founder

Co-founder and Chief Executive Officer of New Cell Sciences, Inc. (www.newcellsciences.com); founder and CEO of ProGenaCell, Inc., (www.progenacell.com) an international stem cell healthcare provider; founder and CEO of Medici Integrative Health & Surgery Center (www.Medicicenterintegrativehealth.com), and Pet Stems, a nutritional stem cell product for companion animals (www.petstems.com); former CEO of PDA Solutions, an innovative medical software company.

Lynn DiRienzo- Director and Co-Founder

Co-Founder of PetStems, Inc.; President/Co-Founder of ProGenaCell, Inc.- a cell therapy company; former COO/Co-Founder of Kimco Staffing Services - $100 million corporation w/ branch offices throughout CA; Founder/VP/COO of KimstaffHR - Personally led PEO to $20 million in sales in less than 2-years, oversaw entire KimstaffHR operation; former Registered Nurse at Cedars Sinai/Daniel Freeman Hospitals, L.A. Lynn has a unique blend of medical, human resources, sales and entrepreneurial skills.

Hubie Laugharn- Managing Director

Hubie has an impressive executive career spanning 40 years; licensed building contractor, real estate broker, insurance broker and multi-engine pilot; founded two successful companies Regal Homes, Solana Insurance; recognized horseman and cattle rancher with 35 years participation in the classic Rancho Visitadoes and El Viaje de Portola rides; crewed four Trans Pacs ("Ragtime") including garnering first place in the grueling Los Angeles to Tahiti Yacht Race of 2008. Hubie attended the University of Southern California.

Abdulkader Rahmo, PhD- Research Scientist

Co-founder and Chief Scientific Officer of New Cell Sciences, Inc.; internationally recognized research scientist; former Director of Stem Cell Research at National Commission for Biotechnology, Damascus, Syria.; former associate professor, author and lecturer in stem cell technology; former professor at Lebanese University, Damascus University, & International University for Science and Technology; published numerous scientific papers and authored several published books.

Kevin Laugharn- Internet Marketing

Kevin Laugharn has been an Internet Marketer for 15 years. He specializes in increasing traffic to websites using SEO, Social Media Marketing, Online Reputation Marketing, Video Marketing, and adapting businesses online marketing to match Google's ever changing ranking algorithms. In 2011 he co-founded One Palm Marketing to help small businesses achieve their online marketing goals. "Our biggest growth area has been in Online Reputation Management and Marketing. This comes as a response to the increase in importance of online reviews for every business." 

Elizabeth Laugharn Mead- Marketing

Strategic planning, marketing and non-profit consultant; background in consumer advertising and marketing research, accomplished foodie, social blogger acolyte.

Our Strategic Partners:

ProGenaCell- http://progenacell.com
New Cell Science- http://newcellsciences.com

This will help keep them healthy and enable them to live longer, healthier lives. Those that buy Pet Stems for their Pets will be helping service dogs in communities around the world.

A Pet Stems Story, Chip and His Dog Forrest



Chip is a firefighter that works for the National Forest Service.  He
and his wife have a young son named Jack and an Australian Shepherd, Corgie mix,
named Forrest.  Forrest always went out on patrol with Chip and, when at
home, helped ride herd on young Jack, and even kept Jack from walking into the
street a few times when the tyke had escaped the back yard.  But Forrest
developed severe skin hot spots and the constant trips to the vet was a major
drain on the young couple’s financial reserves.  Nothing seemed to work,
but there was no question that Chip was going to continue doing everything he
could to help Forrest.  
The vet wanted to adopt an ever aggressive regimen that
would provide needed relief to Forrest, but was only temporary, would cost a
lot of money, and would likely shorten Forrest’s life.  This was a
Hobson’s choice that nobody wants to go through.  But when you have a pet
that you love, that deserves your loyalty after all of the loyalty they have
given you, you want to do anything you can.  This is a family member and
you do what has to be done.  Unfortunately, the course of treatment
prescribed by the vet was just not in the young family’s budget.
In doing a little research, Chip found Pet Stems and
opted to try a different option that was far less expensive and much easier to
administer at home instead of at the vet. Although this was a new type of
treatment, they tried it and within a few weeks, the hot spots started to
disappear.
Thanks to Pet Stems, Forrest doesn’t have to go on the life
shortening steroid regimen any more.  He’s back on happy patrol with Chip
and is making sure that Jack stays safe!


Pet Stems Corporate Mission
Our mission is to define, standardize and advance the field of regenerative therapy by offering the highest quality technology, research and delivery in a simple, non-clinical "At Home" setting.
Premier Solutions for your Pet's "At Home" Cellular Therapy
After many years of research and clinical application, Pet Stem makes it possible to provide affordable "At Home" nutritional stem cell therapy for your Pet.
Pet Stems is a regenerative therapy company committed to providing pet owners with the best possible cell therapy for their dogs in the comfort of their own homes, and without the need of veterinarian assistance.
Pet Stems has a seasoned management team with over 100 years combined experience in developing cell therapeutics for both human and animal use. The Pet Stem team has experience manufacturing products within established stem cell manufacturing facilities, cellular product development & enhancement, clinical & preclinical studies with multiple cell types for multiple indications, and more. The Pet Stems team knows what you need to provide your Dog with the best cell therapy safely & effectively within your own home!
The Pet Stems team has a passion for cell therapy which originates from seeing our human and animal family members suffer from debilitating diseases and injuries even with the best possible pharmaceutical and medical device therapies available. We knew there had to be a better way. Therefore, we've committed many years of our lives to developing cellular therapeutics. We believe that the body knows how to heal itself better than any other therapy with the least possible side effects. With the nutritional Pet Stem therapy, you are harnessing your Pet's body to heal itself.
We started Pet Stems with one goal in mind... developing the safest and best possible cell therapy to help Pets in need, and give them the best chance for improvement!



Stem Cells and Why they are Important
Stem Cells are "healing cells". They have the remarkable potential to develop into many different cell types. They serve as an internal repair system, dividing as needed to replace diseased or damaged cells. When a stem cell divides, each new cell either becomes a different type of cell with specialized functions, such as liver cell, cartilage cell, nerve cell, or can remain a stem cell.
Stem cells are distinguished from other cell types by two important characteristics. First, they are unspecialized cells capable of renewing themselves. Second, they can become tissue or organ-specific cells with special functions. In some organs, such as the intestines and bone marrow, stem cells regularly divide, repairing or replacing worn out or damaged cells. In other organs, such as the pancreas and the heart, stem cells only divide under special conditions.
Growth Factors and their ImportanceGenes found within all tissue cells (brain, liver, kidney, heart, etc.), are coded with cell specific chemicals called peptides. These peptides, also referred to as "Growth Factors," are necessary for rapid cell repair and reconstruction after injury or illness. A remarkable benefit is that the Growth Factors of different species are so similar that they can be used between all species. The "Growth Factors" from sheep and pigs can stimulate the Stem Cells within your dog to assist in their healing processes. When your dog's body is injured by poisons, toxins, bacteria, viruses, & parasite infections, the necessary Peptides or "Growth Factors" in an aging body may not be available in adequate quantities to heal damaged organs. The symptoms of this cellular damage may be a dog with decreased energy, slower wound healing, depression, decreased appetite, vomiting, and diarrhea.




Pet Stem Nutritional Stem Cell Therapy and Restoration
Stem cells have the ability to self-renew and multiply resulting in new generations. These new generations can potentially replace diseased and damaged organs in your Dog. By healing damaged cells, the result can be a "reversal of and restoration of the anti-aging process." As we age, cells become old and can no longer replace themselves with healthy cells. Cell therapy works at the cellular level to induce cells to reproduce. The goal is to repair or replace damaged cells with new cells.
The implications for a rapid and full recovery from everything from broken bones to liver and kidney disease are enormous. We now have the potential to create healing where previously there was no hope of recovery.



How is Pet Stems different?
Presently, no other company in the world offers convenient and affordable "At Home" nutritional stem cell therapy for Pets. Companies that do offer stem cell therapy require a licensed veterinarian to surgically remove fat tissue from the Pet. After several weeks of processing, the Pet's isolated stem cells are returned to the veterinarian for re-implantation back into the Pet. This procedure is time consuming, expensive, invasive, and requires an approved veterinarian before and after the therapy.
Pet Stems does not require a veterinarian to put our Pet to sleep and surgically remove fat tissue, nor later require a veterinarian to implant the processed stem cells back into your Pet.
Pet Stems is simple and proven to be effective.
Click on one of our Funding Perk Links to help us today!





The Pet Stems Team



Greg DiRienzo- Director and Co-Founder





Co-founder and Chief Executive Officer of New Cell Sciences, Inc. (www.newcellsciences.com); founder and CEO of ProGenaCell, Inc., (www.progenacell.com) an international stem cell healthcare provider; founder and CEO of Medici Integrative Health & Surgery Center (www.Medicicenterintegrativehealth.com), and Pet Stems, a nutritional stem cell product for companion animals (www.petstems.com); former CEO of PDA Solutions, an innovative medical software company.

Lynn DiRienzo- Director and Co-Founder


Co-Founder of PetStems, Inc.; President/Co-Founder of ProGenaCell, Inc.- a cell therapy company; former COO/Co-Founder of Kimco Staffing Services - $100 million corporation w/ branch offices throughout CA; Founder/VP/COO of KimstaffHR - Personally led PEO to $20 million in sales in less than 2-years, oversaw entire KimstaffHR operation; former Registered Nurse at Cedars Sinai/Daniel Freeman Hospitals, L.A. Lynn has a unique blend of medical, human resources, sales and entrepreneurial skills.
Hubie Laugharn- Managing Director
Hubie has an impressive executive career spanning 40 years; licensed building contractor, real estate 
broker, insurance broker and multi-engine pilot; founded two successful 
companies Regal Homes, Solana Insurance; recognized horseman and 
cattle rancher with 35 years participation in the classic Rancho 
Visitadoes and El Viaje de Portola rides; crewed four Trans Pacs 
("Ragtime") including garnering first place in the grueling Los Angeles to 
Tahiti Yacht Race of 2008. Hubie attended the University of Southern 
California.


Abdulkader Rahmo, PhD- Research Scientist



Co-founder and Chief Scientific Officer of New Cell Sciences, Inc.; internationally recognized research scientist; former Director of Stem Cell Research at National Commission for Biotechnology, Damascus, Syria.; former associate professor, author and lecturer in stem cell technology; former professor at Lebanese University, Damascus University, & International University for Science and Technology; published numerous scientific papers and authored several published books.
Kevin Laugharn- Internet Marketing



Kevin Laugharn has been an Internet Marketer for 15 years. He specializes in increasing traffic to websites using SEO, Social Media Marketing, Online Reputation Marketing, Video Marketing, and adapting businesses online marketing to match Google's ever changing ranking algorithms. In 2011 he co-founded One Palm Marketing to help small businesses achieve their online marketing goals. "Our biggest growth area has been in Online Reputation Management and Marketing. This comes as a response to the increase in importance of online reviews for every business." 
Elizabeth Laugharn Mead- Marketing




Strategic planning, marketing and non-profit consultant; background in consumer 
advertising and marketing research, accomplished foodie, social blogger 
acolyte.

Our Strategic Partners:
ProGenaCell- http://progenacell.com

New Cell Science- http://newcellsciences.com

story:
Hello Everyone,


I am Catrina Reese and I'm an indie artist that loves the Lord and passionate about singing and sharing the kingdom message through song. My desire is to see lives changes and souls saved!

This awesome campaign that I am launching is called "GIVING WITH A PURPOSE" and it's very simple.

The Lord has opened up some wonderful opportunities and so in the next 30 days and beyond we are set to reach the nations and I NEED YOUR HELP!

Your seed into this ministry will allow me to continue to spread the KINGDOM message.

The tour and travel expenses can get very expensive and so that's where your contribution, your seed, your love offering comes in!

With this we can reach the world, YOU CAN MAKE AN IMPACT with your seed!

So check out the video and see the wonderful perks that you will receive by planting into good soil!

I know with your support WE CAN MAKE THIS HAPPEN.... for us to reach more souls and enlarge the territories God has mandate in this season!

So I thank you in advance and SPREAD THE WORD even if you can't sow financially, YOU CAN SOW BY SHARING and spreading the word about this campaign.

I love you with the love of Christ and GOD DOES TOO!

Kingdom blessings,

Catrina

story:
(Español abajo)

Costarican laxers to make history, again!

The Costarican Lacrosse Federation will take part in the first ever made Latinamerican Lacrosse Cup.

Who are we ?

As one with the oldest lacrosse programs in whole latin America, Costa Rica is one of the pioneers of this discipline, with it's roots around 2007, Lacrosse Costa Rica has acted with the only goal of spreading the word and passion of the ''healing game'' in the world's happiest country, always supporting any iniciatives all around this small territory. 

What started as an small idea after looking for a substitution for playing hockey, the Rojas brothers, Walter and Aldo; brought lacrosse to Costa Rica, after shipping a bunch of sticks and balls; since that day and after a long way, lacrosse is making its way, step by step, to the costarican crowds.

With a growing 4-teamed league and an also growing comunity of experienced players, more and more clinics are been imparted in schools, highschools and even superior education centers, with the hope of making lacrosse not just a hobby, but a respected discipline in Costa Rica.



What are we attempting to do ?

All that effort and hard work has payed well for our comunity, not only it has bring a group of more commited players to the cause, but also has taken the name of Costa Rica out of the borders, and at the highest level of competitivity a sport can get, the World Championships.

Last year Costa Rica, alongside other eight nations, played it's first world games in history, facing for the first time the struggle and experience a national team deals with in such important events as these.

Fortunately Costa Rica is not the only country with this conviction and idea of progress; after a meeting that took place last year in Denver, it was due to organize the very first Latinamerican Lacrosse Games, in order to consolidate lacrosse as a practiced discipline in the whole region. Now the Costarican Lacrosse Federation engages a new challenge: the first Latinamerican Lacrosse Cup, which is going to be played in Mexico City on next July, event where the ticos will be head to head against Mexico, Argentina, Colombia and Chile.

When we dream, we dream big and so far our will and commitment has given us only success, nevertheless, dreams always have a price, from the physical and technical preparation it requires, to the invesment that must be done to take the athletes to those places; in this case, both, the federation and the costarican assitants to the Latinamerican Lacrosse Cup have to assume the whole debt by themselves; an investment in which things like the plane tickets, passports, visas and transportation must be taken in, without forgetting all the other things (the lacrosse gear, lodging and food); all of this for 25 different people, the size of the group that will represent Costa Rica in the Cup.

Though we are not expecting for a whole endorsement or sponsorship to take Costa Rica to this important event, we hope you to lend a hand to our cause. With the money collected through this campaign, our lacrosse federation is planning to give the players a lift and shrink the cost of what it would be the trip to a first ever happening event, join us and help to spread the good vibes of the ''medicine game'', do it for lacrosse, for the good of the game!

If you want more info and get more involved with the ''Costa Rica: way to the first America Lacrosse Cup'' project just click the following links and we'll help you out:

Facebook profiles

-Lacrosse Costa Rica: https://www.facebook.com/laxcostari

-Duendes Lax CR: https://www.facebook.com/duendeslax.cr.3

-Samurais Lax CR: https://www.facebook.com/samurais.lax

Facebook pages

-Duendes Lacrosse CR: https://www.facebook.com/duendeslaxcr

-Diablos Lacrosse CR: https://www.facebook.com/DiablosSurSiders?fref=ts

-XCS Heredia Lacrosse CR: https://www.facebook.com/heredialax?fref=ts

Email adresses

-Lacrosse Costa Rica: laxcr@hotmail.com

-Duendes Lax CR: duendeslaxcr@gmail.com

_____________________________________________________________________________

Lacrossistas costarricenses por hacer historia, de nuevo!


Costa Rica tomará parte de la primera Copa Latinoamericana de Lacrosse.

Quiénes somos ?

Como uno de los países como los programas de lacrosse más antiguos, Costa Rica es uno los pioneros de la disciplina, con sus raíces alrededor de 2007, Lacrosse Costa Rica ha actuado con la única meta de dispersar la palabra y pasión del ''juego de la sanación'' en el país más feliz del mundo, siempre apoyando las iniciativas a lo largo de este pequeño territorio.


Lo que comenzó como una pequeña idea para sustituir la práctica del hockey, los hermanos Rojas, Walter y Aldo; trajeron el lacrosse a Costa Rica, después de haber importado un puñado de palos y bolas de lacrosse, desde ese día y un largo camino, el  lacrosse se paso, poco a poco, entre las multitudes costarricenses.

Con una liga de cuatro equipos que crece, al igual que una creciente comunidad de jugadores experimentados, más y más clínicas se imparten en escuelas, colegios e instituciones de educación superior, con la esperanza de hacer del lacrosse no solo un pasatiempo, sino una disciplina de respeto en el país.


Cuál es nuestra meta ?

Todo este esfuerzo y trabajo duro a rendido frutos a nuestra comunidad, no solo a traído un grupo de jugadores más comprometidos a la causa, sino también ha llevado el nombre de Costa Rica fuera de las fronteras, al nivel más alto de competitividad que cualquier deporte puede tener, el campeonato mundial.


El año paso Costa Rica, junto con otras ocho naciones, participó en su primer campeonato mundial en la historia, enfrentando todos los problemas y experiencias con los que una selección nacional tiene que lidiar en eventos tan  importantes.


Afortunadamente Costa Rica no es el único país con esta convicción e idea de progreso: después de una reunión que tuvo lugar en Denver, se propuso organizar los primeros Juegos Latinoamericanos de Lacrosse, con el objetivo de consolidar el lacrosse como una disciplina que se practica en toda la región. Ahora la Federación de Lacrosse de Costa Rica acepta otro reto: la primera Copa Latinoamericana de Lacrosse, la cual se llevará acabo en Ciudad de México el próximo julio, evento en el cual los ticos estarán cabeza a cabeza contra México, Argentina, Colombia y Chile.

Cuando soñamos, lo hacemos en grande y hasta ahora nuestra voluntad y compromiso solo nos ha traído éxito, sin embargo los sueños siempre tienen un precio, desde la parte de la preparación física y técnica que se necesita, hasta la inversión que se debe hacer para llevar a los atletas a esos lugares; en este caso, ambos, la Federación como los costarricenses asistentes a la Copa Latinoamericana de Lacrosse  tienen que asumir toda la deuda; una inversión en la cual cosas como los tiquetes de avión, pasaportes, visas y transportes se deben tomar, sin olvidar los demás rubros (los implementos deportivos, hospedaje y alimentación); todo esto para 25 personas, el tamaño del grupo que representará a Costa Rica en la Copa.

A pesar de que no esperamos un patrocinio completo para llevar a Costa Rica a este importante evento, tenemos la esperanza de que nos des una mano. Con el dinero que se recaude a través de esta campaña, nuestra federación de lacrosse planea dar a los jugadores un empuje y encoger el costo de lo que sería el viaje a un evento que sucederá por primera vez en la historia, unítenos y ayudanos a llevar las buenas vibras del ''juego de la sanación'', hacelo por el lacrosse, por el bien del deporte!


Si querés más información y formar parte del proyecto: ''Costa Rica: rumbo a la primera Copa América de Lacrosse'' solo dale click  a alguno de los siguientes links y te ayudaremos:

Perfiles de Facebook

-Lacrosse Costa Rica: https://www.facebook.com/laxcostari

-Duendes Lax CR: https://www.facebook.com/duendeslax.cr.3

-Samurais Lax CR: https://www.facebook.com/samurais.lax

Páginas en Facebook

-Duendes Lacrosse CR: https://www.facebook.com/duendeslaxcr

-Diablos Lacrosse CR: https://www.facebook.com/DiablosSurSiders?fref=ts

-XCS Heredia Lacrosse CR: https://www.facebook.com/heredialax?fref=ts

Correo electrónico 

-Lacrosse Costa Rica: laxcr@hotmail.com

-Duendes Lax CR: duendeslaxcr@gmail.com

story:
The Project:  My name is Dado Delić, and I am a rolling drifter cycling around the globe, who  never wants to stop. I discovered my passion for bicycle touring in 2011 after going on my first bike tour from Bosnia-Herzegovina to the island Šolta in Croatia. This amazing experience encouraged me to start a cycling world tour. On my first world tour trip in 2012, I went from Bosnia-Herzegovina to Morocco, riding 4700 kilometers in 72 days through Croatia, Slovenia, Italy, France and Spain, where I finally crossed the Strait of Gibraltar and entered Morocco. 


Two years later, I decided to continue the journey by traveling from Bosnia to Uzbekistan. This 5400-kilometer trip in 2014 was an unforgettable, life-changing experience, meeting new cultures and people not only willing to share their foods and beds, but also their life stories and experiences with a stranger who soon became a friend.

A few kilograms lighter and more than a few experiences richer, I will continue my world tour in 2016 by traveling from Tajikistan through Kyrgyzstan, India, Nepal, Burma, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, China and South Korea to my final destination, Japan. This will be my most challenging experience so far taking me on a 13000-kilometer trip over 7 months.

Goals: 

My goal is to promote cycling as a cheap and clean means of transport and motivate others to do the same in a time when pollution and global warming are becoming serious issues that affect us all!

Also my dream is to see a world without borders, barriers and exclusion. This is why I want to raise money for an awesome NGO in Bosnia-Herzegovina, Novi Val, that gathers children and youth from divided cities and entities to come together for sports and learning about ecology. http://www.novival.info/

I have released 2 documentaries about my travels, and a third one will be released after I return from my trip!

This is why I want the world to engage in this project by following me throughout my trip and sending me personalized requests and challenges in order to help me create a new documentary! 


How you can help:

You can help by supporting this campaign by a simple share or by picking a perk and get some really - I mean really - nice stuff in return as a sign of gratitude and appreciation! Of course, you are free to share if you pick a perk, and for this special engagement, I will send you a big, warm, virtual hug along with all the awesome stuff you can get by supporting me!

How the money will be spent:

Support me to raise awareness about global warming, to promote cycling as a clean, healthy and eco-friendly means of travel, to fight for a world without borders, inclusion and equal access for kids to sports and education in a post-conflict country!

The money will be spent to finance the trip, to spread the message and to support our partners at Novi Val in Blagaj, Bosnia-Herzegovina. Ten percent of all proceeds will be donated to support Novi Val's work.

story_txt:
The Project:  My name is Dado Delić, and I am a rolling drifter cycling around the
globe, who  never wants to stop. I
discovered my passion for bicycle touring in 2011 after going on my first bike
tour from Bosnia-Herzegovina to the island Šolta in Croatia. This amazing
experience encouraged me to start a cycling world tour. On my first world tour
trip in 2012, I went from Bosnia-Herzegovina to Morocco, riding 4700 kilometers
in 72 days through Croatia, Slovenia, Italy, France and Spain, where I
finally crossed the Strait of Gibraltar and entered Morocco. Two years later, I
decided to continue the journey by traveling from Bosnia to Uzbekistan. This
5400-kilometer trip in 2014 was an unforgettable, life-changing experience,
meeting new cultures and people not only willing to share their foods and beds,
but also their life stories and experiences with a stranger who soon
became a friend. A few
kilograms lighter and more than a few experiences richer, I will continue my
world tour in 2016 by traveling from Tajikistan through Kyrgyzstan, India,
Nepal, Burma, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, China and South Korea to my final
destination, Japan. This will be my most challenging experience so far taking
me on a 13000-kilometer trip over 7 months.Goals: My goal is to
promote cycling as a cheap and clean means of transport and motivate others to
do the same in a time when pollution and global warming are becoming serious
issues that affect us all! 
Also my dream
is to see a world without borders, barriers and exclusion. This is why I want
to raise money for an awesome NGO in Bosnia-Herzegovina, Novi Val, that gathers
children and youth from divided cities and entities to come together for sports
and learning about ecology. http://www.novival.info/
I have
released 2 documentaries about my travels, and a third one will be released
after I return from my trip!This is why I
want the world to engage in this project by following me throughout my trip and
sending me personalized requests and challenges in order to help me create a
new documentary! How you can help:
You can help by
supporting this campaign by a simple share or by picking a perk and get some
really - I mean really - nice stuff in return as a sign of gratitude and
appreciation! Of course, you are free to share if you pick a perk, and for this
special engagement, I will send you a big, warm, virtual hug along with all the
awesome stuff you can get by supporting me!
How the money will be spent:
Support me to raise awareness about global warming, to
promote cycling as a clean, healthy and eco-friendly means of travel, to fight
for a world without borders, inclusion and equal access for kids to sports and
education in a post-conflict country!
The money will be spent
to finance the trip, to spread the message and to support our partners at Novi
Val in Blagaj, Bosnia-Herzegovina. Ten percent of all proceeds will be donated
to support Novi Val's work.

story:
From the Creator : "My New Arms"

Margo Marie Zatkovich

I’ve done many things in my life,…a gourmet cook, actor, author, Stand-up comedian and loved doing all of them, but My New Arms has become my real passion.

When I first conceived this product in October of 2015, it was about fashion,…but, it’s so much more.

Yes, it’s about women who have arm issues, but, also a solution for burn victims, people who have lost a lot of weight and women who are breast cancer survivors with atrophied arms. These women will now have the confidence to wear fashionable sleeveless clothes again rather than clothes to cover the flaws.

Women think this product is the amazing! No one realizes I’m wearing My New Arms until I ask, “How do you think my arms look in this top?” Their response,….”They look great, have you been working out?” Once I show them I’m wearing My New Arms their first question is “Where can I buy one?”…. not, how much does it cost! but, where can I buy it! That tells me everything, that tells me there is a real need for My New Arms.

Remember…

There are approximately 76.3 million "Baby Boomers" in the United States of which more than half are women over the age of 50. It is estimated that 60% of these women will refrain from wearing "sleeveless" sports  tops, daytime dresses, or evening wear. Why? Because they are embarrassed, or hate the way their arms look! Let's face it... Mother nature isn't always fair to women!

What We Need....

I am seeking $50,000 for cost of materials, manufacturing and distribution for the first 3,000 units. I have a long list of women who have already placed orders and stores interested in carrying My New Arms. Now, I just need to produce them and that’s where you come in. Anything you can contribute to help us is greatly appreciated.

To quote 50+ people who have seen me wearing My New Arms,  say, “This product is a Home Run”... I hope you’ll be saying that too.

My Commitment…

After we’re up and running, I will pledge $1.00 from each package of My New Arms sold to Breast Cancer Research in my mother’s name, Betty Patropulos, who was a breast cancer survivor.

Those of you, who know me, know I share, or give what I can to help others. By you helping me fund this project, together we both can solve some problems and give confidence back to a lot of women.

For those of you who cannot contribute monetarily,...can you please help me spread the word to all your friends, so all these women can happily say, “see My New Arms!”

story:
What is MyKeyTool?


Its small, lightweight, easy to use and carry. You can bet it’ll help you with many everyday tasks.


New: Kydex sheath free with every MyKeyTool

With each your contribution you will receive a free Kydex sheath, which perfectly protects the sharp blade. Kydex sheath will also allow you to acces the tool very quickly and you can carry It around your neck or on your keys.



Why did we create MyKeyTool?

At Black Cat knives we are big fans of all kinds of blades but especially pocket tool knives. There are many single blade pocket knives on the market today. However, only few can claim to be truly multifunctional instruments. 

Since some countries ban carrying knives, we have decided to create a simple multi-use tool for everyday carry. We also like hiking, traveling and camping outdoors. There you need to open your canned food supplies, vacuum packaging, make the fire or cut some cords. With that mind we set out to mesh all these needs into a single instrument: MyKeyTool.
We have added screwdrivers and carabiner. This tool comes handy when you cope with your everyday tasks.


How did we make It?

Initially came an idea of having a simple tool which could tackle with many basic tasks or problems one can encounter when hiking, camping, traveling or simply going about one’s regular day.

We knew what such a tool should do and started to draw the first concept.

Then we tried to figure out how to make it better and more useful by adding more functionalities.  With that in mind we cut the first mock-up model from a piece of plastic to test the design. Whether it’s ergonomic and functions well.
After tweaking various prototypes to our satisfaction we began searching for the right type material. In the end we chose German-made stainless steel plates. Using a laser cutter we produced our first batch of several hundreds of MyKeyTools. We’re grateful to our local suppliers who helped us all the way.

After that, we spend many hours in our workshop to find the best way of grinding, surface finishing and tool sharpening. It wasn't easy because each MyKeyTool is hand made. The simple looks of MyKeyTool are deceiving. Each MyKeyTool needs 5 different grinds and a lot of precise work.
When all of this hard work have been done we send all MyKeyTools for heat treatment. Heat treating makes the steel harder. That’s after all what any top quality tool has to be. We have also found supplier for the carabiner springs and laser marking.

Now we still need to do many production steps like:

  • to find the right way to sharpen the edge we have two goals in mind: sharpness and safety (no risk of MyKeyTool users ever suffering from any cut wounds)

  • to put it all together,

  • to create a simple and good-looking packaging, featuring all vital features of our product.



About Black Cat knives?

Black Cat knives is a brand created by the Slovakia-based Edge LTD that has been importing and distributing various knives and outdoor accessories in Slovakia for more than 11 years.

Having known and followed the knife market segment for this long, we know what’s out there, what our customers demand and what they can’t find. Therefore we also launched our own brand Black Cat knives. The next step is to bring this brand closer to customers outside our home market.

Our target customers are people who know better than buying mass produced Asian knives. They seek out top-quality knives and pocket accessories that are smart, full of spirit and passion, while sporting reasonable price tags.

We’d like to bring to the market other innovative products. We have some ideas, festering in our design-obsessed minds. The aim is to bring them as they mature in small production runs to our discerning and loyal customers.

MyKeyTool is just the first of such ideas that has reached a production-stage perfection. We hope that you will find our ideas and product such as MyKeyTool interesting and useful. We’d be grateful if you help us grow.





Why We Need You

In order to expand we’d like to let the world know that we are here. That’s why we’ve decided to introduce our product through Indiegogo. We have more than 400 pieces of MyKeyTool almost ready. Now we need to spread the word and find clients for even more MyKeyTools.

The money we hope to raise through this campaign will go for new machinery and materials so we can turn our other ideas into reality.


Our Perks

We have  13 different perks for you. So grab this chance to get your very own and first MyKeyTool to help you with everyday tasks.

Shipping - you will pay shipping only once (per package). No matter how many perks you will order at once. So please do not forget to pay for shipping with your first perk.
Please note that you will not pay postage on perks where we offer free shipping.

Left handed version - If you are interested in a left handed version of any our MyKeyTool, please let us know via email. We have prepared 100 pcs for left handed customers.


Want more?


Technical specifications

MyKeyTool weighs only 12 grams. It's made of high quality stainless steel for multi-year durability.

Patents pending for MyKeyTool designs. 


Our Timeline





We thank you for your support!

story:
The community of Hillcrest in San Diego has a deficit of public spaces.  Hillcrest is one of the few neighborhoods in San Diego that has no public parks.  Neighbors and city planners have long sought to "Re-imagine Normal Street" by making it into a multi use public space that accommodates all means of transportation.  It will  be an adaptive public space that accommodates a variety of uses from events and parking to safe spaces for bikes and pedestrians.

We have a unique opportunity right now to make this space a reality and we need your help!  SANDAG (the regional transportation authority in San Diego) is planning on putting bike lanes through this space and there are millions of dollars in unspent parking meter revenue set aside that could be used in this area.  This crowdfunding opportunity will bridge the gap between what SANDAG can build (bike lanes and related infrastructure like sidewalks and green spaces) and what the Uptown Community Parking District can build (parking spaces and related infrastructure).   


We will use your contribution for elements that SANDAG and the Parking District can't pay for such as trees, sidewalk fixtures ( seating, plants, lights), place making features, adaptable furnishings and artistic elements.

History

Beginning as a through way for the streetcar, Normal Street is now a wide boulevard that is home to a variety of events.  This place is the staging area of the annual Pride Parade, weekly Farmers Market and many other community events such as Nightmare on Normal Street, Pride Block Party and AIDS Walk.  Normal Street is also home to Hillcrest's well known Pride Flag and LGBT historical monument.  

Pedestrian Promenade
The Hillcrest Business Association is currently working with a team of urban planners and designers to create a pedestrian promenade by closing the lanes on the Northwest side of the street.  This promenade will add pedestrian walkways, gathering spaces, bicycle lanes, parking and will augment “Pride Plaza” to accommodate the larger gatherings that occur around the flagpole.    

The Normal Street is being re-designed by a consortium of planners at KTU+A, Estrada Land Planning, RBF Consulting, Carson Douglas, BNIM, students at the Escuela Libre de Arquitectura and a number of retired architects.  It is envisioned that construction will be funded by SANDAG, the San Diego Storm Water Department and the Uptown Community Parking District.

story:
THE AIM

It seems, that since the generation of Fiala, Galfy, Demjan or Psotka the golden era of high-altitude  Slovak mountain climbing is irrevocably away. But there still remained people, who want, and still have someting to say.  The fundamental idea of this presentaiton is to point out how beautiful this sport is, and try to explain to the general public, why and by which motives the high-altitude mountain climbing still attracts sports enthusiasts.

THE AIM IS TO MAKE A NEW SLOVAK ALPINE STYLE ROUTE TO THE MAIN SUMMIT MANASLU (8163m), VIA LARKE HIMAL RIDGE AND MANASLU NORTH (7157m)


THE FILM

During the expedition, the video content will be continuously made. it will be the background and fundamental pillar for the expeditionary short film.

the main motive of the film will attempt to find answer to the basic question, wrich is being asked by many of us:

WHY?

WHY CLIMBERS GO TO THE MOUNTAINS? WHY THEY RISK LIFES, SUFFER BY COLD, BAD WEATHER, ALTITUDE, OR OBJECTIVE DANGER? ARE THEY IRRESPONSIBLE FOOLS? OR IS IT ALL ABOUT EGO?


THE TEAM


MICHAL GABRIŽ

He was born in 1977 in the heart of Slovak Mountains and currently lives

in Bratislava. He is dedicated to the mountains practically all his life. His first higher summit was reached in 1995, when climbed to the summit of Mont Blanc. 

He have been working in advertising for 20 years as a designer and art director. He has worked in Bratislava and Prague. He participated on many advertising campaigns and won several international creative awards.

Short climbing history:

2009 Island Peak, 6183m, Nepal, to 5800m

2010 Mera Peak Central, 6461m, Nepal, summit

2012 Obergabelhorn, 4063m, north face, D, Wallis, summitl

2012 Singu Chuli, Nepal, 6501m, first attempt, to 5200m

2013 Grossglockner, Mayerlrampe, D+, Rakúsko, summit

2013 Pik Korzhenevskoy, 7105m, south ridge, alpine style, Pamir, summit

2013 Pik Kommunizma, 7495m, Borodkin's spur, Pamir, alpine style, to 6000m

2014 Ortler, 3905, north face, Messner's route, TD+, Italy, summit

2014 Island Peak, 6183m, Nepal, winter ascent, summit

2014 Manaslu, 8163m, Nepal, japan route, solo attempt, to 7000m

+ many other climbs in High Tatrs and Alpes to difficulty TD+, 7+ UIAA, WI 5


WHAT I NEED

THE PLAN

- acclimatization on the normal japanese route 5.4. - 25.4.2016 .

- finding the right way to the north ridge of Larku Himal. 

- attempt to climb north ridge via Manaslu North (7157) to main summit. cca 10 days from 1st of may 2016 (depends on weather forecast)

- summit.

- descent via normal japan route.


THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

salute the mountains!


_____________________________________________________________________________

CIEĽ

Zdá sa, že zlatá éra slovenského výškového horolezectva je nenávratne preč s generáciou Fialu, Gálfyho, Demjána či Psotku. Stále však sú tu ľudia, ktorí k tomu ešte chcú a majú čo povedať. Ideou je ukázať, o aký krásny šport sa jedná a pokúsiť sa vysvetliť verejnosti, prečo a čím výškové horolezectvo stále priťahuje športových nadšencov.

CIEĽOM JE SLOVENSKÝ PRVOVÝSTUP NOVOU CESTOU, ALPSKÝM ŠTÝLOM NA HLAVNÝ VRCHOL MANASLU (8163M), CEZ HREBEŇ LARKE HIMAL A MANASLU NORTH (7157M).


FILM

Počas expedície bude kontinuálne a cielene vznikať video kontent, ktorý bude podkladom pre expedičný krátkometrážny film. Jeho hlavným motívom bude pokus nájsť odpoveď na základnú otázku, ktorú si pokladajú mnohí z vás:

PREČO?

PREČO CHODIA ĽUDIA DO VYSOKÝCH HÔR? PREČO RISKUJÚ ŽIVOTY, TRPIA ZIMOU, POČASÍM, VÝŠKOU, ČI SA VYSTAVUJÚ OBJEKTÍVNEMU NEBEZPEČENSTVU HÔR? SÚ TO NEZODPOVEDNÍ BLÁZNI? HĽADAJÚ NÁPLASŤ NA SVOJE EGO?


TEAM






MICHAL GABRIŽ

Narodil sa v roku 1977 uprostred Slovenského Rudohoria a momentálne žije v Bratislave. Venuje sa horám prakticky po celý život. Vyšším horám pričuchol prvý krát v roku 1995, kedy vystúpil na vrchol Mont Blancu.

V pracovnom živote pôsobí 20 rokov v reklame ako dizajnér a art director. Pôsobil v Bratislave a v Prahe. Na svojom konte má množstvo reklamných kampaní  a medzinárodných kreatívnych ocenení.

Stručná aplinistické história:

2009 Island Peak, 6183m, Nepal, dosiahnutá výška 5800m

2010 Mera Peak Central, 6461m, Nepal, vrchol

2012 Obergabelhorn, 4063m, severná stena, D, Wallis, vrchol

2012 Singu Chuli, Nepal, 6501m, pokus o prvovýstup južnou stenou, dosiahnutá výška 5200m

2013 Grossglockner, Mayerlrampe, D+, Rakúsko, vrchol

2013 Pik Korzhenevskoy, 7105m, južný hrebeň, alpský štýl, Pamír, vrchol

2013 Pik Kommunizma, 7495m, Borodkinova ostroha, Pamír, alpský štýl, dosiahnutá výška cca 6000m

2014 Ortler, 3905, severná stena, Messnerova cesta, TD+, Taliansko, vrchol

2014 Island Peak, 6183m, Nepal, zimný výstup, vrchol

2014 Manaslu, 8163m, Nepal, japonská cesta, sólo pokus, dosiahnutá výška cca 7000m

+ množstvo výstupov vo Vysokých Tatrách a Alpách do obtiažnosti TD+, 7+ UIAA, WI 5



ČO POTREBUJEM


PLÁN

- aklimatizácia klasickou japonskou cestou 5.4. - 25.4.2016 .

- zvolenie vhodného miesta nástupu na severný hrebeň.

- pokus o prvovýstup severným hrebeňom cez manaslu north (7157). 

cca 10 dní od 1.5.2016 (podľa predpovede počasia)

- hlavný vrchol Manaslu

- zostup klasickou japonskou cestou.


ĎAKUJEM ZA VAŠU PODPORU!

hore zdar!
story_txt:
THE AIM
It seems, that since the generation of Fiala, Galfy, Demjan or Psotka the golden era of high-altitude  Slovak mountain climbing is irrevocably away. But there still remained people, who want, and still have someting to say.  The fundamental idea of this presentaiton is to point out how beautiful this sport is, and try to explain to the general public, why and by which motives the high-altitude mountain climbing still attracts sports enthusiasts.


THE AIM IS TO MAKE A NEW SLOVAK ALPINE STYLE ROUTE TO THE MAIN SUMMIT MANASLU (8163m), VIA LARKE HIMAL RIDGE AND MANASLU NORTH (7157m)



THE FILM


During the expedition, the video content will be continuously made. it will be the background and fundamental pillar for the expeditionary short film.
the main motive of the film will attempt to find answer to the basic question, wrich is being asked by many of us:
WHY?




WHY CLIMBERS GO TO THE MOUNTAINS? WHY THEY RISK LIFES, SUFFER BY COLD, BAD WEATHER, ALTITUDE, OR OBJECTIVE DANGER? ARE THEY IRRESPONSIBLE FOOLS? OR IS IT ALL ABOUT EGO?


THE TEAM



MICHAL GABRIŽ


He was born in 1977 in the heart of Slovak Mountains and currently lives
in Bratislava. He is dedicated to the mountains practically all his life. His first higher summit was reached in 1995, when climbed to the summit of Mont Blanc. 


He have been working in advertising for 20 years as a designer and art director. He has worked in Bratislava and Prague. He participated on many advertising campaigns and won several international creative awards.
Short climbing history:


2009 Island Peak, 6183m, Nepal, to 5800m
2010 Mera Peak Central, 6461m, Nepal, summit
2012 Obergabelhorn, 4063m, north face, D, Wallis, summitl
2012 Singu Chuli, Nepal, 6501m, first attempt, to 5200m
2013 Grossglockner, Mayerlrampe, D+, Rakúsko, summit
2013 Pik Korzhenevskoy, 7105m, south ridge, alpine style, Pamir, summit
2013 Pik Kommunizma, 7495m, Borodkin's spur, Pamir, alpine style, to 6000m
2014 Ortler, 3905, north face, Messner's route, TD+, Italy, summit
2014 Island Peak, 6183m, Nepal, winter ascent, summit
2014 Manaslu, 8163m, Nepal, japan route, solo attempt, to 7000m


+ many other climbs in High Tatrs and Alpes to difficulty TD+, 7+ UIAA, WI 5



WHAT I NEED

THE PLAN

- acclimatization on the normal japanese route 5.4. - 25.4.2016 .
- finding the right way to the north ridge of Larku Himal. 
- attempt to climb north ridge via Manaslu North (7157) to main summit. cca 10 days from 1st of may 2016 (depends on weather forecast)
- summit.
- descent via normal japan route.


THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
salute the mountains!


_____________________________________________________________________________

CIEĽ
 

Zdá sa, že zlatá éra slovenského výškového horolezectva je nenávratne preč s generáciou Fialu, Gálfyho, Demjána či Psotku. Stále však sú tu ľudia, ktorí k tomu ešte chcú a majú čo povedať. Ideou je ukázať, o aký krásny šport sa jedná a pokúsiť sa vysvetliť verejnosti, prečo a čím výškové horolezectvo stále priťahuje športových nadšencov.


CIEĽOM JE SLOVENSKÝ PRVOVÝSTUP NOVOU CESTOU, ALPSKÝM ŠTÝLOM NA HLAVNÝ VRCHOL MANASLU (8163M), CEZ HREBEŇ LARKE HIMAL A MANASLU NORTH (7157M).




FILM


Počas expedície bude kontinuálne a cielene vznikať video kontent, ktorý bude podkladom pre expedičný krátkometrážny film. Jeho hlavným motívom bude pokus nájsť odpoveď na základnú otázku, ktorú si pokladajú mnohí z vás:


PREČO?



PREČO CHODIA ĽUDIA DO VYSOKÝCH HÔR? PREČO RISKUJÚ ŽIVOTY, TRPIA ZIMOU, POČASÍM, VÝŠKOU, ČI SA VYSTAVUJÚ OBJEKTÍVNEMU NEBEZPEČENSTVU HÔR? SÚ TO NEZODPOVEDNÍ BLÁZNI? HĽADAJÚ NÁPLASŤ NA SVOJE EGO?


TEAM







MICHAL GABRIŽ
Narodil sa v roku 1977 uprostred Slovenského Rudohoria a momentálne žije v Bratislave. Venuje sa horám prakticky po celý život. Vyšším horám pričuchol prvý krát v roku 1995, kedy vystúpil na vrchol Mont Blancu.
V pracovnom živote pôsobí 20 rokov v reklame ako dizajnér a art director. Pôsobil v Bratislave a v Prahe. Na svojom konte má množstvo reklamných kampaní  a medzinárodných kreatívnych ocenení.


Stručná aplinistické história:


2009 Island Peak, 6183m, Nepal, dosiahnutá výška 5800m
2010 Mera Peak Central, 6461m, Nepal, vrchol
2012 Obergabelhorn, 4063m, severná stena, D, Wallis, vrchol
2012 Singu Chuli, Nepal, 6501m, pokus o prvovýstup južnou stenou, dosiahnutá výška 5200m
2013 Grossglockner, Mayerlrampe, D+, Rakúsko, vrchol
2013 Pik Korzhenevskoy, 7105m, južný hrebeň, alpský štýl, Pamír, vrchol
2013 Pik Kommunizma, 7495m, Borodkinova ostroha, Pamír, alpský štýl, dosiahnutá výška cca 6000m
2014 Ortler, 3905, severná stena, Messnerova cesta, TD+, Taliansko, vrchol
2014 Island Peak, 6183m, Nepal, zimný výstup, vrchol
2014 Manaslu, 8163m, Nepal, japonská cesta, sólo pokus, dosiahnutá výška cca 7000m


+ množstvo výstupov vo Vysokých Tatrách a Alpách do obtiažnosti TD+, 7+ UIAA, WI 5

  ČO POTREBUJEM




   PLÁN 
- aklimatizácia klasickou japonskou cestou 5.4. - 25.4.2016 .
- zvolenie vhodného miesta nástupu na severný hrebeň.
- pokus o prvovýstup severným hrebeňom cez manaslu north (7157). 
cca 10 dní od 1.5.2016 (podľa predpovede počasia)
- hlavný vrchol Manaslu
- zostup klasickou japonskou cestou.

story:
Wallaby introduction

Hello, we are Tal and Noa, and we are two very good friends, with one very good idea…Tal is a high school teacher, and Noa is psychology major who works at a known high-tech company. 

Lately we noticed that there are a whole lot of people in our everyday environment, who drive to work, school or college, on an electric bike. After parking the bike, there is always the question – do you leave the battery on the bike and risk having it stolen? Worrying all day if it's still where you left it..? Or do you take it with you and get stuck carrying around this heavy weight object in your hands everywhere you go… Well, how about neither??

Wallaby is offering a smart and simple solution to all of these problems! A stylish backpack, that contains a hidden compartment, especially designed for carrying the bike battery, easily and comfortably! use it for school, work, traveling... and even just hanging around with your friends.

With your help we can make this simple dream, a stress free, weightless reality!



sizes: 40 cm hight, 28 cm width, 20 cm depth, 22 liter.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Wallaby invites you, yes-you! to be one of the first people to recognize this product's full potential, and assist us in raising  it to life!

On our part, we are more than happy to treat you to any of our special perks, from cool and customized bike accessories, to a fun bike adventure across the beautiful Tel Aviv-Yafo shoreline, followed by a cold drink on the beach.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute financially? that doesn't mean you can't help! you can assist very quickly and easily just by getting the word out about the wallaby backpack. so if you like this idea and believe it might have potential, if you would like to see it available in stores one day, all you have to do is share! tell your friends about us, recommend it on Facebook or any other social media... how ever you decide to  spread the word, you will be a big help to us, with hardly any effort.
THANK YOU!

contact us
we are always here if you have any questions:
e-mail: wallabyservice@gmail.com

facebook: #wallaby


 





 

Rewards

story:
"We never know the worth of water until the well is dry" - Thomas Fuller

Safe drinking water is one of the most urgent requirements of aid organisations in the critical first 24-48 hours following an event. Access to safe drinking water can help to prevent the spread of  disease, and greatly increases the chances of a community making a full recovery. 

None of us can survive more than a few days without safe drinking water. The sad reality is that more than 1 billion people lack access to safe drinking water, and even more are exposed to unsafe drinking water following disasters and emergency events.

At Vinnovate, we believe we've developed a solution. 

It's called Puribag. It's a low cost, lightweight, re-usable and mobile 10L water treatment system  to provide people with access to safe drinking water. The Puribag Project allows us to create a business with a social conscience, that promotes a social cause, and that will make a real-world impact by allowing users to create 150L of safe drinking water, when and where they need it most from almost any fresh water source. 

 

The Puribag Project

We set out to design a low cost, low-tech solution to the issue of safe water provision. Our focus has been to create a bridge between the event or most urgent need for safe water occurring, and  the restoration of infrastructure.

The Puribag can be used under nearly any circumstances, and the things that make Puribag so valuable following events, make it equally as valuable in everyday life. The filter won't easily block, and you can remove all the nasty stuff; making the water safe to drink, for days. 

This is a simple solution to the world's most pressing problem. 

While many solutions focus on  high tech ways to solve the problem, these products normally command a high price, and it's often those who can't afford it who need it the most.

In re-thinking how aid is given, we focussed on a proactive approach to a situation, rather than being reactive. This means that a key goal was to develop a product which can be pre-positioned in high risk areas for up to 3 years, or air-dropped into an area immediately following the event.

In short, we set out to make a difference; to save people's lives. Through supporting the Puribag project, you can too!

  • Initially we started as a beverage innovation company founded by brothers' Simon and Joshua Schmidt, with a focus on improving beverages for consumers. We soon found that our idea could have application in humanitarian pursuits, and we set about creating a unique water bag system.  
  • Having travelled to India on numerous occasions and learning about the work of the Tata Water Mission in providing aid and safe drinking water to millions of Indians per year, we decided that we'd found our first (of hopefully many) partner, and this was a mission we wanted to get on board with. 
  • By supporting this project, you can make a real difference to someone's life. Donated Puribag's will be gifted to NGO's and aid organisations such as the Tata Water Mission to be stocked in disaster preparedness stations and deployed immediately following a disaster; thus reducing the burden on aid staff, empowering those affected to live their lives, and preventing the spread of waterborne disease.

 

Where we are at

  • We have successfully completed multiple pilot programs in rural India, converting contaminated fresh water into safe, potable drinking water. 
  • We have all the pieces in place to get this project off the ground and doing good, we just need YOU to get on board, and make a real difference to someone else's life.
  • The goal of the campaign is to raise AUD$100,000. This funding will be used to establish commercial manufacturing of the Puribag, and to produce and DONATE a minimum of 2,000 bags.
  • 2,000 bags can produce up to 300,000L of safe, potable drinking water and can do so under emergency conditions.
  • The Puribag, with its 150L functional capacity is ideal for camping, prepping and outdoor activities too. 
  • Weighing around 200grams (approximately 7oz), the Puribag is the perfect addition to any 'go-bag' or backup water supply for the truck or the car!
  • Vinnovate is approaching this crowdfunding campaign as a pre-purchase opportunity. You can either buy for yourself, or choose to donate a Puribag which we will supply on your behalf. Either way, if you purchase a Puribag, you can do so in the knowledge that you're doing your bit to change the life of others less fortunate, when they're at their most vulnerable. 

 

The Impact

From Kerala, to the Pacific Islands, Houston to Townsville; no one is immune from a disaster event occurring. BUT, we can be prepared. 

Your contribution will see this project come to life. If you wish to purchase the bag for yourself, that's amazing and will make your camping or outdoor trips, all the better. If you wish for it to be donated, you will be allowing us to provide bags to organisations such as the Tata Water Mission (and others), to place the Puribag in high risk areas where it can be deployed immediately following an event. This means instant access to safe water in the critical first 24-48 hours following an event.

It has been heartbreaking to see people affected; some even losing their lives after a disaster event.

  • The Puribag Project allows people to create their own safe drinking water (150L) per bag; restoring independence, dignity and reducing the demands of aid organisations immediately after a disaster event!
  • Puribag lessens the requirement for people who've already suffered to then be confined to aid camps for their basic requirements.
  • The Puribag has been successfully tested in India, under some of the most trying conditions available, and come out with flying colours. 

 

Our journey so far 

The path to commercialising a new product is a long one. Over the past 4 years, we've travelled to India on multiple occasions to build relationships and show our commitment to our cause. We've spent time touring slums, meeting with businesses and with aid organisations to appreciate the real need for access to safe water; something many of us take for granted. 

In recent years, we have been forced to sit back and watch as earthquakes, landslides, floods, cyclones, monsoons and wild weather has lashed parts of the world, knowing that we have conceived and developed a solution. Sadly, we've not yet been able to produce the product at commercial scale.

Every person deserves the right to access safe drinking water; it's even more important after an emergency or disaster event. 

  • We are resilient, dedicated, determined and confident. We have travelled the world, attending water events in the EU and in Asia. We have sured up the supply chain to ensure the Puribag can reach its intended audience, and the only thing left is to raise the funds to buy the tools. This is where we need your help. 
  • We are 2 brothers who dare to believe that we can change the world for the better, and through supporting this project, you too can play a part.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We ask that if you can't or won't contribute, that you share this video so we can get the support we need to make this product a reality and save lives! And if hearing what we are doing inspires you to do more to help others, then that's amazing too! Every little bit helps.

Thank you.

For technical information please see FAQ's.

Puribag proudly developed in South Australia by Vinnovate PTY LTD in conjunction with Praqua PTY LTD.

*Patent Pending*

** Blue dye used in Puribag for display purposes only **

http://vinnovate.com.au/industries/
