story:
Short Summary:

We're Neckpacker. Product design company with the most innovative new solutions for travel apparel. This is our second InDemand.

One tree planted

AMAZON FIRE: By now you've very likely heard the news that there are many fires burning in the Amazon Rainforest in Brazil.

We're part of the One Tree Program. For every jacket ordered, a one new tree is planted!

 

What You Get:

Jacket for everyday use. Jacket for travelers. Jacket for all of us.​

 

Help us and preorder this All Black Hybrid Jacket and bring it to life. You will get this Jacket with worldwide patented innovation.

Use both hoods when traveling. BY PLANE, CAR, TRAIN OR BUS. And when you don't.. Remove the inner hood.

Breathable, lightweight, waterproof and windproof, YKK zippers. We select all our fabrics with extreme care. 

Best designers in Europe created this jacket for active people who know that life won't wait. This innovative design is a great mix of streetwear and outdoor wear.

4 straps help you to find your hood-fit. Try the inflatable inner hood when sleeping. This combo of support generates an incredibly weightless sensation for your head and neck.

8 functional pockets for your belongings. That's more than enough. Everything you need, with you always.

 

We wanna share these media of Hybrid Jacket what we have found so far:

https://www.hi-techchic.com/the-hybrid-jacket-2...

https://www.yankodesign.com/2019/09/17/the-neck...

https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/hybrid-jacket

https://www.businessfinland.fi/en/whats-new/new...

https://newatlas.com/sponsored-content/neckpack...

https://bouncy.news/50339

http://gadgetdominicana.com/2019/09/24/la-chaqu...

https://blog.123.design/apparel/travel-jacket-h...

Materials:

153gsm, 94%Polyamide 6%Elastane, TPU 5000/5000.

Air pillow: TPU, rubber, PVC

Sizing: 

Womens Jacket: XS, S, M, L

Mens Jacket: S, M, L, XL

 

Since 2012-2013

“After the Easter holiday of 2012 my friends and I were driving back home from the Finnish Lapland where we had been snowboarding and partying for several days. The road trip was long and tiring. Although I was tired after all our activities, I just couldn’t fall asleep. My head was bouncing from one side to the other, against the car window and back to the other side. I borrowed an inflatable neck pillow from one of my friends. That was a little bit better but I was still too uncomfortable to sleep. I couldn’t completely rest my head sideways with the poor lateral support and when my head was tilting forward, the pillow offered almost no support at all. I tried turning the pillow around backwards, but then with the pressure on my throat I felt I was choking.

“In those desperate, tired hours I started to wonder if there could be more innovative way of handling the situation. I Imagined an inflatable pillow which could wrap around the front, sides, and back of my head, somewhat like a helmet. To inflate the borrowed pillow, I had to huff and puff, then keep the air in while closing the plug when blowing air from my mouth. It was just too messy and annoying. I began to imagine a pump to inflate my ideal pillow.

“After being awake some twelve hours in a car, I finally arrived home and managed to get a good long sleep. I woke up well rested but my idea of the ideal travel pillow still kept buzzing in my head.

“Eventually I sat down and started sketching my idea. I got carried away and spent almost another sleepless night, this time with great spirit and energy. The next day I called a friend who is a designer and knows about materials and production. We sat down and I showed her my concept. She immediately understood my idea and got enthusiastic about its innovation. She helped me with more technical sketches and put me in contact with people who helped me to build the first prototypes.

“Once I started testing mock-ups, I immediately realized that the air cushion system was really comfortable. It was something totally new and different but it lacked something. Although it was super comfortable, it didn’t offer enough vertical and lateral support.

“Thinking about how to create this needed support, I eventually came up with the idea of a hood-type cushion with diagonal straps on both sides. At that point I needed some way for the straps to attach to the shoulders. That’s the moment the idea of a vest with an integrated inflatable hood was born! 

"Moving forward I realized that the vest could also serve as a handy garment for storing all the small items that we all usually carry with us when we travel like tickets, passport, and phone.

“Since my idea was getting more serious and complex, I asked my best friend, who had a good touch for marketing and commercial issues, if he wanted to join the team. He carefully evaluated the concept and the prototypes. He quickly agreed that I was creating something big and he eagerly jumped on board.

“We worked on more prototypes, each working better than the one before. When we felt we had the right prototype we presented it to TEKES, which is a governmental innovation fund for start-up innovations that have global market potential. The people in the TEKES office gave us the green light and they provided an investment grant that was big enough to start the patenting process, plus more testing and prototyping.

“We continued working out the details of the development, met with producers for the various parts, and had 1:1 drawings and prototypes made of all of the elements.

“We started testing our product with various people including a good mix of genders, ages, body types, and nationalities. Our testers’ general reaction was ‘WOW! This is amazing!'

“People were astonished at how the Neckpacker system’s head support was effective without tensing a single muscle. ‘Feels like my head is floating in the clouds,’ said one. ‘I feel like sitting down and falling asleep straight away,’ said another. Those were typical comments from our testers and those moments kept us working even harder and believing more and more in the future commercial success of our product.

“We talked with business advisors and investors, always listening carefully to their advice on how we should proceed to establish and commercialize our product. Again and again we were advised to consider crowdfunding as a tool for introducing and establishing our product on the international stage.

“At the same time we expanded our team with people who had experience that we lacked at that point. As we progressed and our patent was granted we decided that crowdfunding would be the best way to get the necessary boost that our start-up needed AND to launch our product in the best possible way.

After few months we raised over 133 000 USD from other platform and IndieGoGo in 2017. Now 2019 we have sold our products already to over 60 countries around the world and the group of Neckpacker users is growing fast! Our team also keeps growing and have to say that I’m very proud of everyone! 

“That’s pretty much our story. From a hazy idea born of a tired mind in the backseat of a car in the darkness of a snowy winter night to a patented travel jacket and vest. We are now ready to hit the market with the results of our innovations. We’ve come a pretty long way!”

We love creating innovative products that help people simplify, organize and improve their lives. We are so grateful to all of our backers and supporters who helped us successfully launch the 1st campaign on the Platforms.  Thanks for all of your support!  If you have any feedback or questions please contact us through our website  https://neckpacker.com/

Founders Niklas Kuusela & Mikko Nisula

 

Thousands of customers are enjoying better traveling, you should try it too! We started the development of our Neckpacker products in 2013. 

We looked everywhere and couldn't find this kind of jackets. So we decided to make one. Developed by travelers for everyone!  

2017 our backers helped us to make these products. 

https://twomonkeystravelgroup.com/neckpacker-tr...

Check reviews of the products we made after 1st campaign launch: 

NECKPACKER PARTNERING WITH FINNISH BASKETBALL CHAMPION TEAM!​

Kauhajoki Karhu Basket (English: Kauhajoki Bear Basket), also known as Kauhajoen Karhu or simply Karhu, is a Finnish basketball team from Kauhajoki. The team plays in Korisliiga, the highest tier of Finnish basketball.

In 2018, the club achieved their first Korisliiga title ever after defeating Salon Vilpas 4–2 in the finals. It successfully defended its title the next season to repeat as Finnish champions.

Karhu team will travel with Neckpacker in this season and playoffs!

 

 

Risks and challenges

This is our 2nd InDemand project since 2017. Last time we succesfully delivered everything.
There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when a start-up is trying to bring a product to life. There are so many moving parts that must be managed.
However with this being our second product launch, we can confidently say that we are experienced in this process and have developed systems and methods to mitigate the risks that arise along the way. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible. Thanks for believing in us! We offer worldwide shipping. All items are shipped from our Hong Kong warehouse. Note that international (EU) customers will be responsible for any applicable import duties or taxes required by their country.
Exhanges & returns
We offer a 14 day exchange and return right after receiving the item. The item needs to be in the same conditions to be eligible for return or exchange.
Because we are offering our jackets at highly discounted prices we can't offer the return & exchange service for free. Please look at the measurements table and do your best to find the correct size. You are responsible of the return shipping costs and any additional costs when changing the item.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Folks please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Share this project on your social media.

story:
LET'S GO SOMEWHERE NICE

PURA VIDA CAMPERS will restore and configure three classic Volkswagen T3 camper vans, so you can go on a road trip along the west coast of Europe.

These vans have a lot of character and are up for every kind of adventure - just as the country of Portugal. We want you to have the chance to go on a road trip with this original travel companions and feel the freedom of road trippin' in Portugal - where you can park and stay overnight everywhere you want.



GO SLOW

No need to hurry, no need to plan.. no matter how far you still want to go, you have a small home on wheels with many details that will make it cozy everywhere. 



THREE COZY HOMES

We wish you can disconnect completely from everyday life and enjoy the simplicity of the life in the camper, even cooking becomes a relaxing moment. For sure, no dish washer included but it will be amazing to have your private dinner in front of the ocean. And what better than a cup of hot tea after surfing the most amazing waves of Europe? Even with the rain the camper will be your cozy shelter. For few days, leave everything behind.. everything you really need fits in a backpack! 




STAY EVERYWHERE YOU WANT,

NO CAMPSITE NEEDED

Our main goal is to share with more and more people the great freedom that traveling with the van in Portugal can offer. When you wake up far away from the crowds, you can enjoy the calming rhythm of the waves and feel the deep connection with nature. In the magnificent natural settings of Portugal you can stretch your body and soul. Set out to discover 850 km of wild coastline, the charm of the local people and the colorful villages, the excellent surf, tasty wines and unique sunsets at the edge of Europe. 






WE PREPARE YOUR BED

To get the vans back on the road they will need a main restoration. With the founds collected we will find new materials and decorations for our campers and we will invest all our work and love to make each one of them special... we will use natural fabrics, solid wood, bright paints for the interiors and new camping equipment. Senhor Mario will take care of the outside renovation. 



OUR MOTIVATION

Pura Vida Campers - that's Carlotta, Hendrik and our little boy. Since we left behind our office job we are starting from zero in Portugal. This small and pristine part of our planet is the place we would like to become our new home. We love building, painting and creating... But most of all we are travel enthusiastic and we wish to share our passion for road trips with everybody! 



THANKS TO OUR LOCAL FRIENDS

We are thankful for everybody supporting us. Here, in Ericeira we found great partners for with common spirit.

Board Culture - Surf&Fashion
NaOnda - Surfschool
Yoga Shala - Yoga studio
Be U - Organic food and health treatments

story:
It started on a warm summer night on Lake Shasta when I boated across the smooth glassy water, looked up and saw power lines sprawling over the lake.  The idea to fly without a rope, motor, or jetpack intrigued me. By happenstance I met Dan McTimmonds the following week who also dreamed of building and operating a zipline tour and together we jumped off that platform and took the leap of faith into this project, Shasta Zipline Adventures.  This was almost four years ago and we are now getting ready to ask our community, state, and eco-adventurists alike to help us build a top notch zipline course for all to experience and enjoy the beauty of Northern California and Lake Shasta.

 

If you have ever imagined soaring through the air amidst four to six hundred year old trees, and experiencing nature from a different point of view, then Shasta Zipline Adventures is for you!  The tour will be comprised of a series of wire rope cables and sky bridges interconnected through the old-growth trees located in the backyard of the Shasta-Trinity Wilderness Area. It is designed to provide an easy and safe but high-adventure experience that will also educate visitors about the local environment and ecology of the forest. All groups will be accompanied by certified, professional guides.  We strive to create an atmosphere where our guests feel comfortable and enjoy a laid back experience and we know this comes from good quality staff members. We will operate near Lakehead, CA which offers easy access to all from Interstate 5.

Making memories for a lifetime with Shasta Zipline Adventures

Who we are

I’m Jason Vine and together with Dan McTimmonds, we are working together to make our dream of a zipline course and outdoor adventure experience a  reality in beautiful Northern California.  With our love for the great outdoors and our combined knowledge of the local environment and ecology, we are able share a  unique adventure and educational experience with the masses. Our vision for this project is to give back to our local community and help visitors alike build memories that last a lifetime.

We aim to enrich our community and environment here in the Lakehead California region. This will be a unique one-of-a-kind tour that can be enjoyed with no need for special experience or purchase of equipment for the adventure seeker.

History and Current Status

The idea for Shasta Zipline Adventures originated in August of 2006, and since then, owner/operator Dan McTimmonds has completed many of the  procedures to complete a thorough due diligence process.  He has completed site visits to existing  zipline tour operators in both Alaska and Costa Rica, as well as throughout California, in order to amass industry knowledge from a variety of different operators.

A 40-acre property near Lakehead, California was selected for the project based on its scenic beauty coupled with an economically viable location. This property has already been purchased and bids for the Welcome Center Base Camp which will house the  safety training, parking and restrooms are currently being solicited.

 

Where we are headed

We are thrilled to announce that we have obtained our first permit!  This is for the construction of the entrance to the driveway to the welcome center.  This is the start of something big because once we improve the entrance, we can then begin to bring in supplies for construction on both the welcome center and the  zipline course itself.

What we need

We need your help to keep this momentum going and to fund a Media Kit to raise awareness to help pay for Phase 2 funding (the engineering and construction of the zipline course). Phase 3 will be for the costs associated with the construction of the welcome center and initial operational costs.  We are hopeful to be zipping by this fall!


Your Support

With your support we will be able to bring this opportunity of Zipline Adventure Tours to Northern California to showcase our local treasures of beautiful Lake Shasta,the Shasta Trinity Wilderness Area and much, much more..

Donations are welcome in any form, contact us to learn how you can get involved or work for a lifetime season pass.

Shasta Zipline Adventures Tour Park Timeline and Breakdown

Winter 2016

Submit 1600 Fish and Wildlife Permit, Grading Permit, Building Permit, and State SWPPP permit.

Spring 2016

Kick-off meeting with Shasta County Fish and Wildlife.  After the kick-off meeting, we will proceed to the installation of the driveway entrance and improvement of the parking lot.

Summer 2016

Getting all our ziplines and suspension bridges installed, operational supplies in order, and safety measures completed. This includes hiring and training our tour guides, website completion, reservation system and marketing materials for the welcome center. 

Fall 2016

Finishing the welcome center and having the Grand Opening Party!!

Choose a perk.

In return for your generous contribution, we are offering perks of a limited run special edition hat or shirt as well as options to get tickets or season passes at a reduced price for use when the park opens this Fall.

We appreciate your contribution and vision in our project! Please help us spread the word by sharing our project with others you think may be interested. Thank you!

More about Lakehead, California and the Northern California Cascades region

Lakehead is a beautiful small town and has a very long history as a place for many things outdoors. There are exciting things happening here at 1,447 feet above sea level in Lakehead and the surrounding area,  It is located halfway between Seattle and Los Angles and is a massive destination for camping, outdoors and adventure.  

We feel that a Zipline Adventure Tour is the perfect next step for this community.


More on our vision

We understand this is going to take a great deal of work and time, and there are going to be obstacles along the way. We know by example and perseverance we will be able to overcome any difficulties.

Everyone with whom we have spoken is excited and enthusiastic about this coming to the community and your support will help us lay a solid foundation for our vision.

Thank you, 

Jason

aim to enrich our community and environment here in the Lakehead
California region. This will be a unique one-of-a-kind tour that can be
enjoyed with no need for special experience or purchase of equipment for the
adventure seeker.
History
and Current Status
The idea for Shasta Zipline Adventures originated in August of
2006, and since then, owner/operator Dan McTimmonds has completed many of the  procedures to complete a thorough due diligence process.  He has completed site visits to existing  zipline tour operators in both Alaska
and Costa Rica, as well as throughout California, in order to amass industry
knowledge from a variety of different operators. 
A 40-acre property near
Lakehead, California was selected for the project based on its scenic beauty coupled with an economically viable location. This property has
already been purchased and bids for the Welcome Center Base Camp which will house the  safety training, parking and restrooms are currently being
solicited.
  

Where we are headed
We are thrilled to announce that we have obtained our first permit!  This is for the construction of the entrance to the driveway to the welcome center.  This is the start of something big because once we improve the entrance, we can then begin to bring in supplies for construction on both the welcome center and the  zipline course itself.


What
we need
We need your help to keep this momentum going and to fund a Media Kit to raise awareness to help pay for Phase 2 funding (the engineering and construction of the zipline course). Phase 3 will be for the costs associated with the construction of the welcome center and initial operational costs.  We are hopeful to be zipping by this fall!



Your
Support
With your support we will be able
to bring this opportunity of Zipline Adventure Tours to Northern California to showcase our local treasures of beautiful Lake Shasta,the Shasta Trinity Wilderness Area and much, much more..
Donations are welcome in any form, contact us to learn how you can get involved or work for a lifetime season pass.
Shasta
Zipline Adventures Tour Park Timeline and Breakdown


Winter 2016
Submit 1600 Fish and Wildlife Permit, Grading Permit, Building Permit, and State SWPPP permit.

Spring 2016
Kick-off meeting with Shasta County Fish and Wildlife.  After the kick-off meeting, we will proceed to the installation of the driveway entrance and improvement of the parking lot.


Summer 2016


Getting all our ziplines and suspension bridges installed, operational supplies in order, and safety measures completed. This includes hiring and training our tour guides, website completion, reservation system and marketing materials for the welcome center. 
Fall 2016
Finishing the welcome center and having the Grand Opening Party!!
Choose
a perk.
In return for your generous
contribution, we are offering perks of a limited run special edition hat or
shirt as well as options to get tickets or season passes at a reduced price for
use when the park opens this Fall. 
We appreciate your contribution and
vision in our project! Please help us spread the word by sharing our project
with others you think may be interested. Thank you! 
More
about Lakehead, California and the Northern California Cascades region
Lakehead is a beautiful small town and has a very long history as
a place for many things outdoors. There are exciting things happening here at 1,447 feet above sea level in
Lakehead and the surrounding area,  It is located halfway between Seattle and Los Angles and is a massive destination for camping, outdoors and adventure.  

We feel that a Zipline
Adventure Tour is the perfect next step for this community.


More on our vision
We understand this is going to take
a great deal of work and time, and there are going to be obstacles along the
way. We know by example and perseverance we will be able to overcome any
difficulties.

Everyone with whom we have spoken
is excited and enthusiastic about this coming to the community and your support
will help us lay a solid foundation for our vision.
Thank you, 
Jason

story:
PHINCHAT is Human translation and tour guide platform. When people need translation service, they can sign up for our app and ask questions unlimitedly for 30 days only with $5.00. Over thousands of translators in the world, anyone who can speak 2 different languages, can catch the question and answer to them. Each month, translators can get paid per unit of answers they have done. Users also can ask about travel information or other general information about their travel site, and they can get answers with their mother tongue.

When I was just graduated university, Even though I could speak several languages just like many other peoples, it was really hard to get a job almost for 10 months. And I found that this problem is not only my case, many other friends around world have faced same problem till now.

At the same time, I figured out that there are many people need foreign language assistance but they couldn’t get it because of too expensive rate. When people travel abroad, do business, buy product from abroad, they usually get into troubles because of foreign language problem.

Then, how about this? Let’s connect language provider and consumer on the mobile APP. 

If my language skill can help them, if they can hire me as a translator?

We are sure that both of language ability provider and consumer will be satisfied by matching their needs each other. This is the story why we start PHINCHAT!

USER

Select the service you need at the bottom of screen, then choose the form of inquiry (text or voice).

Text(+Image) Inquiry Type what you want to ask in text(available to attach image), then press the arrow button at the top right to send.

Voice Inquiry Press the record button and ask what you want, then press the arrow button at the top right to send.

You can check your inquiry record in history. Click ‘Ask again’ to ask the previous question again. Press star key to save the record in My Favorite.
 

Translator

Work List Select Translation or Travel Guide contents at the Top button of screen. Press Catching button to read and answer the tourist inquiry.

Text / image Reply Read the content of inquiry and reply by text and attach image if needed

Voice Reply Read the content of inquiry and reply by voice massage. You can check the quantities of replies and your monthly balance in My Wallet of My Page.

 

You can give opportunities to the young people around the world by supporting PHINCHAT. You can let massive human resource find right direction and it will make our society much better. The ability, people are not using now, can be useful by courtesy of you!  With only small amount of pledges, you can share the warm benefit to other people and you can also get good enough benefit from PHINCHAT at the same time. If you can speak two languages, you can apply for the translator as well. (WWW.PHINCHAT.COM)

Translators earn money by answering translation & guide questions which are issued from you. And we need some marketing budget to let people meet our service successfully. So your pledges will be used for various kind of advertisement. We sure that you can find PHINCHAT advertisement in your area soon.

We are planning to expand our business globally to other areas, such as Arab, Spain and Europe. The more people use our app, the more languages are available on our app. Hope we can be global No.1 translation service platform in the future.

 

Risk and Challenges

Right now, we only provide 4 kind of languages, Chinese, English, Korean, and Japanese. However, we think 4 kind of languages are still enough in the beginning stage. We can grow up, and will be able to provide the service for other languages as well in the future.

We finished App development and we are planning to launch the app hopefully in this month. Marketing and operation things are remained as our challenges, and we will go through with it.

Feel free to reach out to us at [plan_b@phinchat.com] with additional questions you may have.

story:
Award Winning Historian Restores a Piece of Classic Rail Travel

I have worked and volunteered over the past 25 years in the museum world restoring many full size pieces of railway equipment. My latest project, Great Northern Railway lounge observation car 1090, is my own personal railway car and represents the height of rail travel in the 1920s. It is one of the last of its kind and I have ensured this piece of rolling elegance does not go to the scrappers by purchasing the car as a personal project. The 1090 is in stable condition but is in need of a new roof and interior rebuild to transform it from the 1950s work car appearance back to its time of glory as it was in the 1920s. 

Trevor is looking to raise $100000 to renew a majority of the roof structure and apply a weatherproof EPDM roof membrane to keep the weather out for many years to come. Once the roof is complete work will progress on rebuilding the parts of the interior of the lounge area as a start. If there is not enough money raised for the complete project, I would like to see a minimum of the roof completed to stabilize the car. I have assisted with replacing 3 railcar roofs in EPDM rubber membrane in past projects and it is by far the best way to go.

As a photographer I have taken photos of many spectacular places where railways go. I have chosen a few of these photos to become the perks for this fundraiser. The perks will be 8X10 framed prints, Mugs and a set of 4 coasters with a great selection of my photography for you to enjoy around your home, shop or model railway room. 

Thank you for considering this once in a lifetime opportunity to revive this piece of railway history. I understand that not all people out there can help financially and I appreciate that. For those who can not assist financially, please spread the word about this project on whatever social media you have.

Thank you for your interest in this wonderful opportunity to showcase a piece of the past.

story:
Introductions:

Hi guys, Jeroen here, I've been working on a very special project. I believe in a world where transparency is important and you know where your clothing, electronics, food, etc., comes from. And I am not talking about just brands. Since the factory collapse in Bangladesh of 2013, there have been a lot of improvements and insights into the production of clothing. However, a garment doesn’t start at the factory where people sew the clothing together; a garment starts with a seed, a cotton seed, that is put in the ground either by machines or by people.

Let us show you what’s going on in the cotton world. Together with a talented photographer, Reinier van der Aart (RVDA), we will go to China, India and America to show the stories of people that work on the cotton plantations and in the boardrooms where cotton is being traded, what are their hopes and dreams for the future? Do they all have the same goals or are they different from one another. Is cotton life or is life cotton?

We picked China, India and America due to their supply of cotton to the world. These three countries manufacture 73% of the worlds cotton demands. In America, for instance, there is a large amount of financial support from the government. With this support, America developed and evolved their industry, by replacing most of the hand labour with cotton picking machines. This impacts the cost of cotton; American cotton is cheaper than Asian cotton. In China this is not the case, here there is little to no support from the government and the competition is killing.

Now, let us focus on what we want to do. During this adventure, we want to show you what we are experiencing. How? With an old school book, filled with the interviews, photographs, and stories we encounter and experience ourselves. At the moment, we are also in talks with a few companies to help us create an epic 360º movie, so that we can show our adventure at the presentation of our book, as well as publish this movie on YouTube.

What we need and what you get:

By now you might wonder: why do you need € 70.647,00? Well, we don’t need all of it for our research. We need € 37.500,00 to do the research, but this amount alone means we can’t give back to the people that believe in this project and trusted us with their money. To give back to the people, we want to give you the photobook as well as a few other items. From our calculations, we think the additional € 33.147,- is necessary to create the following products:

·  Photobook (650 items)

·  Logo cap from Ebbets Field Flannels (100 items)

*Pre production image

·  Men’s T-Shirts 100% bio cotton (50 items)

·  Women’s T-Shirts 100% bio cotton (50 items)

·  Men’s Sweaters 100% bio cotton (50 items)

·  Women’s Sweaters 100% bio cotton (50 items)

The mens and woman t-shirts and crewnecks are from a company that makes every garment from bio-cotton or recycled materials.


We hope to sell more, but when we sell these we will have a bank balance of -3.397,-, so we are not in it for the money. We are in it for the change.

The € 37.500,00 will go to the following:

·  Cost JVK Consulting

o   To pay the rent, wages and future projects

·  Wage RVDA

o  To pay the wages of Reinier

·  Traveling expenses

o  Flights, car rentals, train tickets etc.

·  Accommodation costs

o  We estimate this project duration to be 2 weeks in India, 2 weeks in China and 1,5 weeks in America, during these stays we need a roof over our head.

·  Other contingencies

o  In case something goes wrong.

Extended goal:

If we reach 90k+, we will throw a huge party for the success of the project for all our backers. Additionally, we will do an exposition of the photos taken and the results of the project for as long as possible.

The Impact:

We have a big network of people around us in the fashion industry. We both have worked with big companies here in the Netherlands. Companies like JANTAMINAU, Kings of Indigo, House of Denim, Vogue and Chanel. This means we can talk to people that can actually make a difference in the industry. When we are finished with creating the book, we will have a presentation for the fashion industry and media, to show them what we have done and create awareness for the people that work in this industry.

With the results that we have gathered, we will continue to work on creating a production chain that can be as transparent as possible. Then, when you buy a T-shirt, you know where the cotton comes from, where it is painted, sewn together, the conditions in which all these steps are completed, and how the item got to the store. This project is the first step in this direction. Future steps will include projects like: Where does synthetic fabrics come from? From Cotton to clothing, a complete traceable collection of clothing. The Creation of an 100% transparent and traceable production chain.

We need to act. The industry won’t improve itself if we don’t demonstrate the need for transparent and ethical production, and it will not stay improved if we don’t demonstrate this need simply beyond a marketing viewpoint.

Risks and Challenges:

In the past few months we have been working hard on this project, to find the right people and talk to them, as well as by making connections and getting the right information. If we don’t get the full amount of funding, that does not mean that this project will all go to waste. If we receive partial funding, we will do as much as possible with a smaller budget. This would mean we could make less trips, perhaps only American and China or America and India, smaller books, less pages, etc., but we hope that it doesn’t come to this.

Other challenges will be getting to the right locations. There are cotton production companies that have a website, and are willing to talk to us and willing to let us visit. However there are also production facilities that do not allow for easy access – places where the working conditions are still not to high standards, or easily accessible, and do not welcome foreigners with cameras. But I believe that when we are on the job, we can find exactly where these locations are and how to get there. If need be, we will jump into a plane that looks like a rust bucket, that looks doubtful that it would even fly, to try to get there.

For all of the other challenges we encounter, we will give full report about what’s going on, and why we chose a certain solution. If we can’t find a good solution and you know anything about the subject, feel free to contact us and help us out!

Whatever happens during this research, there will be a result. If we only get to plantations that do it the ethical way, we can show you how they do that. If we “fail” at not reaching a plantation in hard to reach places, we still have an adventure to tell and show you.

Other ways you can help:

We believe in cooperation, and working with like-minded people. Got a cool idea that could help us? Or interested in working with us? Hit us up!

As said before, we are working on getting a 360 camera to make an awesome movie of our adventure, so if you know someone that could help us, or if you own one and are willing to help, let us know!

About JvK Consultancy

I just wanted to leave you with a final note, one about the company I started. The idea was as followed: A company dedicated to looking into production chains, to try and make this production chain as see-through as possible, but we want to start at the source, we want to start with cotton, look into what is going-on on plantations and see how it works. And this is the first big step for that. I've been looking into doing this project without crowdfunding and work for the money we need, but the sum of money we need is too big, it would be possible to do this, but that wil take 3 to 4 years to create that sum of money, and the governments, companies and people want to change in the coming 3 years, so the time is now to act and do this project.

About the logo, I selected a tree, to show that we want to be sustainable, and the little blue dot stands for the water that the tree needs. I selected an orange color for the tree because we don't want to be that standard "green" hippy brand/company that asphyxiate their clients/consumers with their "green" hippy life style. We are a brand/company that stands for innovation and sustainability, we want to move forward, help the world move forward.

If you have any other questions about JvK Consultancy, or have a crazy idea that might fit our profile, visit our website: www.jeroenvankooten.com and let us know!

story:
TALON Pivot Chairs

Don't just sit. Swivel and enjoy the view at 360 degrees.

 

LIGHT PIVOT CHAIR - Long (L)

Size (When Folded): 4 X 4 X 16 inches
Size (Stored in pouch): 5 X 5.5 X 18 inches
Size (When used): 20 X 15 X 38 inches
Weight: About 3lbs (without pouch)

Weight capacity: 220lb

 

LIGHT PIVOT CHAIR - Short (S)

Size (When Folded): 4 X 4 X 11 inches
Size (Stored in pouch): 5.5 X 5 X 11.5 inches
Size (When used): 19 X 13 X 27.5 inches
Weight: Less than 2.7lbs (without pouch)

Weight capacity: 330lbs

 

LIGHT PIVOT CHAIR - Mini

Size (When Folded): 3.5 X 3.5 X 11 inches
Size (Stored in pouch): 3.5 X 3.5 X 11 inches
Size (When used): 13 X 12 X 14.5 inches
Weight: Less than 1lb (without pouch)

Weight capacity: 220lbs

 

Swivel 360 degrees to enjoy all the view

  • Using a patented pivot module, users can enjoy the practical and functional ability to swivel even in the outdoors!

 

 

Easy to set up and carry around

  • No more camping chairs that are heavy or require complicated assembly process. Easy set-up process (instructions included)
  • Compact enough to carry around in your backpack. Or throw them in the back of your car and take it along wherever you go!

 

 

 

Designed using 7001 grade Duralumin and 600D Polyester fabric.

  • Frames made using airplane-grade 7001 Duralumin provides the foundation for a durable yet lightweight product.
  • Seat covers made using high-quality 600D Polyester fabrics are water-repellent and waterproof. 
  • Tested and assembled in Korea, the combination of above allows up to 330LB in weight capacity (Pivot Chair Short)

 

Don't compromise style and comfort.

  • All of our chairs are available in 4 colors: Black Denim, Blue Denim, Camouflage, and Pink
  • Incorporated mesh fabric for added breathability and stylish look
  • All of our chairs come with carrying cases in matching colors
  • Rear pockets to conveniently store small items

 

Please remember, TALON Pivot Chairs are meant to be used with discretion. Please adhere to the product's weight capacity and avoid standing and excessive reclining. Proper and reasonable use is strictly advised.

story:
Terrorist attacks, natural disasters, calamities or a possible war. These are real scenarios that we may have to face anytime, a reality that made us wonder: 

ARE WE PREPARED?

We, together with a team of military specialists and survival experts, designed this complex, well-structured anti-disaster package meant to help you survive even in the greatest disasters. 

The scenarios may be multiple:

  • Hurricanes
  • Tsunami
  • Floods
  • Earthquakes
  • Volcano eruptions
  • Solar flares
  • Glaciations
  • Nuclear disasters
  • Terrorist attacks
  • War
You may deal with lack of food, of drinking water and of a shelter. The atmosphere may be contaminated with chemical or biological substances. The technology, the electricity and the other utilities on which we depend do not work anymore. The means of communication and all information systems no longer exist. It is definitely an apocalyptic context, but very likely.

Do you have an emergency plan for a force majeure case? Have you planned different scenarios with your family? Do you have a shelter in case of a disaster? Are you in possession of a first aid equipment? Do you have supplies of water and food at least for one week? Do you have methods of alternative communication?

These are questions to which many of us could not provide a positive answer because everybody tries to build up a quiet, common, normal life safe from situations extremely severe. Disasters may occur and their occurrence cannot be controlled by us. But we may control the way we manage the crisis, the manner how we could have at our grasp the resources necessary to make it through this kind of serious events. In such cases, we must act on our own account till the authorities may re-establish the normal living conditions.

It is very important to understand that we need several basic elements to help us survive. Our success in this case equally depends, both physically and mentally, of how well trained you are.

                      

COMPACT and COMPLEX...PREPARED for EVERYTHING

Completely equipped, solid, easy to store and to carry, SURVIVOR BACKPACK helps you survive in safety conditions until the order shall re-establish or the crisis passes.

The survival specialists claim that, once you have to deal with an exceptional case, it is very important to stay calm and to quickly analyse the resources you possess in order to make an escape plan, consequently we made sure that SURVIVOR BACKPACK is fitted with all necessary tools and equipment, in order to ensure the survival in optimum conditions, both physically and mentally. 

                                             A GOOD PSYCHIC!

ensures 50% of the success in the survival process  

A fundamental element of survival, the fire, represents from a psychological point of view, protection and a signalling device. At a physical level, it provides heat, it represents the method by which we are able to defend ourselves, cook food, cleans the water and it is, at the same time, a source of light. We included in our survival kit several instruments which may assist you in setting up a fire, in any kind of circumstance, from waterproof matches up to fire starter. 

Were you aware that you can survive 

without drinking water only for 3 days?

In order to resist from a physical point of view, it is essential that the drinking water be the cleanest, potable and in sufficient quantities. We included in the survival kit doses of potable water, water purification tablets, but also water treatment and collection recipients. 

Top priority: maintenance of your health!

Using a first aid kit, you will be able to help the persons injured and you will continue to apply your survival strategy. We included in the SURVIVOR BACKPACK a first aid kit made up of the most important products necessary for granting the first aid and the proper care of the wounds, lesions, infections, as well as for the pains. 

SAVE YOURSELF 

in case of a chemical or biological accident 

The evolution of our society, the discoveries of the previous century but also the future ones entail the risk of a chemical or biological accident. The threats of a war based on chemical/biological weapons were very often mentioned lately and, unfortunately, we may anytime become the direct victims of such a scenario. The possibility that a biological disaster take place anytime is a real one, while its consequences might be catastrophic. The gas mask has the major role of filtering the contaminated air and of protecting our life and health. 

Thus, we considered to be necessary to include in the survival kit an efficient gas mask, fitted with specific filter cartridges and which may be easily adjusted for any kind of size or age. 

YOU MAY FIND THE BEST SOLUTION!

In the case of many disasters, it is necessary to relocate and adjust to the existing conditions. It is possible to have to get out of the residential areas and to be forced to head for wild places with a steep relief or at altitude. You will have to make use of methods by means of which to make sure all those accompanying you follow safely the route and for this reason, the specialists in mountain routes recommend as being absolutely necessary the use of an alpinism cord, respectively karabiner and fasteners and safety products,

but also of a professional compass, so that the sense of direction be as precise and correct as it can be. 

TAKE SHELTER!

Even from the beginning of mankind, the human being felt the need of having a shelter, his own place where he could protect his family from danger. A roof to keep him safe during bad weather conditions, a warm place where he may rest. 

GPS Tracker incorporated

With the satellite tracking system, you will be located and saved thanks to the signal issued by the GPS that we integrated in the backpack.

REMAINING CONNECTED WITH THE WORLD

is very important in the rescue process

We need means of communication in order to launch our scream for help or to locate the lost persons. The fixed and mobile telephone, social communication networks are completely inoperative. With the transmitter stations included in the survival backpack we ensured the alternative to communication. Fitted with coverage of up to 50 km, water resistant and with a 30-day battery life, the transmitter stations helps you connect with the others.

In a scenario where the electricity no longer exists, we need alternative sources which can provide the power supply to the communication and electrical devices. We included in the SURVIVOR BACKPACK an efficient solar charger, water and bad weather resistant.

You can survive without food for 3 weeks!  

In an extreme situation, you will need every single drop of energy, the unique source of the energy consisting in the food. The natural resources may save you, but you have to know how to use them and to have the minimum equipment for this purpose. Being used during our daily life to get easily the food from the market or from a nearby garden, we do not possess the necessary knowledge to procure it by hunting or by other methods. To this end, we included in the survival backpack an important quantity of food ready to be cooked, dehydrated food, a complete fishing gear, as well as traps for animals.

The survival specialists assert that once we have to deal with an exceptional case, it is important to remain calm and to quickly analyze the resources that you have at disposal in order to make a rescue plan, and that is precisely why we also added in the SURVIVOR BACKPACK all necessary tools and equipment in order to ensure the survival in optimal conditions, both physically and mentally. 



1) What size does the backpack have?

SURVIVOR Backpack was designed to be easily stored and carried; as its sizes are 62/36/25cm, you may keep it in your office, in garage or even in the trunk of your car.

2) I do not know how to use the first aid equipment. Are there any instructions for use?

Yes. We attached to the first aid equipment a full user’s guide.

3) I did not acquire the basic knowledge for survival. What should I do?

You will find in the SURVIVAL BACKPACK an accurate, complex and professional survival guide that may be easily understood.

4) For how many days will the food supplies included in the backpack last?

The food supplies are calculated for 2 persons for a period of 20-30 days.

5) Can I procure my food by using the components from SURVIVOR BACKPACK?

Yes. By using the fishing gear and the traps for hunting, you will be able to get your food for an unlimited period of time. By using the survival guide included in the SURVIVOR BACKPACK you will find out what kind of plants, mushrooms or wild fruits you may safely eat.

6) What should I do if my supply of water ends?

You may use any kind of water supply changing it into drinking water by using the water purification tablets or a personal water filter straw included in the SURVIVOR BACKPACK. You may also boil the water, making it thus potable.

7) Is the backpack waterproof?

Yes. I used for the backpack manufacture the most innovative materials with an increased impermeability so that everything contained by it be protected from the bad weather.

8) I do not know any special techniques of lighting the fire.

Do not worry! We included in this backpack only tools that will not cause any trouble. We included the waterproof matches and the fire starter that sparks even in the most adverse conditions.

9) Why should I get this backpack?

This is a backpack that can save your life. Imagine that a disaster happens without any warning and there is no time necessary to pack minimum supplies. The backpack contains everything you need to survive to the toughest conditions; all you have is to take it with you while you leave that place.

10) May the backpack be a present for the loved ones?

Yes. What greater proof of love and appreciation can you show to someone if not the possibility to save his own life?

11) Which are the chances that I may need SURVIVOR Backpack?

Unfortunately, the disasters, the terrorist attacks or a possible war represent threats that always menaced the mankind, and in recent years, they got even worse and multiplied.

12) To what percentage would my chances of survival increase?

With no water, supplies, defence, shelter and a source of heat you cannot survive more than several days. But if you have your SURVIVOR BACKPACK, you got everything you need to survive in optimum conditions for an unlimited period of time.

13) May I purchase a gas mask or even additional pieces of masks?

Yes. You can find the gas mask as separate perks and you have the possibility of buying as many as you wish.

14) May I purchase separately other components of the survival kit?

You cannot purchase separately components, but you have the possibility of purchasing another piece of SURVIVOR BACKPACK or even more, depending on your necessities.

15) How do I use the compass to find my way?

There exists a column in the survival guide included in the SURVIVOR BACKPACK which teaches you how to find your way using the compass.

16) Will I be able to use the tools included in the SURVIVOR BACKPACK?

Yes. The tools from the SURVIVOR BACKPACK have a similar use as the household products so you will not face any kind of problems using them.

17) How do I signal my presence in order to I can be saved?

You may use the fire, the signalling mirror from the SURVIVOR BACKPACK, the flashlight, the whistle and the transmitter stations in order to point out your presence.

18) Will I know to build my own shelter?

Yes. By using the professional survival guide and the equipments included in the SURVIVOR BACKPACK, you will be able to build an efficient and safe shelter.

19) Will I manage to fix the tent by myself?

Yes. The SURVIVOR tent may be easily and intuitively fixed and assembled, but we also included the instructions for assembly. 

20) If I have any other questions, to whom may I address?

For any other further questions or suggestions, you may mention them by writing us an email at: survivor.ultimateprotection@gmail.com or by accessing the contact box on INDIEGOGO platform.

story:
Do you want to make a change in hospitality?

Join this new adventure! With your help, we are about to build AsiaDomes, a fascinating resort unlike anything Thailand has ever seen. Not only an amazing place to sleep but also a place that is ecological and creates social impact.

----------------------------------------------------------

Introducing AsiaDomes

AsiaDomes is made for travellers seeking extraordinary and exclusive experiences combined with luxury. A dome is not just a place to sleep but also a unique experience to remember the rest of your life.

 

Your own cosy dome with a breath taking view, air conditioning, luxury bathroom and comfortable bed makes the place feel better than home. This in combination with our barbecue nights, swimming pool and fire place will give you the feeling of being in a total different world.

 

Sleeping in a dome is the perfect combination of an outdoor eco-friendly adventure and the comfort of a luxury 4-star resort.

----------------------------------------------------------

Our Sustainable Vision

 

Designed to minimize environmental impact

When you build a house, you have to destroy nature and the house will last forever. Our domes are easily removable and are standing on platforms to preserve our beautiful nature.

 

The American Institute of Architects calls the geodesic dome “the strongest, lightest and most efficient means of enclosing space known to man.” Its spherical form is composed of triangular facets, birthed from Buckminster Fuller’s goal of creating a structure analogous to nature’s own designs.

Our water and energy solutions make sure, we only have a low carbon emission and compared to normal resort buildings, our AsiaDomes use 1/3 less energy for air-conditioning! The ambient airflow inside the dome is continuous, with no stagnant corners, requiring less energy to circulate air and maintain even temperatures.

 

Designed to maximize social impact

Many Thai communities around us are struggling with low income and no access to personal development resources. We will create a “Development Fund” to provide personal development initiatives for our employees and their families. In fact, each night in a dome that is sold will contribute to a personal development experience for a person in need.

 

This resort will generate jobs and innovate opportunities for people who need it most. By playing your part, you help to make it all possible. When you back this idea, you become part of the very backbone of this movement. Even if you not want to stay at AsiaDomes, you still can be part of the reason this movement exists. This is just the beginning. AsiaDomes resorts will dot the Asia map and eventually span the globe.

 

You want to do something tangible to fight against the sadness in the world? This is it! Together, we can build a for-profit venture that creates opportunities and multiply it all over the world.

----------------------------------------------------------

TRAVEL TO AN INCREDIBLE LOCATION
Our nature will mesmerize you with the massive green rocky mountains.

ENJOY GLAMPING
Glamping is where stunning nature meets modern luxury. It’s a way to experience unique parts of the world—without having to sacrifice any comfort.

BE HAPPY
We create and spread happiness for our guests, employees and ourselves so everyone can take a piece of sustained happiness back home. Everything in the resort is carefully considered aiming to benefit others. By backing AsiaDomes, you become part of a larger movement.

----------------------------------------------------------

Fantastic location

Asiadomes is located in the south of Thailand. Thailand is one of the top five tourism countries of the world. The first location will be in Ao Nang, Krabi. This is one of the most popular and growing tourist destinations of Thailand. Ao Nang and Krabi are known for their mango forest, beautiful waterfalls, hot springs and day trips to white sandy beaches like Koh Phi Phi and James Bond Island.

Curious what Ao Nang, Krabi has to offer during your holiday? Check our great website with day trips, motorbike routes and other attractions to do in Krabi ⇒ www.krabiscooter.net

----------------------------------------------------------

AsiaDomes Founders

THE DRIVING FORCE BEHIND THE CONCEPT

We are Yke and Gonny Kooistra. Together we have a lively daughter named Jasmin. She is our example to live constantly in the present moment. We are passionate to stand up for things we believe in and to make a difference in life.

 

In 2016 we worked in Thailand. We saw so many persons that needed the opportunity to develop their strengths. We saw many similar resorts which did not respect mother earth. We decided to make our vision reality to create social impact by starting a unique and ecological friendly place to remember in this beautiful country. By combining our efforts and hospitality experience we felt that this is a good opportunity to make our wish come true.

 

During preparation we came in touch with Emmy. We decided to join forces and work together on this project. Emmy has much experience in the hospitality branch in Thailand.

 

We have the opportunity to break paradigms, explore new ways of living and most notably: finding daily happiness and fulfilment by realizing our life project together with our guests. 

----------------------------------------------------------

ASIADOMES TEAM

----------------------------------------------------------

DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE

Right now, the architects just finished the construction drawings and we get the building permit. In February 2019 we will start with the construction. The planned opening is 1 November 2019.

 

Reaching our goal of € 35,000 allows us to buy our domes. We still hope that we raise as much as we can but with this goal as a minimum, we are sure to move forward with the project.

 

Why we use crowdfunding? So you can be one of our first guests and have the chance to stay with us before others at a very special rate.

 

----------------------------------------------------------

Resort facts 

  • AsiaDomes starts with 10 domes for two persons and 5 domes for four persons. We are able to expand with 10 domes after three years.
  • All domes have air conditioning, a luxurious bathroom and comfortable beds. 
  • AsiaDomes is the first resort that follows ecofriendly guidlines in Krabi area.
  • AsiaDomes is Thailand's first luxury resort with domes.
  • Ao Nang, Krabi is one of most popular and fastest growing tourist destinations in Thailand. 
  • Our restaurant will serve Thai, Chinese and Western food and is specialized in food allergies.   
  • The luxurious swimming pool will create the feeling of freedom in the middle of nature.

story_txt:
Do you want to make a change in hospitality?
Join this new adventure! With your help, we are about to build AsiaDomes, a fascinating resort unlike anything Thailand has ever seen. Not only an amazing place to sleep but also a place that is ecological and creates social impact.

----------------------------------------------------------
Introducing AsiaDomes
AsiaDomes is made for travellers seeking extraordinary and exclusive experiences combined with luxury. A dome is not just a place to sleep but also a unique experience to remember the rest of your life.
 
Your own cosy dome with a breath taking view, air conditioning, luxury bathroom and comfortable bed makes the place feel better than home. This in combination with our barbecue nights, swimming pool and fire place will give you the feeling of being in a total different world.
 
Sleeping in a dome is the perfect combination of an outdoor eco-friendly adventure and the comfort of a luxury 4-star resort.

----------------------------------------------------------
Our Sustainable Vision
 
Designed to minimize environmental impact
When you build a house, you have to destroy nature and the house will last forever. Our domes are easily removable and are standing on platforms to preserve our beautiful nature.
 
The American Institute of Architects calls the geodesic dome “the strongest, lightest and most efficient means of enclosing space known to man.” Its spherical form is composed of triangular facets, birthed from Buckminster Fuller’s goal of creating a structure analogous to nature’s own designs.

Our water and energy solutions make sure, we only have a low carbon emission and compared to normal resort buildings, our AsiaDomes use 1/3 less energy for air-conditioning! The ambient airflow inside the dome is continuous, with no stagnant corners, requiring less energy to circulate air and maintain even temperatures.

 
Designed to maximize social impact
Many Thai communities around us are struggling with low income and no access to personal development resources. We will create a “Development Fund” to provide personal development initiatives for our employees and their families. In fact, each night in a dome that is sold will contribute to a personal development experience for a person in need.
 
This resort will generate jobs and innovate opportunities for people who need it most. By playing your part, you help to make it all possible. When you back this idea, you become part of the very backbone of this movement. Even if you not want to stay at AsiaDomes, you still can be part of the reason this movement exists. This is just the beginning. AsiaDomes resorts will dot the Asia map and eventually span the globe.
 
You want to do something tangible to fight against the sadness in the world? This is it! Together, we can build a for-profit venture that creates opportunities and multiply it all over the world.

----------------------------------------------------------
TRAVEL TO AN INCREDIBLE LOCATIONOur nature will mesmerize you with the massive green rocky mountains.

ENJOY GLAMPINGGlamping is where stunning nature meets modern luxury. It’s a way to experience unique parts of the world—without having to sacrifice any comfort.

BE HAPPYWe create and spread happiness for our guests, employees and ourselves so everyone can take a piece of sustained happiness back home. Everything in the resort is carefully considered aiming to benefit others. By backing AsiaDomes, you become part of a larger movement.

----------------------------------------------------------
Fantastic location
Asiadomes is located in the south of Thailand. Thailand is one of the top five tourism countries of the world. The first location will be in Ao Nang, Krabi. This is one of the most popular and growing tourist destinations of Thailand. Ao Nang and Krabi are known for their mango forest, beautiful waterfalls, hot springs and day trips to white sandy beaches like Koh Phi Phi and James Bond Island.
Curious what Ao Nang, Krabi has to offer during your holiday? Check our great website with day trips, motorbike routes and other attractions to do in Krabi ⇒ www.krabiscooter.net

----------------------------------------------------------
AsiaDomes Founders
THE DRIVING FORCE BEHIND THE CONCEPT
We are Yke and Gonny Kooistra. Together we have a lively daughter named Jasmin. She is our example to live constantly in the present moment. We are passionate to stand up for things we believe in and to make a difference in life.
 
In 2016 we worked in Thailand. We saw so many persons that needed the opportunity to develop their strengths. We saw many similar resorts which did not respect mother earth. We decided to make our vision reality to create social impact by starting a unique and ecological friendly place to remember in this beautiful country. By combining our efforts and hospitality experience we felt that this is a good opportunity to make our wish come true.
 
During preparation we came in touch with Emmy. We decided to join forces and work together on this project. Emmy has much experience in the hospitality branch in Thailand.
 
We have the opportunity to break paradigms, explore new ways of living and most notably: finding daily happiness and fulfilment by realizing our life project together with our guests. 

----------------------------------------------------------
ASIADOMES TEAM



----------------------------------------------------------
DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE
Right now, the architects just finished the construction drawings and we get the building permit. In February 2019 we will start with the construction. The planned opening is 1 November 2019.
 
Reaching our goal of € 35,000 allows us to buy our domes. We still hope that we raise as much as we can but with this goal as a minimum, we are sure to move forward with the project.
 
Why we use crowdfunding? So you can be one of our first guests and have the chance to stay with us before others at a very special rate.
 

----------------------------------------------------------
Resort facts 

AsiaDomes starts with 10 domes for two persons and 5 domes for four persons. We are able to expand with 10 domes after three years.
All domes have air conditioning, a luxurious bathroom and comfortable beds. 
AsiaDomes is the first resort that follows ecofriendly guidlines in Krabi area.
AsiaDomes is Thailand's first luxury resort with domes.
Ao Nang, Krabi is one of most popular and fastest growing tourist destinations in Thailand. 
Our restaurant will serve Thai, Chinese and Western food and is specialized in food allergies.   
The luxurious swimming pool will create the feeling of freedom in the middle of nature.


----------------------------------------------------------
REWARDS/PERKS
Join this Indiegogo campaign, become a co-founder and make a change in the world.

Free shipping all over the world.

----------------------------------------------------------

Get your AsiaDomes co founder certificate. With this certificate we put your name and picture on the co founders wall in our lobby and you receive from November 2019 till 2021: 10% discount on best available rate on the hotel website, 15% discount on food, early check-in and late check-out.

Also possible as giveaway for a friend, colleague or family member.

story:
High Definition Polarised Sunglasses with or without readers.

We are a small Australian family company who create unique eyewear. I work closely with my daughter Belinda and son Jamie on the development of sunglasses that the big guys should be -but aren't interested in developing.

Our latest design (A WORLD'S FIRST) is a super lightweight, dual moulded frame that features an adjustable nose piece. The dual moulding creates non slip temples while the adjustable nose piece can be made to fit all face shapes.

The 8 base TR90 frame and lens wrap giving the wearer optimum protection from the elements of wind, spray and UV whilst protecting the eyes from airborne particles like dust and road debris.

The frame features a lens locking system that secures the lens and also makes changing the a lens  a breeze.

 

This is our first crowdfunding campaign and we are offering 3 lens options so we have something to offer everyone:

1) Polarised  blue mirror High Definition lens (Cat3). These are a general purpose or multi sport sunglass offering heightened definition and the advantages of polarisation. 

The High Definition Polarised mirror lens makes driving a breeze by cutting down glare from the sun and other vehicles. While boating, sailing or jet skiing reflected glare off the water is greatly reduced and the polarisation enables you to see sand banks or snags under the water.

 

2) Polarised High Definition Photochromic - these lenses offer optimum clarity  and are Cat 1 (around 15% darkness) in low or no light and darken to Cat 3 (75 to 80% darkness) in full sun. In normal conditions the lens will darken in around 30 seconds and lighten in around 60 seconds. This lens is great for general use as well as many outdoor activities - they can protect the eyes in very little light  and sharp vision (inside or pre dawn) through to the sunniest of conditions.

While motorcycling the frame will fit comfortably under a full or open face helmet - the lens lighten or darken as required with the open face helmet but will lighten under a full face until the visor is lifted - they will then react to the conditions.

 

The high definition lens is great for hiking, running, cycling or hunting as the lens reacts and will lighten under the tree canopy and darken again in full sun. While playing  golf the high definition lens enables the wearer to see golf balls in leaf litter or in shady areas and heightens the colours of the grass enabling the wearer to see the contours better.

 

The polarized component of the lens is great for any activity around water. They enhance the viewing of wind shifts on the surface of the water while sailing. The silver shimmer on the water surface is greatly reduced thus eliminating eye fatigue while enjoying any water activity.

 

3) Polarised High Definition Photochromic lens with small reader lenses moulded into the the base of the lens. This lens uses "WORLD FIRST TECHNOLOGY" These lenses are Cat1 in low or no light and darken to Cat3 in full sun. The polarisation reduces reflected glare particularly around water and snow. While the reader component removes the need to have a set of  polarised sunglasses and a set of reading glasses. You can read a menu at your local coffee shop, a book in a park or prices on goods at the local markets.  

 

For those who are optically challenged (long sighted) and wear glasses to read these make life easy. No need to change from sunglasses to your readers so are ideal for viewing digital screens like a  bikes computer, compass, watch, heart rate monitor, GPS or dashboard in your car, reading a book, menu or map, tying fishing tackle or working with small details they are so convenient.

                 

 

We have searched the world for a lens company who could assist us in the development and production of such a lens and have spent the last six months testing prototypes in all conditions.

Our feedback from wearers has been extremely positive.

 

By pledging to the project you will assist us in getting it off the ground much sooner than we would have under normal circumstances. We are seeking $35,000 to enable us to commence our first production so that we can ship prior to Christmas 2018.

We currently have one frame colour option worked out and would then ask our contributors for input on the two or three other colour combinations.

Each pair of glasses will have a lifetime warranty and will be supplied in a neoprene case, with microfibre cleaning cloth and sunglass retainer.

This is our first crowdfunding campaign and we would love for you to be involved in the project.

Over the last few years our optical innovations have been winning awards. Firstly winning the Australian Marine Industries - Most Innovative Exported  Marine Product in 2016.

Secondly we were nominated for a DAME Award at METS the world's biggest Marine Industry trade show. 

We also plan on entering our latest design in this years awards.

Over the last 20 years of so two major companies have been purchasing or taking over sunglass brands around the world - these two companies now own about 80% of the market. As the market is now driven by fashion and not innovation brands who were once innovators are now motivated to produce designs that  have limited life spans as they move into and then out of fashion. 

Our aim is to produce products for sectors of the market that are being neglected i.e.

We developed the photochromic polarised photochromic lens with bi focal readers (a world first) as a large proportion of the population wear glasses to read, normally they would wear sunglasses outside in the sun and then have to switch to their normal prescription glasses whenever they need to read something.

Risks & Challenges

We have most of our tooling for the frame already  except of one small piece that is currently in development.

One company owns the technology for  photochromic coating (they just happen to be owned by one of the above two companies) they have been know to withdraw their raw material from the market for one or two months at a time. If we get caught up with one of their whim's our production could be delayed one or two months.

Our lens supplier is now stockpiling photochromic raw materials to reduce the chance of having their production effected.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our sunglass design (but they aren't for you) and have someone in mind who would love them please let them know about our Indiegogo campaign by using the share tool on this site.

story:
Olfactive Studio is a Unisex, high-end, premium quality collection of 9 (10 soon) fragrances inspired by photography.

Since 2011, Olfactive Studio enjoys great success in over 30 countries worldwide, but it remains an artistic and confidential brand. It's sold exclusively at Barney's department stores in the U.S., at the Jovoy perfume embassy in Paris, at the Kadewe department store in Berlin, at the Corso Como concept store in Milano, and at trendy Cosmotheca stores in Moscow...

Céline Verleure is French, living in Paris, and the Founder and Creative Director of Olfactive Studio fragrances. She started making perfumes 25 years ago (Kenzo Jungle, l'Eau by Kenzo, etc...)

We need your help to create and cover the cost of a new and unique bottle for the entire Olfactive Studio collection. The bottle we are currently using is very beautiful but it's made with a standard mold that many brands use, so it's not distinctive or recognizable and it can't be protected against copying. A Glass making mold costs 25,000 dollars.

To thank you for your contribution to this beautiful design project, we will send you complimentary fragrances. You can choose the 7-sample discovery box, one or several fragrances from our current collection, the entire collection of 9 fragrances, or the new fragrance #10 (named "Close Up") on preview. In the coming weeks, we will post some very personal tips to help you choose one of the perfumes in our collection according to your taste. (Perk's choice is done by email and not possible on the Indiegogo page, but we write to all donators within 24 hours)

Without your help, it will be hard for our young company to be ready for Christmas without taking considerable financial risks or we would have to postpose the launch.

Thank you in advance for your generosity!

Olfactive Studio est une collection de 9 Eaux de Parfum mixtes (bientôt 10), originales et de grande qualité, inspirées de photographies artistiques.

Depuis 2011, Olfactive Studio rencontre un grand succès dans plus de 30 pays dans le monde tout en restant une marque artistique et confidentielle. Olfactive Studio est en exclusivité pour les grands magasins chez Barneys aux USA, à l'ambassade des parfums rares Jovoy à Paris, au grand magasin Kadewe à Berlin, au concept store Corso Como à Milan et chez Cosmotheca à Moscou...

Céline Verleure, française et parisienne de longue date, est la fondatrice et directrice artistique des parfums Olfactive Studio. Elle a commencé à créer des parfums il y a 25 ans (Kenzo Jungle, l'Eau by Kenzo, etc...)

Nous avons besoin de vous aujourd'hui pour créer et financer un nouveau flacon exclusif pour l'ensemble de la gamme Olfactive Studio. Le flacon actuel est plutôt réussi mais c'est un moule de verre standard, utilisé aujourd'hui par de nombreuses marques et donc peu identifiable, ni reconnaissable et qui ne peut être protégé en cas de copie. 

Un moule de fabrication de verre en France coûte 22.000€ / US$25,000

En contrepartie de votre participation à ce beau projet de design, vous pourrez choisir un ou plusieurs parfums de notre gamme actuelle en commençant par nos kits découverte de 7 parfums jusqu'à la collection complète de l'ensemble de nos parfums actuels. Au fil des semaines, nous vous guiderons sur le choix d'un des parfums de notre gamme selon vos goûts. Le choix du parfum se fait par échange d'email dans les 24 heures suivant votre contribution.

Votre participation est précieuse pour nous permettre de lancer ces nouveaux flacons à temps pour Noël 2016, c'est à dire que les flacons soient fabriqués en juillet et remplis en septembre prochain. Sans vous il sera difficile d'être prêt pour Noël sans prendre de gros risques financiers pour notre jeune société ou en lançant avec retard. 

Un grand merci d'avance pour votre générosité !
